Kjok ëre dämär, l̇l̇ëye l̇l̇ëm obishko ga Sbö kjok shäryono uunkong, kjopkwo, kl̈ung bakoe.
Kl̈ung ëre ĩgöy l̇l̇ëm obi, dl̈ung rong, kjing yẽt eröe. Eshko ga Sbö Sëya wir pjang dl̈ung kjing pjl̈uk wl̈eni erä.
Eshko ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ ga «Kjok, pja ber shjiye» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Ĩya ga kjok shjiy l̈i beno pjl̈úe. Kjok shjiy l̈i kowara «dba», kjok sĩ l̈i kowara «shkë», ga iara beno tjeng dboy dboye. Eshko ga öötong dbar kjwara.
<range>
Wẽshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Dl̈ung, pja opkjos ber dboye» l̈e.
L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni. Dl̈ung l̈i iara beno buk töshko, dira iara beno pjang kjomo,
beno pjang ba tjrëko l̈i kowara «kjok dogo». Eshko ga öötong dbar pjök.
Wẽshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Dl̈ung, pja tönzong ber tjeng shtor, kjok dogro l̈i wen wl̈o» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Kjok dogro l̈i kowara beno «kl̈ung», dl̈ung l̈i kowara beno «dl̈ung». Eshko ga ĩya ga beno pjl̈úe.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Kl̈ung, pja kjing go kjl̈o sho wenzong, kjl̈o sho l̇l̇ërba pogo dwl̈ayo tjok wl̈eniyo, kjor botjyë wl̈eniyo bakoe» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Kl̈ung l̈i kjing go kjl̈o sho weno obl̈ë obl̈ë dwl̈ayo tjok wl̈eniyo, kjor weno bo tjok wl̈eniyo bakoe. Eshko ga ĩya ga beno pjl̈úe.
Eshko ga öötong dbar mya.
Wẽshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Kjopkwo, pja goshko iök wenzong, shkë, dba, e ber tjeng dboy dboy wl̈o, dbar l̇l̇ë, mok l̇l̇ë, l̈u l̇l̇ë, e miydokl̈o wl̈o bakoe.
Iök, pjãy ber kãl̈ã shjiy kl̈ung kong» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Iök shäryara pjök, kjwara kësbang ber shjiy dba wl̈o, kjwara chirawa ber shjiy shkë wl̈o. Dbala shäryara uunkong bakoe.
Iök l̈i iara beno l̈ok kjopkwo go, kl̈ung kjing l̈i ber shjiy wl̈o.
Iara beno tjeng shjiy dba wl̈o, shkë wl̈o bakoe. Ga kjok shjiy l̈i, kjok ro sĩ l̈i, e kjara beno tjeng dboy dboy eni. Eshko ga ĩya ga beno pjl̈úe.
Eshko ga öötong dbar pkëng (4).
Wẽshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Dl̈ung, di, pjãy roshko mã wenzong obl̈ë obl̈ëe. Kjok dogo, pja go sënwa wenzong l̇l̇ërba pogo» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Äya këskës chila dl̈ung roy so, di roy so, e shäryara uunkong, sënwa, e shäryara uunkong bakoe. Eshko ga ĩya ga beno pjl̈úe.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ l̇l̇ëbo wena tjeng l̈i kong ga «Pjãy wapga shdärzong dl̈ung kjwang jĩkong, di uunkong roshko bakoe. Sënwa, pjãy wapga shdärzong kjok kjwang jĩkong bebi» l̈e. L̇l̇ëbo shäryara beno pjl̈ú ba kong l̈ok eni.
Eshko ga öötong dbar shkëng (5).
Wẽshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Kl̈ung, pja kjing go äya kjl̈oshko so wenzong, öng wenzong bakoe» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Eshko ga ĩya ga beno pjl̈úe.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ obi ga «No shäryëy shara, so shji kjoyoe. E ber tjwl̈õ ara, dbo ara, l̇l̇ëbo obl̈ë obl̈ë tjeng l̈i kjinmo, mã, sënwa, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so bakoe» l̈e.
Eni ga no, e shäryara Sbörë so e om go kjoyoe. Shäryara domer, wal̈ë.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽno beno pjl̈ú ba kong. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Pjãy shdärzong ara, tira l̇l̇ëme. Kjok ëre dl̈imia. Pjãy iër ber l̈öng ba ĩga. Mã, sënwa, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, pjãy iër ber l̈öng ba ĩga bakoe» l̈e.
E irgo ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Kjok ĩzĩa. Kjl̈o sho l̇l̇ërba pogo dwl̈ayo tjok wl̈eniyo, kjor botjyë wl̈eniyo, e twër ber bomi kong, uëmi wl̈o. E bomi dl̈i uunkong.
Gueniyo ga öng, sënwa, äya kjl̈oshko so, e kong kjl̈o sho twër ber ba kong, ue wl̈o» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryono beno eni.
Eshko ga ĩya ga uunkong l̈i beno pjl̈ú, owa l̇l̇ëme. Eshko ga öötong dbar tjer (6).
Kjok uunkong, l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës, e shäryara beno pjir eni.
Dbar kjäk (7) ga ba pak shäryara pjir l̈ishko ga woshtonoe. Ga woshtono eshko dbaryo kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëbo shäryara dbar kjäk (7) l̈i kong pjl̈úe. E iara beno pjang dboye.
<range>
Kjok shäryara Sbö Jehovárë uunkong eni. Eshko ga
kjor, kjl̈o sho, e wentë l̇l̇ëm obi. Shunyo ichayde Sbö Jehovárë shrë kl̈ung kjing go l̇l̇ëm obi. Ëye parkaga kl̈ung kjing go l̇l̇ëm bakoe. L̇l̇ëye wentë l̇l̇ëm obi e kjĩshko.
Gueniyo eshko ga di tur tëm kl̈ung dirko, e sguin kl̈ung kjing go.
Eshko ga domer, e shäryara Sbörë kjl̈ara kl̈ung sho go. Ga pjl̈uk bakwara ba ne roy ber shäng së wl̈o, ga beno shäng së.
Ga Sbö kjok poshäryono buk kjrina ko Edén, kjok, e buk dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong. Ga domer shäryara l̈i iara beno shäng eshko.
Eshko ga kjor shäryara obl̈ë obl̈ë kjl̈öböso, wol̈ësowa, bo uako wl̈eniyo. Ga kjok buk l̈i roworbëshko ga kjor iara beno l̈ok do pjök. Kjl̈ara, ba bo uoroy ga shji wol̈on l̇l̇ëme. Kjl̈ara obi, e l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú, l̇l̇ëbo owa, e miydokl̈o.
Edén kjokyo l̈ishko ga di wen pjang pjl̈ara. E jer pjang shdär kjor l̈i gl̈oroy. Ey ga shdöktong beno pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng (4).
Di bäm go l̈i ko Pisón. E jer pjrĩya buk Javilá kjokyo worbo tjok. Kjok eshko, e dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr ara.
Dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr kjok eshko so l̈i owa l̇l̇ëm, shõyl̈ṍr anmoyõ. Poshtikkl̈o l̈õ pjl̈ëbl̈ë ko bedelio eshko tjok. Akkwo tjwl̈õ ara ko ónice eshko tjok bakoe.
Di pjl̈ara obi l̈i ko Guijón. E jer buk sjöng Cus kjokyo go.
Di pjl̈ara obi l̈i ko Tigris. E jer buk Asiria kjokyo dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong. Di pjl̈ara obi l̈i ko Éufrates.
Domer l̈i iara Sbörë beno shäng Edén kjokyo roshko, kjok l̈i ĩga, kjok l̈i daga bakoe.
Eni ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjok ëreshko ga kjor bo twër ber bop kong uunkong, uëp wl̈o.
Gueniyo ga l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú, l̇l̇ëbo owa, e miydokl̈o kjoryo bo, era uëy l̇l̇ëme. Uorop ga pja wol̈on jl̈õkoyo» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ obi ga «Domer ber sök kjl̈araso ga pjl̈ú l̇l̇ëme. Kong ba yorkaga shäryër kjl̈ara, ba kjimtë wl̈o» l̈e.
Eni ga öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e shäryak beno kl̈ung sho go, ga söra uunkong, pina domer l̈i kong, koie wl̈o.
Ga koiara uunkong eni. Gueniyo e tjrëko l̇l̇ëye wl̈ẽna ber ba kjimtokl̈o wl̈o l̇l̇ëme.
E kjĩshko ga domer l̈i iara Sbörë beno buk pë ronge. Buk pë wopro ga shgl̈ing shira kjwangna, ga sho l̇l̇ira jek iröng obi.
Ba shgl̈ing l̈i go ga wal̈ë shäryara kjl̈ara. E irgo ga söra, pina ba kong.
Ĩya domer l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ ga «¡Ĩzong! Ërera so tja kjoyoe. Ba sho kjwe botoya dik. Ba dbogl̈o kjwe botoya dik. Koiër ber “wal̈ë”, shira domer go dwayo kjĩshko» l̈e.
E kjĩshko ga domer ba data, ba mekë rayë, ga orkwosmok wal̈ë tjok, ga ber l̈öng kjl̈araso wl̈eni.
Eshko ga l̈öng kjwor, gueniyo l̇l̇ëye l̈ökyokjre l̈ok l̇l̇ëme.
Dgur, e obl̈ë jyãpgwë äe, äya kjl̈oshko so obl̈ë obl̈ë shäryara Sbö Jehovárë l̈i kjinmo. Pjl̈ara ga tjl̈ẽ wal̈ë l̈i kong ga «¿Jl̈õkoyo ga Sbö tjl̈ẽno bomi kong ga “Kjok ëreshko ga kjor bo uëy uunkong l̇l̇ëme” l̈ara eni jl̈õre?»
«Kjor bo uërwa uunkong ga pjl̈úe.
Gueniyo ga kjor jong kjl̈ara kjok roworbëshko, era uërwa ga äe. Sbö tjl̈ẽno borwa kong ga “Kjwe uëy l̇l̇ëme. Porwëy l̇l̇ëm bakoe. L̇l̇ëm ga pjãy wol̈on” l̈ara eni» l̈e dgur kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «E jyõ. Pjãy wol̈on l̇l̇ëme.
Miyde Sbörë pjir ga kjor ëre bo uoromi ga pjãy bokkwo roshwing, ga pjãy ber l̈ong l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú, l̇l̇ëbo owa miydë. Eni ga pjãy ber l̈öng Sbö dik» l̈e.
Kuya ga ĩya ga kjor bo, e wol̈ësowae. Ga iara beno uayuae. E kjok miydokl̈o bakoe l̈e. Eni ga kjor bo l̈i kjrara, ga uarae. E irgo ga twara ba l̈anma kong, ga omuono bakoe.
Jekdo eshko ga bokkwo roshwingö, ga opmiydono l̈ok ga l̈öng kjwor. Eni ga kjor ko higuera l̈i korga sera, pjrira ba dop go, ber l̈öng kjwor l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Kjok sëng, pjl̈uk ri rishko ga Sbö jëk jek shäng kjor gl̈oroy l̈i kura l̈ok. Ga töktong l̈ok zron ĩ, ga opjneno kjor l̈i pjl̈or go, ĩya l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Eshko ga domer l̈i rokara Sbörë. Tjl̈ẽ ga «¿Pja shäng kjone?»
«Kuror ga pja jëk shäng kjor gl̈oroy ga pja bangkjroror ara, ga tja shäng kjwor kjĩshko ga tja opjnenoe» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿“Pja shäng kjwor” l̈aga ërë bop kong? ¿Eni l̈i kjor bo uëy l̇l̇ëme l̈oror bop kong l̈i uoropde?»
«Kjor bo l̈i twaga wal̈ë tworop bor kong l̈irë bor kong ga uorore» l̈e ba kong.
Eni ga kjakrokara wal̈ë l̈i kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye shäryoropdo?» «Tja jyãpgwaga dgurdë. E kjĩshko ga kjor bo l̈i uorore» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ dgur l̈i kong ga «L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryorop. E kjĩshko ga pja shdun pja kjl̈araso, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so l̇l̇amo tjeng l̈ira l̇l̇ëme. Pja eröe. Eeri jek l̈ëkong ga pja iër ber buk dopshik ĩ kl̈ung kjing go, ga kl̈ung sho dwëp bakoe.
Pja, wal̈ë, pjãy ber l̈öng ëng moskwo, bop tjëyo, ba tjëyo, e ber eni bakoe. Ba tjëyo, pja kä shguiya. Ga pjara omuë ba kjuktushko» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ wal̈ë l̈i kong ga «Pja chida buk döröshko ga iër ber bop kong bang ara, woyotjl̈ĩnor bäm go sorë l̈i kjinmo. Ga pja wo pjang bop l̈anma go. Ga e ber bop ichaga» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ domer l̈i kong ga «“Kjor bo kjwe uëy l̇l̇ëme” l̈oror bop kong, gueniyo tja kol̈orop l̇l̇ëm, bop boy wl̈era kol̈orop. E kjĩshko ga kl̈ung ëre äyoshtoror, ioror beno l̇l̇ëbo uëp wl̈o ga pakyo shäryëp kjang enido.
Kl̈ung, e kjing go kjl̈o sho wen ara shkö tjok, kjil̇l̇gwo shkökyo tjok bakoe. Ga pja ber shäng kjl̈o sho kjl̈oshko so uako, e uopdë.
Eshko ga pja parkë shorya go l̇l̇ëm ga pja ië l̇l̇ëme. Pja tek shäryak kl̈ung sho go, kl̈ung sho l̈i pja. Ga l̇l̇ono ga pja kworkwë jek ber kl̈ung sho iröng obishko ga pja parkë pjir äär ber eshko» l̈e.
E irgo ga wal̈ë l̈i koiara domer l̈irë Eva, e nopga uunkong mekë kjĩshko.
Shwong pjũya l̈ok wl̈o ga shwong shäryara Sbörë öng kwota go.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Era domer l̈i öötong l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú miydë, l̇l̇ëbo owa miydë, beno so shji kjoyoe. Kjor jong kjl̈ara, ba bo uoroy ga shji wol̈on l̇l̇ëme. Uara l̈ok ga ber l̈öng së ĩyado, e woydër l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
E kjĩshko ga domer l̈i shira Edén kjokyo dwayo ba boy tjok. Bäm goshko ga domer l̈i shäryara kl̈ung sho go. Shirashko ga beno shäng parkë kl̈ung sho l̈i kjing go shara.
Shira pjir ga Edén kjokyo dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong ga Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo so sjä̃gä tjok wl̈eniyo iara beno l̈öng kjl̈öbö eshko. Dröng iara pjang kjwangna l̇l̇etl̇l̇et iök wl̈eni, pjrĩya pjang l̇l̇aw ëre pogo, e beno pjang irbo l̈i dë, ëye jek äär kjor kjl̈ara, ba bo uoroy ga shji wol̈on l̇l̇ëm jong l̈ishko ga ä wl̈o.
E irgo ga Adán pono ba boy tjok, ga beno shäng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëme. E irgo ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer. Ga Eva tjl̈ẽ ga «Tja wa buk kjl̈ara domer, e twaga Jehovárë bor kong» l̈e. E kjĩshko ga koiara Caín.
E irgo ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer obi ko Abel. E pak beno öng daga. Caínda pak beno dwl̈a dgaga.
Dbar kjwara ga Caín öör ba dwl̈a dgara l̈i bo kjrë, ga söra jek, twara Jehová kong ba sënggl̈o.
Abelda, ba öng wl̈ẽp ushko so weno bäm ĩ wl̈eniyo l̈i zröra pjökde myare. Ga ba sho pjl̈ú l̈i söra jek, twara Jehová kong ba sënggl̈o bakoe. Eni ga Jehová beno wopjl̈ú Abel tjok, ba öng twara ba sënggl̈o l̈i tjok bakoe.
Gueniyo beno wopjl̈ú Caín tjok l̇l̇ëm, ba dwl̈a bo twara ba sënggl̈o l̈i tjok l̇l̇ëm bakoe. E kjĩshko ga Caín iirkono träk l̇l̇ëm, bokkwo keyeng erä.
Eni ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pja iirkë ara ega?
L̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú shäryorop kjwe ga tja ber wopjl̈ú bop tjok. Gueniyo l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryëp ĩyado ga bong kjönma ga pja ber shäng l̇l̇ëbo owa l̈i shäryë l̇l̇ëm ga äe. Bek wl̈o ga l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú l̈i shäryëp, l̇l̇ëbo owa l̈i shäryëp ame wl̈o» l̈e.
Dbar jek ga Abel mana Caíndë jëk ba tjok. Öötong l̈öng pjola ga ba l̈ëng l̈i shakza pjä, ga zrörae.
E irgo ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Bop l̈ëng Abel kwonl̇l̇o?» «Miydër l̇l̇ëme. ¿Eni l̈i tja iak shäng bor l̈ëng dagare?» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye shäryoropdo? Bop l̈ëng zrörop. Ba srëng tjeng kl̈ung kjing l̈i ĩnor. E kjĩshko ga pja shdun. Bop l̈ëng srëng kwono kl̈ung kjing go kjĩshko ga pja parkë ber shäng kl̈ung kjing ame.
<range>
Pja parkë ara kl̈ung kjing ëmdë ga l̇l̇ëye botjyë bop kong ame. Pja to shäng jëk kl̈ung kjing kjone pogo ëmdë ga pja shto woshtozl̈ong wl̈o drete» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Bor shdunggl̈o ëre ber kjang anmoyõ.
Tja kuzong. Tja parkë kl̈ung kjing ame kjĩshko ga tja to jongya shäng jëk kjok pjola, tja ber bop soshko ame. Tja to shäng tök wl̈eni. Ga tja wl̈ẽna ë pogorë ga tja zröya jekdo» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja zröga ërë ga e shdun, pja shdunor l̈i kjinmo» l̈e. Eni ga pogl̈o jyã tara, wl̈ẽngga ërë ga zröya l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Ga Caín opshino to l̈ano shäng l̈ishko dwayo ga jek öötong sök Nod kjokyo, e ber buk Edén kjokyo, dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong.
Dbar jek ga Caín pono ba boy tjok, ga beno shäng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëme. E irgo ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Enoc. E dbaryoshko ga Caín shäng u ywë kjwöböso, kjëryo shäryak ak go pjribri kjókshko. Kjok l̈i kowara Enoc, ba wa l̈i ko.
Enoc, e Irad data. Irad, e Mejuyael data. Mejuyael, e Metusael data. Metusael, e Lamec data.
Lamec, e boy do pjök, kjl̈ara ko Ada, kjl̈ara ko Zila.
Ada, e wapga domerga do pjök, kjl̈ara ko Jabal, kjl̈ara ko Jubal. Nopga to l̈öng öng daga kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë, ba u shäryak öng kwota go l̈i, shäryaga shäng bäm go l̈i Jabal. Nopga dbonmo të, nopga kjorkwang shäryak jong kjiyo tjok tëy or go wl̈eniyo l̈i të, e shäryaga bäm go l̈i Jubal.
<range>
Ga Zilara wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Tubal Caín. Nopga parkokl̈o shäryë dröng shosho obl̈ë obl̈ë go l̈i, shäryaga shäng bäm go l̈i Tubal Caín. E dor shäng kjl̈ara ko Noamá.
Pjl̈ara ga Lamec tjl̈ẽ ba boyga kong ga «L̇l̇ëye l̈ër bomi kong l̈i kuzĩ yõtso. Domer zröror kjl̈ara, tja zara kjĩshko. Dwl̈as zröror kjl̈ara bako, tja shpora kjĩshko.
Caín zröga ërë ga e shdũya Sbörë, Caín shduna l̈i kjinmo. Tjara zröga ërë ga shdũya, Caín zröga l̈i kjinmo obi» l̈e.
Dbar jek ga Adán, Eva, e wa buk kjl̈ara domer obi, ga koiara Set. Eshko ga Eva tjl̈ẽ ga «Tja kjimtara Sbörë, tja kong wa twara kjl̈ara obi. E ber shäng Abel, zröra Caíndë l̈i ãska. E kjĩshko ga koiër Set» l̈e.
E irgo ga Set, e wa buk kjl̈ara domer, ga koiara Enós. Enós dbaryo ga oba syõshtono Jehová kong kjwl̈ëe.
Nopga shäryara Sbörë so e om go kjoyoe. Shäryara domer, wal̈ë. E kjimtara, ga koiara «nopga». Ëre ba tjëyo tek beno ba irgo l̈i kjibokwoyo.
<range>
Adán, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho sak myashko (130) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer so e om go kjoyo, ga koiara Set.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak myashko (930) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Set, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho shkëngshko (105) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Enós.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak kjwara kjingsho pjökshko (912) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Enós, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak shkawshko (90) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Cainán.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho shkëngshko (905) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Cainán, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjäkshko (70) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Malalel.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak kjwarashko (910) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Malalel, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak tjer kjingsho shkëngshko (65) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Jared.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o kjwong kjingsho sak shkaw kjingsho shkëngshko (895) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Jared, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho sak tjer kjingsho pjökshko (162) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Enoc.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak tjer kjingsho pjökshko (962) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Enoc, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak tjer kjingsho shkëngshko (65) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Matusalén.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Enoc, e Sbö woydë owa l̇l̇ëm, ga jëk shäng ba tjok ĩyado. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o mya kjingsho sak tjer kjingsho shkëngshko (365) ga söra Sbörë to, ĩnaba ame.
<range>
<range>
Matusalén, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho sak kjwong kjingsho kjäkshko (187) ga wa buk kjl̈ara ko Lamec.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak tjer kjingsho shkawshko (969) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Lamec, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho sak kjwong kjingsho pjökshko (182) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Shji parkë ara kjok ëre kjing go, kjok l̈i äyoshtara Jehovárë kjĩshko. Gueniyo chida ërera shji ie ber l̈öng woshtë» l̈e. E kjĩshko ga ba wa l̈i kowara Noé.
E irgo ga wapga weno obi. Ga l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o kjäk kjingsho sak kjäk kjingsho kjäkshko (777) ga wol̈onoe.
<range>
Noé, e öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëngshko (500) ga wapga tjeng domerga dogl̈o mya, Sem, Jafet, Cam.
Nopga, e wapga shdöktong träk l̇l̇ëm kjok ëre kjing goshko. Ga wapga wal̈ëga kjong kjong wol̈ësowa. E kjĩshko ga Sbö wapga orkwosmono wal̈ëga woyde kjone dey l̈i tjok.
<range>
Eni ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ ga «Nopga, e iër ber l̈öng së ĩyado l̇l̇ëm, e wol̈on wl̈o kjĩshko. Eni ga iër ber l̈öng së l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw kjingsho sak pjök (120) eröe» l̈e.
Sbö wapga orkwosmono wal̈ëga kjok ëre so tjokshko ga wapga weno sok këskës, obl̈ë kjinmo. Ga nopga tjwl̈õ ara tek dënashko so l̈i epga.
Ĩya Jehovárë ga nopga l̈öng l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë ara anmoyõ, ga wotjl̈ĩk owa erä.
Eni ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Nopga shäryoror l̇l̇ëm kjwe dey, bangyo ara bor pjl̈úshko» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Nopga shäryoror tjeng kl̈ung kjing ëre kjër jũshko dwayo. Shäryër öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa tjok eni bakoe. Woyotjl̈ĩn ga shäryoror l̇l̇ëm kjwe dey» l̈e.
Gueniyo ga domer shäng kjl̈ara ko Noé. Jehová wopjl̈ú ba tjok.
Ëre l̇l̇ëye shäryara Noérë dö l̈i kjibokwoyo. E domer pjl̈o bek, pogo l̇l̇ëye dret Sbö bokso. L̇l̇ëye woyde Sbörë l̈i shärye eni, ga jëk shäng ba tjok ĩyado. Nopga obl̈ë obl̈ë omshäryono eni l̇l̇ëm, Noé eröe.
E wapga domerga dogl̈o mya, Sem, Jafet, Cam.
Ga ĩya Sbörë ga kl̈ung ëre kjing go l̇l̇ëbo owa ara, nopga ëngkjwë ara ëng tjok, l̇l̇gwega ërë l̇l̇ëme. Nopga l̈öng kës l̈i beno l̈öng l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë eröe.
<range>
E kjĩshko ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ Noé kong ga «Tja wotjl̈ĩk nopga pjik uunkong l̈ër. L̈öng ëngkjwë ara ëng tjok. L̈öng l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë erä. E kjĩshko ga e pjir ber dret, l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kl̈ung ëre kjing go l̈i tjok.
»Eni ga kjorkwang wl̈ẽs pjl̈ú, owa l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo, ga kjyong shäryos kjl̈ara kësbange. Kjyong bängyos pjir kjoko, ro l̈ëkong bako, di opzrëk l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Shäryos jyãgl̈o eni: kur orkwo jyãgl̈o pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o mya (300); bam orkwo jyãgl̈o pjl̈ogl̈o sak shkëng (50); jem kjomo l̈ëkong wop orkwo jyãgl̈o pjl̈ogl̈o sak mya (30).
Shäryos yongyo kjringgwo mya, kjëryo tjok tjok. U dbo kjing shäryos tuk, ba dirko shäryos ber oojong pjribri, kur orkwo jyãgl̈o kjwara. U bäng shäryos ber jong kjwara ba pogl̈o go, e opzrëkkl̈o.
»Di ichër kësbang, kjok ëre pir wl̈o. Eshko ga l̇l̇ëye l̈öng së kjok kjwang jĩkong kjing go ga e kjer drete.
Gueniyo ga tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o. Pja jem opzrëk kjyong l̈i roy, bop boy, bop wapga, bop pjl̈aydoga tjok, pjãy wol̈on l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
»Öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go kës l̈i, e jem sös pjök pjök, wl̈ënggl̈a kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, popga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, kjer l̇l̇ëm wl̈o. Woydër ga ber l̈öng së, pjãy dik.
<range>
Dl̈i tö̃s l̇l̇ërba pogo, ga jem sös bomi tjok, e bomi kong, e öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa tjeng l̈i kong bakoe» l̈e.
L̇l̇ëye l̈ara ba kong l̈i shäryara Noérë uunkong eni.
E irgo ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ Noé kong ga «No kjl̈araso wl̈ẽnor shäng pjl̈o bek bor bokso l̈i pja. E kjĩshko ga pja opzrës jem kjyong l̈i roy, bop boy, bop wapga, bop pjl̈aydoga tjok.
Öng ber pjl̈ú bor poshrëkkl̈o wl̈o obl̈ë obl̈ë, sënwa obl̈ë obl̈ë, e sös wl̈ënggl̈a dogl̈o kjäk kjäk (7), popga dogl̈o kjäk kjäk (7). L̇l̇amo sös wl̈ënggl̈a kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, popga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara. Shäryos eni, jer kjok ëre kjing go l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
<range>
Sondë kjwara go ga shunyo ichër shrë dbargwo sak pkëng (40), shkë dbae. Eshko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryoror tek dämärshko l̈öng së l̈i pjiga tjarë ber drete» l̈e.
Kuya ga l̇l̇ëye l̈ara ba kong l̈i shäryara eni.
Kjok ëre piktongshko ga Noé l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o tjer (600).
Era eni ga opzrëno jem kjyong l̈i roy, ba boy, ba wapga, ba pjl̈aydoga tjok, shtẽya dirë l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Ga öng uako wl̈eniyo, öng uako l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e öötong l̈öng ba shwoy, ga söra jem pjök pjök, wl̈ënggl̈a kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, popga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, l̈ara Sbörë ba kong sorë l̈i eni.
<range>
Öötong dbargwo kjäk (7) ga shunyo shrono, kjok ëre pir wl̈o.
Mok pjök, dbar sak kjwara kjingsho kjäk (17) dbaryo ga Noé l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o tjer (600). E dbaryo ga opzrëno jem kjyong l̈i roy, ba boy, ba wapga, ba pjl̈aydoga tjok. Öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e opzrëno jem l̈ok pjök pjök kjyong l̈i roy ba tjok bakoe. Opzrëno jem wl̈ënggl̈a kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, popga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara. L̈ara Sbörë ba kong sorë l̈i shäryara eni. E irgo ga u bäng bängzara Jehovárë beno jong tuke. E dbaryo ga dl̈ung kësbang buk kjok dorong l̈i dl̈oktong, tuktong kjone pogo. Kjok dogo ëmdë ga di börgak tjeng l̈i böptuktonge. Shunyo shrono pjang kjok ëre kjing go dbargwo sak pkëng (40), shkë dbae. Eshkoshko ga di jem poyong l̇l̇ögong l̇l̇ögong, ga kjyong l̈i beno buk di kjing wëng erä.
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Di poyono ara, öötong dl̈up l̇l̇ë l̈ok kjok ëre kjing go kjókshko l̈i jnena beno drete.
E irgo ga dl̈up l̇l̇ë jnena pjirshko ga di l̈i poyono jem, öötong wop orkwo jyãgl̈o pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho shkëng (15).
Nopga l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go kës l̈i wol̈ono eni. Öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go kës l̈i kjëtong eni bakoe.
L̇l̇ëye l̈öng së kjok ëre kjing go, tjwl̈õ shrë wl̈eniyo, e kjëtong drete.
Gueniyo Noéra beno sök së, l̈öng kjyong l̈i roshko ba tjok bakoe. Epga eröe. L̇l̇amo pjitong dret, nopga, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa bakoe.
Ga kjok ëre piktong beno eni, öötong dbargwo sak dbäw kjingsho sak shkëng (150).
Eshkoshko ga Noé woyojera Sbörë l̇l̇ëm, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, e l̈öng ba tjok kjyong roy l̈i woyojera l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Eni ga pjl̈uk ichara di kjing go kjrina. Wop sira ga di kl̈än jer iröng obi.
Dl̈ung kësbang buk kjok dorong dl̈oktong l̈i sjëktong, ga shunyo ter shrono kjok dogo dwayo ame bakoe.
Eni ga di kl̈än jer jong worae. Kjok ëre piktong beno dbargwo sak dbäw kjingsho sak shkëngshko (150) ga di kl̈äno jer dëgong.
Mok kjäk (7), dbar sak kjwara kjingsho kjäk (17) dbaryo ga kjyong l̈i dano beno buk Ararat kjokyo, dl̈up l̈ëkong.
Eshko ga di kl̈äno jer dëgong obi. Ga öötong mok sak kjwara (10), dbar kjwara dbaryo ga dl̈up l̇l̇ë kjókshko l̈i dl̈up dbo go ĩya ga wen l̈ok wẽl̈ëe.
Öötong dbargwo sak pkëng (40) obi ga Noé sökshko ga u bäng shäryara l̈i döra.
Ga sënwa shira kjwara so ëp uaga kjoyo, ga ichara dbuk pjang jek l̈ë, tek l̈ë, kjok dano l̈i koshë.
E irgo ga sënwa shira kjwara obi, e dunggwo shara, kl̈ung kjing di dano beno buk dogrore ĩk wl̈o.
Gueniyo shto wl̈ẽno opyë wl̈o ga ä, kl̈ung buk l̈i kjing go di obi kjĩshko. Eni ga shrono iröng obishko ga Noé orkwo shino kjoko, ga kjrara, iara jek ba shtoshko.
Koshara dbargwo kjäk (7) irgo ga dunggwo ichara jek kjwara obi.
Kjok ro zar kjwl̈ë ga dunggwo l̈i shrono tek pjang iröng, kjor korga tjagl̈ën söra tjeng kara ba kowo go. Miydara e go ga kl̈ung dogrotkë jeke.
Koshara dbargwo kjäk (7) obi irgo ga dunggwo ichara jek kjwara obi, ga shrono ame.
Noé l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o tjer kjingsho kjwarashko (601) ga di beno kl̈ung kjing go ame. Mok kjl̈ara, dbar kjwara dbaryo ga kjyong l̈i kjing, e kjara ga ĩya ga kl̈ung kjing l̈i beno buk dogroe.
Öötong mok pjök, dbar sak pjök kjingsho kjäk (27) dbaryo ga kl̈ung dano beno buk kjange.
Eni ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ Noé kong ga
«Pja opshis kjyong wl̈e roy dwayo, bop boy, bop wapga, bop pjl̈aydoga tjok.
Öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e tjeng bop tjok kës l̈i shis dret bako, shdär ber l̈öng kjok kjwang jĩkong wl̈o» l̈e.
Kuya ga opshino kjyong roy dwayo, ba boy, ba wapga, ba pjl̈aydoga tjok.
Öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, sënwa, e l̈öng obl̈ë obl̈ë eshko l̈i opshino tjë jĩkong bakoe.
E irgo ga Noé akkwo töno dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, ga öng zröra, sho sura e kjing go, pjono dret, Jehová poshrëkkl̈o. Ga öng uako wl̈eniyo shara obl̈ë obl̈ë kjl̈ara kjl̈ara, sënwa uako wl̈eniyo shara obl̈ë obl̈ë kjwara kjwara bakoe. Eshko ga zröra uunkong, ga sho sura Jehová kong.
Öng sho sura l̈i l̈õ beno pjl̈ú, owa l̇l̇ëm Jehová kong. Ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Nopga, e tek miteshko ga wotjl̈ĩk l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë eröe. Eni ëmdë ga kjok ëre äyoshtër nopga l̈i kjĩshko ame. Öng kës, äya kjl̈oshko so kës, e pjiror sorë ga shäryër eni ame bakoe.
»Kjok ëre pjang obishko ga dwl̈a dgozl̈ong dbaryo tjok, dwl̈a bo kjrozl̈ong dbaryo tjok, kjok kjl̈ik dbaryo tjok, kjok zengteng dbaryo tjok, shunyo dbaryo tjok, dl̈o të dbaryo tjok, dba tjok, shkë tjok bakoe» l̈e.
Eshko ga Sbö tjl̈ẽno beno pjl̈ú Noé, ba wapga kong bakoe. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Pjãy wapga wenzong ara, shdär ber l̈öng kjok kjwang jĩkong wl̈o.
Öng kës, äya kjl̈oshko so kës, e ber bomi bangkjrë ara, dete erä, kjok dirko so, kjok ëre so, dl̈ung roy so, e ber eni bakoe. E ber l̈öng ichaga pjãydë.
Dënashko ga l̇l̇ëbo dguëy kl̈ung kjing botjyë wl̈eniyo, l̇l̇amo obl̈ë obl̈ë, e tworor bomi kong uëmi wl̈o. Eeri ga l̇l̇ëbo l̈öng së, jëk l̈öng ĩ, e twër bomi kong. E ber bomi dl̈i bakoe.
Gueniyo l̇l̇ëbo l̈öng së l̈i l̈aga ba srëngdë. E kjĩshko ga sjëngna srëng tjok, e uëy l̇l̇ëme.
»Nopga shäryoror so tja kjoyoe. E kjĩshko ga ëye no zröno ga e shdungga tjarë, zröga äya kjl̈oshko sorë, zröga öng ushko sorë ëmdë ga e shdun eni bakoe. No zröga ërë ga e zröy. L̈ër jl̈õkoyo ga eni.
<range>
»Gueniyo bomi kong ga pjãy wapga wenzong ara, shdär ber l̈öng kjok kjwang jĩkong wl̈o» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga
«¡Tja kuzĩa! Tjl̈õkwo twër bomi kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o. E twër bomi tjëyo tek ber bomi irgo l̈i kong bakoe.
E twër sënwa, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, e ter söromi bomi tjok kjyong kësbang roy dwayo kës l̈i kong bakoe.
Eni ga tjl̈õkwo twër bomi kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o. Di ichër kjok ëre kjing go, nopga, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so, e pjir uunkong wl̈o ame. Di ichër, kjok kjwang jĩkong pjir wl̈o ame bakoe.
Tjl̈õkwo ëre twër bomi kong, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so uunkong kong, kjok kjwang jĩkong kong bakoe. E twër bomi kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o. Bor donku ëre iër ber pjang kjok dogo. E ber pjang tjl̈õkwo ëre jyãgl̈o.
<range>
Pjäng ichër ĩmi wen pjang kjok dogo, ga donku wen pjang ba tjrëkoshko ga
woyoshrër ga tjl̈õkwo tworor bomi kong, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so uunkong kong ga shunyo ichër tjwe e kjoyo kjok pjikkl̈o ame.
Donku wen pjang pjäng tjrëkoshko ga e ĩn, ga tjl̈õkwo tworor nopga uunkong kong, öng, äya kjl̈oshko so uunkong kong l̈i woyoshrër eshko.
Donku, e ber pjang tjl̈õkwo ëre jyãgl̈o. Ber eni» l̈e.
Noé wapga opshino kjyong kësbang roy dwayo l̈i, e Sem, Jafet, Cam. (Cam wa buk kjl̈ara ko Canaán.)
Shji l̈öng kjok kjwang jĩkong kës ëre beno l̈öng Noé wapga mya l̈i, e tjëyo.
Noé beno shäng dwl̈a dgaga. Ga kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara shärye wl̈o ga kjil̇l̇gwo eniyo l̈i dwl̈ayo dgara kjwöbö. Kjil̇l̇gwo eniyo dgaga bäm l̈i e.
Pjl̈ara ga kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara l̈i iara, ga nel̈õtkonoe. Ga shwong skwono beno buk kjwor ba u shäryak öng kwota go l̈i roshko.
Eni ga Canaán data Cam, e opzrëno jek ba data u l̈i roshko, ga wl̈ẽna, ĩna buk nel̈õ, kjwor. Eshko ga opshino jek, ga roy l̈ara ba shjiyga kong.
Eni ga Sem, Jafet, e kjinyokl̈o kjrono kara, iara l̈ok ba dbopdo, ga jëktong kokso l̈ëkong ba data buk l̈ishko, ga kjingara e go.
Noé nel̈õ jenoshko ga wol̇l̇eno. L̇l̇ëye shäryara ba wa iröng wl̈eniyorë l̈i miydarashko ga
tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Bop wa Canaán, e äyoshtër! ¡E ber shäng bop shjiyga kjwe parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo!» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ Jehová kong ga «Jehová, pja tjwl̈õ kësbange. Pja Sem Sbö. Canaán, e ber shäng ba parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo ga pjl̈úe.
Sbö, kjok twos tira l̇l̇ëm Jafet kong. Ba tjëyoga ios ber l̈öng uunkong Sem tjok. Ga Canaán ios ber shäng ba parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo bakoe» l̈e.
Kjok piktong irgo ga Noé l̈u ĩno pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o mya kjingsho sak shkëng (350).
E l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkaw kjingsho sak shkëngshko (950) ga wol̈onoe.
Sem, Jafet, Cam, e Noé wapga. Ëre ba tjëyo tek beno ba irgo l̈i kjibokwoyo. Kjok piktong irgo ga mya jĩkong l̈i wapga tjok.
Jafet, e wapga domerga ko eni: Gómer, Magog, Maday, Javán, Tubal, Mésec, Tirás.
Gómer, e wapga domerga ko eni: Asquenaz, Rifat, Togarma.
Javán, e wapga domerga ko eni: Elisá, Tarsis, Quitín, Dodanín.
Ëre Jafet tjëyo tek beno ba irgo. Ga beno to l̈öng dl̈ung kjako. Tjëyo kjrina kjrina l̈i beno l̈öng ba kjok baĩya kjing go, ba tjl̈õkwo baĩya tjok.
Cam, e wapga domerga ko eni: Cus, Misrayin, Fut, Canaán.
Cus, e wapga domerga ko eni: Seba, Javilá, Sabtá, Ragama, Sabteca. Ragama, e wapga domerga ko eni: Sabá, Dedán.
Cus, e wa buk kjl̈ara domer obi ko Nimrod. E ëngkjwaga dbo ara wl̈eniyo.
Kjimtara Jehovárë kjĩshko ga e wl̈o pjl̈úe. E kjĩshko ga oba tjl̈ẽ ga «Kjwe kjimtara Jehovárë kjĩshko ga kjwe wl̈o pjl̈ú, Nimrod ĩ dik» l̈ëba eni.
Kjok tjeng pkëng (4) ko Babel, Érec, Acad, Calné. Pkëng jĩkong, e Sinar kjokyo obl̈ë obl̈ë. Kjrina kjrina kjëryo shäryak ak go pjribri kjókshko. Kjok eshko sopga ichaga Nimroddë bäm go.
E irgo ga opshino jek shäng Asiria kjokyo l̈ëkong. Eshko ga kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë u ywara kjwöböso. Kjok kjrina kjrina kjëryo shäryak ak go pjribri kjókshko. Kjok, e ko Nínive, Rejobot Ir, Cala,
Resén. Resén, e kjokyo kësbange. E ber buk Nínive kjokyo, Cala kjokyo, e tjrëko.
Misrayin, e tjëyo tek beno ba irgo l̈i beno tjëyo kop ara. E Lud tjëyo, Anam tjëyo, Lehab tjëyo, Naftu tjëyo,
Patrus tjëyo, Caslu tjëyo, Caftor tjëyo. Filisteoga, e Caftor tjëyo obi.
Canaán, ba wa domer bäm ĩyo l̈i ko Sidón. E irgo ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer obi ko Het.
Canaán, e tjëyo tek beno ba irgo l̈i beno tjëyo kop ara. E Jebús sopga, amorreoga, gergeseoga,
heveoga, araceoga, sineoga,
Arvad sopga, zemareoga, jamatitaga. E irgo ga Canaán so tjëyoga shdöktonge.
Ba kjok, e ber buk Guerar kjokyo, Sidón kjokyo, e dwayo äär jong Gaza kjokyo go. Sodoma kjokyo, Gomorra kjokyo, Admá kjokyo, Zeboyín kjokyo, e shwo l̈ëkong äär jong Lasa kjokyo go.
Ëre Cam tjëyo tek beno ba irgo. Tjëyo kjrina kjrina l̈i beno l̈öng ba kjok baĩya kjing go, ba tjl̈õkwo baĩya tjok.
Jafet shjiy Sem, e wapga tjeng bakoe. Éber tjëyo tek beno ba irgo l̈i, e beno l̈öng Sem tjëyo.
Sem, e wapga domerga ko eni: Elam, Asur, Arfaxad, Lud, Aram.
Aram, e wapga domerga ko eni: Uz, Hul, Guéter, Mas.
Arfaxad, e wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Selaj. Selaj, e wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Éber.
Éber, e wapga domerga do pjök, kjl̈ara koiara Péleg, eshko dbaryo ga nopga shdöktong beno tjeng dboy dboy kjĩshko. Péleg, e l̈ëng ko Joctán.
Joctán, e wapga domerga ko eni: Almodad, Sélef, Jazar Mávet, Yeraj,
Hadorán, Uzal, Diclá,
Obal, Abimael, Sabá,
Ofir, Javilá, Jobab. Epga uunkong Joctán wapga.
Ba kjok, e beno buk Mesá kjokyo dwayo äär jong Sefar kjokyo go. Sefar, e ber buk dl̈up l̈ok dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong tjrëko.
Ëre Sem tjëyo tek beno ba irgo. Tjëyo kjrina kjrina l̈i beno l̈öng ba kjok baĩya kjing go, ba tjl̈õkwo baĩya tjok.
Tjëyoga uunkong ëre, e Noé wapga tjëyoga. Tjëyo kjrina kjrina tak beno l̈ok kjibokwo ëre go ba kjokëso tjok, ba kjok baĩya tjok bakoe. Kl̈ung piktong irgo ga epga shdöktong beno l̈öng kjone pogo. Eeri ga tjëyo l̈öng kjrina kjrina kjok kjwang jĩkong, e Noé wapga tjëyoga.
Dbar eshkoshko ga nopga uunkong tjl̈ẽ tjl̈õkwo kjwaraso.
Opshino jek l̈öng dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong dwayo ga jek öötong l̈öng Sinar kjokyo kjing goshko ga sdam wl̈ẽna buk kjrina, ga beno l̈öng eshko.
Pjl̈ara ga tjl̈ẽ ëng kong ga «Shji kl̈ung shosho shäryë, piy iök go ber kjang ak dik wl̈o, u shäryëy e go wl̈o, ak ãska. Sho smoy ëng go ba smokkl̈o dishäng kjoyo, gueniyo sho sĩ go, ak smokkl̈o sho ãska. E go ga kjweri shji u ywë kjwöböso, kjëryo shäryëy ak go pjribri kjókshko. Ga u shäryëy kl̈ung akyo go, e shäryëy jem äär jong kjok dogo. E go ga shji shdär l̇l̇ëm, gueniyo shji roy shdär ber kjok kjwang jĩkong. Eni ga shji ber tjwl̈õ ara» l̈e.
<range>
Gueniyo ga nopga l̈öng u ywë kjwöböso, kjëryo shäryak ak go pjribri kjókshko, ga l̈öng u shäryë kl̈ung akyo go jem jong kjok dogo l̈ëshko ga Jehová ter öör eshko ba pak l̈i ĩk.
Eshko ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Nopga kjwe tjëyo kjrinaso, tjl̈õkwo jong kjwaraso bakoe. Eni ga l̇l̇ëye shärye woydë kës l̈i, e sl̈ongga ërë l̇l̇ëme.
Shji to jer ba tjl̈õkwo kjl̈opswë, tjl̈ẽ ber l̈öng obl̈ë obl̈ë wl̈o, tjl̈ẽ ga l̇l̇ë l̈ayde ëng kong l̈i miyde l̇l̇ëm wl̈o. Shäryëy eni dey» l̈e.
Nopga iara Jehovárë beno tjeng dboy dboy kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë eni. Ga ba pak shärye l̈öng l̈i rayarae.
Kjok eshko ga tjl̈õkwo kjl̈opswara Jehovárë beno wẽl̈ë l̇l̇ëmshko ga nopga shdöktong to beno l̈öng dboy dboy kjok kjwang jĩkong. E kjĩshko ga kjok ëre kowëba Babel.
Ëre Sem tjëyo tek beno ba irgo. Kjok piktong irgo ga öötong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o pjök ga Sem, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäwshko (100) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Arfaxad.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (500) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Arfaxad, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak mya kjingsho shkëngshko (35) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Selaj.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng kjingsho mya (403) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Selaj, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak myashko (30) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Éber.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng kjingsho mya (403) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Éber, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak mya kjingsho pkëngshko (34) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Péleg.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng kjingsho sak mya (430) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Péleg, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak myashko (30) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Reú.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök kjingsho shkaw (209) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Reú, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak mya kjingsho pjökshko (32) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Serug.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök kjingsho kjäk (207) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Serug, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak myashko (30) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Najor.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök (200) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Najor, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak pjök kjingsho shkawshko (29) ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Taré.
E irgo ga l̈u ĩno sak dbäw kjingsho sak kjwara kjingsho shkaw (119) obi, ga wapga weno obi.
Taré, e l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjäkshko (70) ga wapga tjeng domerga ko Abram, Najor, Jarán.
Ëre Taré tjëyo tek beno ba irgo. Ba wapga ko Abram, Najor, Jarán. Jarán, e wa kjl̈ara ko Lot.
Jarán l̈i wol̈ono buk Caldea so kjokyo ko Ur, e weno bukshko. Wol̈onoshko ga ba data sök së obi.
Wal̈ë shäng kjl̈ara ko Saray. Abram, e orkwosmono ba tjok. Jarán, e wapga wal̈ëga ko Milca, Iscá. Najor, e orkwosmono Milca tjok.
Saray, e wapga l̇l̇ëm, e kjrong kjĩshko.
Taré wl̈o opshino Caldea so kjokyo ko Ur dwayo, jongya jong Canaán kjokyo wl̈o. Ga ba wa Abram, e söra jek Abram boy Saray tjok, ba tjër Lot tjok bakoe. Gueniyo ga öötong l̈öng Jarán kjokyo ga beno l̈öng eshko.
Kjok eshko ga Taré l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök kjingsho shkëngshko (205) ga wol̈onoe.
Pjl̈ara ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ Abram kong ga «Bop kjok, bop tjëyo, bop pjeyoga, e rayos ber uunkong, ga pja nom jek kjokyo kjone pin bop kong l̈ishko.
Eshko ga bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i, e iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëm, ber tjëyo kësbang wl̈o. Pja kjimtër, pja ber tjwl̈õ ara wl̈o. Eni ga nopga uunkong kjimtër bebi.
Ëye wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú bop kong ga tja wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú ba kong bebi. Ëye wotjl̈ĩk owa bop kong ga tja wotjl̈ĩk owa ba kong bebi bakoe. Bop kjĩshko ga tjëyoga l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go kjimtër uunkong» l̈e.
Kuya ga toe. Abram l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjäk kjingsho shkëngshko (75) ga opshino Jarán kjokyo dwayo.
Ba boy Saray, ba shtop Lot, ba l̇l̇ëbo uunkong, ba parkagaga l̈öng ba tjok, e söra jek uunkong Canaán kjokyo. Öötong l̈öng eshko ga
jëktong ara ga öötong l̈öng Moré kjokyo, kjor jong kjl̈ara kësbang l̈ishko, Siquén kjokyo ber buk soshko. Eshkoshko ga Canaán sopga l̈öng eshko obi.
Eshko ga Jehová weno shäng Abram kong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjok ëre twër ber bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i kong» l̈e. Jehová weno shäng ba kong eshko kjĩshko ga akkwo töna dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, Jehová poshrëkkl̈o.
Pjir ga jëk öötong l̈öng dl̈up shwo l̈ëkong, Betel kjokyo ber buk soshko. Eshko ga ba u shäryak öng kwota go söya jek ba tjok l̈i iara jong Betel kjokyo, Hai kjokyo, e tjrëko. Eshko ga akkwo töna dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, Jehová poshrëkkl̈o obi. Shäryara pjir ga syõshtono Jehová kong eshko.
E irgo ga jek l̈öng shtor shtor, irbo jek jong äär Néguev kjokyo shwo l̈ëkong.
Eshko ga öötong l̈öng l̈ishko ga pjl̈i shrono arae. E kjĩshko ga Abram wl̈o opshino to l̈ok ey dwayo, jongya jong Egipto kjokyo, ber l̈öng eshko dbar kjwöbö wl̈o.
Jek l̈öng ääto Egipto kjokyo ga Abram tjl̈ẽ ba boy kong ga «Miydër pjl̈ú ga pja wol̈ësowa.
Pja ĩya Egipto sopgarë ga pja bor boy l̈e, ga tja zröya l̈ok bop kjĩshko, pja ber ba kong wl̈o dani.
E kjĩshko ga tja zröya l̈ok bop kjĩshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o ga pja bor dor l̈ëp ba kong eni» l̈e.
Eni ga öötong l̈öng Egipto kjokyo ga kjok eshko sopga tjl̈ẽ ëng kong ga «Ba boy kjwe wol̈ësowa» l̈e.
Egipto so pjl̈uyo parkagaga omĩno l̈ok bakoe. Ga tjl̈ẽ ba pjl̈uyo kong ga «Wal̈ë shrono shäng kjl̈ara wol̈ësowa» l̈e, ga Saray l̈i söra l̈ok jekdo pjl̈u ushko.
Eni ga Saray kjĩshko ga Abram wl̈okjrara, dara l̈ok pjl̈úe. Sëna öng këskës chila, ga parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo twara ba kong bakoe.
Gueniyo ga Saray kjĩshko ga pjl̈u l̈i shduna Jehovárë, ba pjeyoga uunkong tjok, swl̈o ichara träk l̇l̇ëm ba ushko.
E kjĩshko ga Abram rokara pjl̈u l̈irë tek ba shwoy, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pja l̇l̇ëbo shäryono bor kong kjweni ega? ¿“Wal̈ë ëre bor boy” l̈orop bor kong l̇l̇ëm ega?
“Kjwe bor dor” l̈orop bor kong kuzong ga sirashko ga kjwe kjwe kjroror bor boy. Bop boy shäng ëre. ¡Sös bop tjok, ga pjãy nomo!» l̈e.
Eni ga ba parkagaga ichara Abram ichë jek Egipto kjokyo dwayo, ba boy, ba l̇l̇ëbo uunkong tjok.
Abram opshino to Egipto kjokyo dwayoshko ga jek öötong shäng Néguev kjokyo, ba boy, ba shtop Lot, ba l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i tjok.
Eshko ga Abram dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr ara, dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún ara, öng ara bakoe.
E irgo ga jek l̈öng shtor shtor, irbo jek jong äär Betel kjokyo shwo l̈ëkong. Dëna sök l̈ishko ga akkwo töna dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, Jehová poshrëkkl̈o. Kjok eshko, e buk Betel kjokyo, Hai kjokyo, e tjrëko. Öötong l̈öng eshko iröng obi ga syõshtono Jehová kong obi.
<range>
Eshko ga Abram shtop Lot, e öng ara, parkaga ara, ba kjokwa dik.
Ba kjok l̈öng l̈ishko ga öng ara anmoyõ kjĩshko ga ba öng dl̈i pjitënge. E kjĩshko ga ber l̈öng eshko uunkong ga äe.
Dl̈i ara l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko ga Abram öng dagaga ëngkjwë l̈ok ara Lot ĩ tjok. Eshko dbaryo ga Canaán sopga, ferezeoga, e l̈öng eshko obi.
Eni ga pjl̈ara ga Abram tjl̈ẽ Lot kong ga «Shji epenga döe. E kjĩshko ga shji iirkë ëng tjok kar kar ga äe. Bi parkagaga ëngkjwë ëng tjok ga ä bakoe.
Rokër bop kong sira ga pja opkjos ber sök dboye. Kjok ëre ĩzong. Woydëp kjone dey ga kjrozong. Pja jek mil̈ëkong ga tja jek kël̈ë. Pja jek kël̈ëkong ga tja jek mil̈ë» l̈e.
Kuya ga ĩya Jordán sdamyo kjok kjwang jĩkong. Ĩna ga Jordán diyo kjwo kar kar äär jong Zoar kjokyo go, e diyo bayo ara, so kjok shäryara Jehovárë Adán kong l̈i kjoyo, so Egipto kjokyo kjoyo bakoe. (Eshko ga Sodoma kjokyo, Gomorra kjokyo, e pjiyde Jehovárë l̇l̇ëm obi.)
Eni ga kjok kjrara Jordán sdamyo shwo l̈ëkong, ga to jek dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong, öötong sök eshko, Sodoma kjokyo ber buk soshko. (Sodoma sopga, e wotjl̈ĩk owa erä. L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryara l̈ok ara Jehová bokso.) Abramda beno sök Canaán kjokyo. Abram, Lot, e opkjono l̈ok dboy dboy eni.
<range>
<range>
Lot to irgo ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ Abram kong ga «Kjok ĩs yõtso l̇l̇aw pogo.
Pja bokkwo dbo äär kjone l̈ishko ga kjok, e twër uunkong ber bop kong, bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i kong, ber bomi kong ĩyado wl̈o.
Bop tjëyo l̈i iër shdär l̈ok träk l̇l̇ëm, shtëy ga äär l̇l̇ëm, kl̈ung pjl̈ungyo wl̈eni.
¡Eni ga pja jëkzong! Kjok ĩs kjwang jĩkong, e twër ber bop kong kjĩshko» l̈e.
E irgo ga poshäryono ga toe. Domer sök kjl̈ara ko Mamré. E kjor këskës l̈ok arae. Kjok eshko ga Hebrón kjokyo ber buk soshko. Abram wl̈o öötong l̈öng eshko ga akkwo töna Abramdë dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, Jehová poshrëkkl̈o.
Eshkoshko ga pjl̈upga dogl̈o pkëng (4), e ëngkjwono pjl̈upga dogl̈o shkëng (5) tjok. Pjl̈upga dogl̈o pkëng (4) l̈i, e Sinar so pjl̈uyo ko Amrafel, Elasar so pjl̈uyo ko Arioc, Elam so pjl̈uyo ko Quedorlaómer, Goyim so pjl̈uyo ko Tidal. Pjl̈upga dogl̈o shkëng (5) l̈i, e Sodoma so pjl̈uyo ko Bera, Gomorra so pjl̈uyo ko Birsá, Admá so pjl̈uyo ko Sinab, Zeboyín so pjl̈uyo ko Semeber, Bela so pjl̈uyo. (Bela kjokyo, e ko Zoar kjokyo bakoe.)
<range>
Eshko dbaryo ga pjl̈upga dogl̈o shkëng (5) l̈i ichaga Pjl̈u Quedorlaómer l̈irë sök l̈u sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) tjän. Gueniyo öötong l̈uyo sak kjwara kjingsho myashko (13) ga epga wotjl̈ĩno ëngkjwë ba tjok. Eni ga shkëng (5) jĩkong l̈i ëng töno l̈ok, ga ba ëngkjwagaga söra jek l̈ok Sidín sdamyo, Di Bäng Buk Kësbang Dl̈ek l̈ishko.
<range>
Öötong l̈u pjl̈ara obi ga Pjl̈u Quedorlaómer jongya jong eshko, pjl̈upga l̈öng ba shwo l̈ëkong l̈i tjok, ëngkjwë wl̈o. Jek l̈öng eshko wopro ga refaítaga zana l̈ok Astarot Carnayin kjokyo, zuzitaga zana l̈ok Jam kjokyo, emitaga zana l̈ok Save Quiriatayin kjokyo.
Horeoga zana l̈ok Seir kjokyo dl̈up shwo l̈ëkong, irpjana l̈ok äär l̈öng Parán kjokyo. E ber buk kjok dogro no l̇l̇ëmshko l̈i worbo go.
Tek iröng shrono l̈öng Enmispat kjokyo, e ko Cades kjokyo bakoe. Eshko ga Amalec tjëyoga zana l̈ok pjire. Amorreoga l̈öng Jazezón Tamar kjokyo l̈i zana l̈ok pjir bakoe.
Epga zana l̈ok pjir irgo ga jek öötong l̈öng Sidín sdamyo shara. Eshko ga pjl̈upga dogl̈o pkëng (4) l̈i ëngkjwono pjl̈upga dogl̈o shkëng (5) l̈i tjok.
<range>
Sidín sdamyo l̈ishko ga pjl̈ëbgwo l̈ok träk l̇l̇ëm, roshko di shäng sho sĩ tjeng tjunge. Eni ga Sodoma so pjl̈uyo, Gomorra so pjl̈uyo, e tök l̈e l̈okshko ga l̈ono jer l̈ok pjl̈ëbgwo l̈i roshko. Eshko ga pjl̈upga zana l̈ok pjir dogl̈o mya obi l̈i, e töktong jem l̈ok dl̈up shwo l̈ëkong.
Sodoma kjokyo, Gomorra kjokyo ga dl̈i l̇l̇ë, l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës tjwl̈õ tjok l̈i, e söra l̈ok pjl̈upga ba kjangyoga l̈irë drete.
Abram shtop Lot, e sök Sodoma kjokyo kuzong ga shara l̈ok, söra to ba l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i tjok bakoe.
Gueniyo ga no töktong kjl̈ara, ga Lot roy söra jek öötong Abram, hebreo l̈i kong. Eshkoshko ga Abram sök Mamré kjor këskës l̈ok l̈ishko. Mamré, e amorreo. E l̈ëmga tjeng do pjök, kjl̈ara ko Escol, kjl̈ara ko Aner. Pjl̈ara ga domerga dogl̈o mya l̈i tjl̈õkwo l̈ono ëng kong Abram tjok. Tjl̈ẽno ëng kong jl̈õkoyo ga «Oba ëngkjwë woydë bi tjok wl̈eni ga shji ëng wl̈ikë sharae» l̈ara eni.
Eni ga roy kura Abramdë ga ba shtop söraba toe. Eshko ga Abram ëngkjwagaga tjeng dogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o mya kjingsho sak kjwara kjingsho kjwong (318). Epga kuno jem l̈öng uunkong ba tjok. Eni ga söra jek pjl̈upga pkëng (4) l̈i irpjang, äär jong Dan tjëyoga kjokyo.
E shkëyo ga ba ëngkjwagaga l̈i shdöra beno tjeng dboy dboy, ga pjl̈upga l̈i kopjrina l̈ok pjribrie. Eshko ga popdara, irpjana l̈ok öötong l̈öng Hobá kjokyo, e Damasco kjokyo pjl̈or kal̈ëkong.
Eni ga l̇l̇ëbo kjrara, söra tjeng ba tjok l̈i döra Abramdë ba shjiryo drete. Ba shtop Lot, ba l̇l̇ëbo, ba wal̈ëga, ba nopga uunkong, e döra eni.
Quedorlaómer, pjl̈upga l̈öng ba shwo l̈ëkong l̈i, e zana pjir ga Abram bojono tek iröng obi. Öötong shäng Save sdamyo ga Sodoma so pjl̈uyo opshino jek ba wl̈okjrë irbo.
Domer shäng kjl̈ara ko Melquisedec. E Salem so pjl̈uyo. E omwl̈okjrono bakoe. E syõshtaga Sbö Tjwl̈õ Kësbangyo kong ba pjeyoga kjĩshko. Eshko ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir shira, twara Abram kong, kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara tjok.
Ga tjl̈ẽno beno pjl̈ú ba kong. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Pja kjimte Sbö Tjwl̈õ Kësbangyorë ara. E kjok uunkong shäryaga.
Pja kjimtara, bop moskwoga iara beno tjeng bop wl̈oshko, ga zanop song erä. E kjĩshko ga e poshrëy kësbang ĩyado» l̈e. Eni ga l̇l̇ëbo wl̈ẽna Abramdë kës l̈i shtara äär ba sakyo (10) go, ba sakyo (10) go, shira kjrina kjrina, ga twara beno Melquisedec kong.
E irgo ga Sodoma so pjl̈uyo tjl̈ẽ Abram kong ga «L̇l̇ëbo uunkong dörop kjwe ber tjeng bop kong ga pjl̈ú, gueniyo bor nopga kjwera twos bor kong iröng obi» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tja tjl̈ẽno Jehová kong jl̈õkoyo. E Sbö Tjwl̈õ Kësbangyo. E kjok uunkong shäryaga.
L̈oror ba kong jl̈õkoyo ga l̇l̇ëye bopoya kjrër l̇l̇ëm, trer kjwara l̇l̇ëm, drepkwota pjrikkl̈o pjl̈ara l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Eni ga l̇l̇ono ga tja l̇l̇ëbo ara wl̈eni ga twaga pjarë bor kong l̈ëp ga äe.
L̇l̇ëye woydër ber bor kong l̇l̇ëm, dl̈i uara bor nopgarë l̈i döe. Gueniyo ga domerga bor yorkaga Aner, Escol, Mamré, kjwepga wl̈e kongda l̇l̇ëbo twos kjrina kjrinae» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jehová weno shäng Abram kong yoshko wl̈eni, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Abram, l̇l̇ëye bangkjrëp l̇l̇ëme. Tja bop wl̈ikaga. L̇l̇ono ga pja iër ber tjwl̈õ ara. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye bangkjrëp l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Jehová, l̇l̇ëye shäryëp woydë l̈i shäryëp ga pjl̈úe. ¿Tja ber tjwl̈õ ara l̇l̇ëno? Miydëp pjl̈ú ga tja wapga drete. Tja kong wapga tworop l̇l̇ëme. E kjĩshko ga tja wol̈onoshko ga bor l̇l̇ëbo uunkong ber bor parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo ko Eliezer kong. E bor pjeyo l̇l̇ëm, e Damasco so» l̈e.
<range>
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Bop l̇l̇ëbo uunkong ber ba kong l̇l̇ëm, e ber bop wa domer onmo l̈i kong» l̈e.
Eshko ga Abram söra jek kjoko, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Kjok dogo ĩs yõtso. Dbala shtozong, shtëp ga pjl̈úre ĩp wl̈o. Bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i ber träk l̇l̇ëm kjweni bakoe» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈õkwo kjrara, ga mär beno shäng ba go. E kjĩshko ga iara Jehovárë beno pjl̈o bek ba bokso.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Jehová l̈i tja. Pja shiror tek Caldea so kjokyo ko Ur l̈i dwayo, kjok ëre twër ber bop kong wl̈o, kjok ëre twër ber bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i kong wl̈o bakoe» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apga Jehová, ¿kjok ëre ber bor kong jl̈õkoyo miydër sorë?»
«Öng tek sös bor kong kop eni: sögl̈a popga wapga l̇l̇ëm obi wl̈eniyo kjl̈ara, shwl̈ing ushko so popga kjl̈ara, öng wl̈ẽp ushko so wl̈ënggl̈a kjl̈ara, mya jĩkong mikbo l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o mya döe. Dunggwo tek sös kjwo pjok obl̈ë obl̈ë bako, kjwara kësbang wl̈eniyo, kjwara chirawa wl̈eniyo» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga l̇l̇ëbo rokara l̈i söra uunkong Jehová kong. E irgo ga zröra, sho shora wok, ga iara tjeng ëng gomyo. Dunggwora shora l̇l̇ëme.
Ba öng sho shora, iara tjeng l̈ishko ga l̈ä̃ tjwe l̈ok träk l̇l̇ëm ba kjing go, gueniyo shgawe Abramdë shäng eshko.
Kjok ro zar wl̈eni ga Abram sjeno, opbuno, ga pono rong anmoyõ. Buk pëshko ga ĩya yoshko go ga kjok ro beno yẽt, ga bangkjrara ara.
Eshko ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja äär tjl̈abl̈ashko, ga pja wol̈on döröshko ga pja sök wl̈ẽp ĩyado. Gueniyo ga l̈ër bop kong jl̈õkoyo ga bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i äär l̈öng kjok shto obl̈ë. Eshko ga ber l̈öng parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo, ga bokrotkëba, ga opshik ga ä, äär jong l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng (400). Gueniyo ba bokrotkagaga l̈i, e shdungga tjarë. Bop tjëyoga opshik ey dwayoshko ga l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i söya l̈ok jek ba tjok pjire.
<range>
<range>
Eeri ga amorreoga l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go, l̇l̇ëbo owa shärye l̈ok ara, gueniyo l̇l̇ëbo owa shärye l̈öng l̈i äätë ba dbo go l̇l̇ëm obi. E kjĩshko ga bop tjëyoga tjwe iröng mal̈ing l̇l̇ëme. L̈u äär pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëngshko (400) ga bop tjëyoga tjwe l̈öng kjok ëreshko iröng obi» l̈e.
Kjok ro zoktongshko ga kjok ro beno yẽt erä. Eshko ga sbi weno pjang kjwara, roshko yõ sho tur jonge. Kjor weno pjang bok kjwara dbo go iök pjë jong ri rie. Pjöyĩkong jëk l̈ok ba öng sho shora tjeng l̈i tjrëko.
Eshko ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ Abram kong ga «Tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o. Kjok ëre twër bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i kong, tek Egipto diyo dwayo äär jong Éufrates diyo kësbang l̈i go.
Eeri ga kjok ëre, e quenitaga kjokyo, Cenaz tjëyoga kjokyo, cadmoneoga kjokyo,
Het tjëyoga kjokyo, ferezeoga kjokyo, refaítaga kjokyo,
amorreoga kjokyo, Canaán so kjokyo, gergeseoga kjokyo, Jebús so kjokyo bakoe» l̈e.
Abram sök Canaán kjokyo l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwarashko (10) ga ba boy Saray wapga l̇l̇ëm obi. Gueniyo ga wal̈ë Egipto so shäng kjl̈ara ko Agar, e Saray parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo. Pjl̈ara ga Saray tjl̈ẽ ba l̈anma kong ga «Tja kuzong. Jehová kjĩshko ga tja kjrong. E kjĩshko ga rokër bop kong ga pja pë Agar tjok. Ba kjĩshko ga tja wapga tjok kjwe» l̈e. Kuya ga «Jöl̈ö» l̈e ba kong. Eni ga Agar twara Abram kong, pë ba tjok wl̈o.
<range>
<range>
Eshko ga pono ba tjok, ga beno shäng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëme. Eshko jek l̈ëkong ga ba pjl̈u Saray bangkjre ame.
Eni ga Saray tjl̈ẽ ba l̈anma kong ga «¡Bop kjĩshko ga tja bangkjre ame! Twak tjarë bop kong, bop boy wl̈o. Era wl̈oshko dörö kjĩshko ga wotjl̈ĩk ga e tjwl̈õ ara, bor kjinmo l̈e. Ëye diktong l̈i ë, pjare, de tja miydaga ber Jehovárë» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tja kuzong. Bop parkaga l̈i shäng bop wl̈oshko. L̇l̇ëye shäryëp woydë ba tjok l̈i miydaga ber pjarë» l̈e. Eshko jek l̈ëkong ga Agar bokrotke Saraydë ara. E kjĩshko ga töktong to ey dwayo.
Jëk shäng kjok dogro no l̇l̇ëmshko ga öötong woshtë sök di bäng buk kjwara l̈i zl̈ong bäng, e buk irbo jek jong äär Sur kjokyo l̈i sor go. Eni ga wl̈ẽna Jehová parkaga kjok dogo so l̈irë sök eshko.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Agar, ¿pja tek kjone dwayo? ¿Pja to kjone?» «Tja to shäng bor sogo Saray töywë» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja nom jek bop pjl̈u Saray ushko iröng obi. L̇l̇ëye l̈e bop kong l̈i kol̈ozong» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëm, shtëy ga äär l̇l̇ëme.
Pja shäng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ono ga pja wa buk kjl̈ara domer, e koiëp Ismael, pja woydë ara l̈i miyde Jehovárë pjir kjĩshko.
Bop wa, e ber shäng tjëkso l̇l̇ëm, sëgro äya kjl̈oshko so wl̈eni. E ber nopga uunkong moskwo. Ëye wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú ba kong l̇l̇ëme. E ber shäng ëngkjwë ba pjeyoga tjok ĩyado» l̈e.
Kuya ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Tja ĩna Sbörë, ga tja sök së obi» l̈e. E kjĩshko ga Jehová, e tjl̈ẽno ba tjok l̈i kowara Sbö, Bor Ĩga.
E kjĩshko ga di bäng buk Cades kjokyo, Béred kjokyo, e tjrëko l̈i kowëba Sbö Sök Ĩyado, Bor Ĩga l̈i di bäng.
E irgo ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer, ga koiara ba data Abramdë Ismael.
Eshko ga Abram l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwong kjingsho tjer (86).
Abram l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak shkaw kjingsho shkawshko (99) ga Jehová weno shäng ba kong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tja ëre Sbö, l̇l̇ëye shäryër woydë l̈i shäryër ga pjl̈úe. Tja kol̈ozong. Pja jëk pjl̈o bek bor bokso bakoe.
Tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o, ga bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëme» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga kjök tono, kjujono bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go. Eshko ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o l̈i eni: Pja ber tjëyoga ara data.
Ga eeri jek l̈ëkong ga pja ko ber Abram ame. Pja ko ber Abraham shara, pja ioror beno tjëyoga ara data kjĩshko.
Bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëme. E tjrëko pjl̈upga wen. Epga ber l̈öng tjëyoga obl̈ë obl̈ëe.
Tjl̈õkwo ëre twër bop kong, bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i kong bakoe. Tja bop Sbö ĩyado, tja ber ba Sbö ĩyado bakoe.
Pja sökshko l̈i ko Canaán. Pja kjok ëre so l̇l̇ëm, gueniyo kjok buk kës ëre twër ber bop kong ĩyado wl̈o, epga kong bakoe. Ga tja ber ba Sbö ĩyado» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ Abraham kong obi ga «Tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong l̈i shäryos eni ĩyado. Bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i omshäryë eni bakoe.
Tjl̈õkwo twër bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o l̈i ber eni: Domerga l̈öng bomi tjok kjl̈obi l̈i ber l̈öng doyo jyã tak pjire.
Eni ga bomi chimkwo dbo kwota zëmi tas, e ber tjl̈õkwo ëre kjroromi jl̈õkoyo l̈i jyãgl̈o.
Eeri jek l̈ëkong ga chidaga domerga wen tjeng bomi tjrëko kjl̈obi l̈i äär dbar kjwongshko (8) ga doyo jyã tëmi pjir eni, bomi wapga, bomi parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo l̈i wapga bakoe. Bomi parkagaga tjwl̈ẽnomi shto obl̈ë so kong l̈i doyo jyã tëmi pjir bakoe. Pjãy domerga doyo jyã të uunkong. Ba jyãgl̈o ëre ber pjang bomi sho go ĩyado, tjl̈õkwo tworor bomi kong l̈i dik.
<range>
Ëye doyo jyã të l̇l̇ëm ga ber sök bomi tjok ga äe. Eni wl̈eni ga tjl̈õkwo tworor bomi kong l̈i shäryara l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko ga ichozĩ bomi shwoy dwayo» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Bop boy kjwe ko ber Saray ame. Eeri jek l̈ëkong ga ko ber Sara shara.
L̇l̇ëbo shäryër ber pjl̈ú ba kong. Bop kong wa twër kjl̈ara domer ba tjok. Sara, e ber tjëyoga ara mekë. Ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i tjrëko pjl̈upga wen» l̈e.
Kuya ga kjök tono, kjujono bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go, ga jar jonge. Wotjl̈ĩk sök ga «¿Domer l̈uyo sak dbäw (100) ga data sorë? ¿E ga Sara l̈uyo sak shkaw (90) ga wa tjok sorë?» l̈e.
Eni ga tjl̈ẽ Sbö kong ga «Rokër bop kong ga tjl̈õkwo tworop bor kong l̈i twos Ismael kong dey» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇ëme. L̈oror bop kong ga bop boy Sara, e l̇l̇ono ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer. E koiëp Isaac. Tjl̈õkwo tworor bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o l̈i shäryër ber ba kong, ber ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i kong bakoe.
Pja syõshtë sök Ismael kjĩshko l̈i kuror, ga kjimtër bakoe. Ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëme. Ga iër ber tjëyo kësbange. E tjrëko pjl̈upga wen dogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12).
Gueniyo ga l̈u pjl̈ara go ga pjãy wa buk kjl̈ara domer ko Isaac. Tjl̈õkwo tworor bop kong, ber ĩyado wl̈o l̈i, e ber ba kong eröe» l̈e.
Sbö tjl̈ẽno ba kong pjir ga opshino to ey dwayo.
E dbaryo ga domerga l̈öng ba ushko l̈i doyo jyã tara Abrahamdë uunkong, ba wa Ismael, ba parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo weno tjeng ba ushko, ba parkagaga tjwl̈ẽna shto obl̈ë l̈i bakoe. Eshko ga Abraham l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak shkaw kjingsho shkaw (99), ba wa Ismael l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho mya (13). Domerga l̈i doyo jyã tara uunkong, l̈ara Sbörë ba kong sorë l̈i eni.
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Dbar kjwara ga Abraham sök Mamré kjor këskës l̈ok l̈ishko, ba u zl̈ong bäng. Eni ga dl̈o dl̈uw wl̈eni ga Jehová weno shäng ba kong.
Ĩya jekdo ga domerga bë l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng dogl̈o mya. Sök l̈i kojono mal̈ing ba wl̈okjrë, ga kjök tono, kjujono bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apgaga, rokër bomi kong sira ga pjãy brik mal̈ing l̇l̇ëme.
Kumi ga pjl̈ú wl̈eni ga tja di rokë bomi kong, pjãy dre shkwë e go wl̈o. Pjir ga pjãy woshtë wop tjok kjor ëre dorko.
Pjãy l̈öng töshko. Pjãy brikdë l̇l̇ëm obi ga pjãy sën, pjãy jëk ga dbo tjok wl̈o. Pjãy shrono bor ĩk kjĩshko ga tja wopjl̈úe. Bor u ëre bomipjõy bebi» l̈e. Kuya l̈ok ga «Pjl̈úe» l̈e l̈ok ba kong.
Eni ga Abraham opzrëno jek ba u roy, ga tjl̈ẽ Sara kong ga «Pjl̈ung sho kjros bayo eeje. Sho l̇l̇rus, ga suzong. ¡Shäryos mal̈inge!» l̈e.
L̈ara eni ga opshino ey dwayo, ga jek öötong shäng ba sögl̈a tjeng l̈ishko, shara kjl̈ara pjl̈ú wl̈eniyo, twara ba parkaga kong, poshäryë jekdo wl̈o.
Eni ga dl̈i l̈i poshäryara pjir ga söra, twara Abrahamdë ba kong l̈ok, ue l̈ok wl̈o. Öng nä dyo, öng nä dyo shor, e twara ba kong l̈ok bakoe. Ië l̈öng kjor dorko wopro ga e shäng ba dë.
Iono l̈ok pjir ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong ga «¿Bop boy Sara kwonl̇l̇o?» «Shäng kjweshko, kjër roy» l̈e ba kong.
Domerga dogl̈o mya l̈i, kjl̈ara, e Jehová. Tjl̈ẽ Abraham kong ga «L̈u pjl̈ara go ga pja ĩn tjwe obi. Eshko ga bop boy Sara wl̈oshko wa tjeng kjl̈ara domer tjän» l̈e. Kura Sararë kjër pjl̈or go, ba l̈anma kokso l̈ëkong. Eshko dbaryo ga Abraham tjl̈abl̈a, Sara bakoe. Ga Sara, ba dbar mokyo ĩya ame. E kjĩshko ga jar jong, ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Tja tjl̈abl̈ae. Bor l̈anma tjl̈abl̈a bakoe. ¿Tja wa tjok sorë?» l̈e. Jar shäng l̈i kuya Jehovárë ga tjl̈ẽ Abraham kong ga «¿Sara jar ega? ¿Tjl̈abl̈a kjĩshko ga wa tjok ga äe l̈ere?
<range>
<range>
<range>
¿L̇l̇ëbo kjang, shäryako l̇l̇ëm Jehová kong tjokde? L̈u pjl̈ara go ga pja ĩn tjwe obi. Eshko ga Sara wl̈oshko wa tjeng kjl̈ara domer tjän» l̈e.
Kuya Sararë ga bangkjrara ara, ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Tja jatong l̇l̇ëme» l̈e. «Miydër pjir ga pja jatong» l̈e Jehovárë ba kong.
Iono l̈ok pjir ga irbo shano to Sodoma kjokyo, ga wl̈obyara Abrahamdë irbo.
Eshko ga Jehová wotjl̈ĩk ga «Abraham ber tjëyo kësbang, dbo ara data. Tja tjl̈ẽno ba kong jl̈õkoyo ga ba kjĩshko ga tjëyo l̈öng kjrina kjrina kjok kjwang jĩkong l̈i kjimtër. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryër l̈i l̈ër ba kong dey.
<range>
E kjroror nopga uunkong tjrëko, ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i pĩya bor kol̈ë wl̈o, jëk l̈öng bëy wl̈o. Eni ga l̇l̇ëye l̈oror l̈i shäryër uunkong. Kjroror parkë shäng bor tjok e kjĩshko» l̈e.
Eni ga Jehová tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Sodoma sopga, Gomorra sopga, e roy owa. Kur ga l̇l̇ëbo shärye l̈öng owa l̈i, e kësbang anmoyõ.
E kjĩshko ga tja jongya eshko roy kuror owa l̈i jl̈õre ĩk wl̈o. Eni l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni ga miydër eshko» l̈e.
Eshko ga domerga do pjök ba pjl̈oga l̈i jer Sodoma kjokyo, gueniyo Jehová beno shäng Abraham tjok obi.
Wop tjok ga Abraham tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Nopga owa l̈i tjrëko nopga pjl̈o bek tjok wl̈eni ga pjip uunkongde?
¿Kjok eshko nopga kjwe l̈öng pjl̈o bek sak shkëng (50) wl̈eni ga pjip jek enire? ¿Zröp nopga owa l̈öng l̈i tjokde?
Nopga pjl̈o bek shdum nopga owa l̈i tjok ga äe. Nopga pjl̈o bek l̇l̇gwep nopga owa l̈i dik ga äe. Rokër bop kong sira ga shäryëp eni l̇l̇ëme. Pja nopga l̈öng kjok ëre kjing go l̈i l̇l̇gwega. Miydër ga pja kjok l̇l̇gwek beke» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Sodoma sopga wl̈ẽnor pjl̈o bek l̈öng sak shkëng (50) wl̈eni ga epga kjĩshko ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e ba kong.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Tja jnep kësbang, pja bangkjrër l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni. Pja Sbö, tja domer. Tja domer song, tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëme.
Kjwe shkëng (5) obi äär sak shkëng (50) wl̈o. ¿Shkëng (5) kjĩshko ga kjok pjip jek enire?» Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Wl̈ẽnor pjl̈o bek l̈öng sak pkëng kjingsho shkëng (45) wl̈eni ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ obi ga «Wl̈ẽp tjeng sak pkëng (40) erö dikjoyoe» l̈e. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Epga sak pkëng (40) l̈i kjĩshko ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ga «Rokër jek bop kong obi ga pja iirkë bor kong l̇l̇ëm, rokër bop kong ara l̈i kjĩshko. ¿Wl̈ẽnop tjeng sak mya (30) erö wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëp?» Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Epga sak mya (30) l̈i kjĩshko ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ obi ga «Tjl̈apga, pja bangkjrër l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni. ¿Wl̈ẽnop pjl̈o bek l̈öng sak pjök (20) erö wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëp?» Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Epga sak pjök (20) l̈i kjĩshko ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ pjl̈ara obi ga «Tjl̈apga, pja iirkë bor kong l̇l̇ëme. Kjakrokër bop kong pjir ëre döe. Pja barwër ame. ¿Wl̈ẽnop tjeng sak kjwara (10) wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëp?» Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Epga sak kjwara (10) l̈i kjĩshko ga shdun l̇l̇ëme» l̈e ba kong.
Jehová tjl̈ẽno ba kong pjir ga to ey dwayo, ga Abraham jek ba ushko iröng obi.
Kjok ro zar jekshko ga Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo so do pjök l̈i jek öötong l̈öng Sodoma kjokyo. Ga opzrëno jek kjok l̈i roshkoshko ga Lot sök eshko. Ĩya sök ga kojono ba wl̈okjrë, ga kjök tono, kjujono bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apgaga, rokër bomi kong sira ga pjãy ber l̈öng bor ushko shkër kjwara. Bor u, e bomipjõy bebi. Eshko ga pjãy dre shkwë ga pjl̈úe. Pjãy brik bong, kjok shröngto jã» l̈e. Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇ëme. Tjawa ber l̈öng kjoko dey» l̈e.
Gueniyo «Shji to ushko» l̈e ba kong kjër kjĩshko ga to jek l̈ok ba tjok ushko. Öötong l̈öng eshko ga sëna dl̈i owa l̇l̇ëm, pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir shäryak ba uukkl̈o tjok l̇l̇ëm bako, ga uara l̈ok.
L̈öng poydë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga domerga Sodoma so öötong l̈öng eshko uunkong, këskës chila, ga Lot u kopjrina l̈ok pjribrie.
Eshko ga öö l̈e l̈ok Lot kong, tjl̈ẽ ga «¿Domerga tjwe l̈öng l̈una bop ushko yẽ kwonl̇l̇o? ¡Shis borwa kong kjoko! ¡Tjawa pë woydë ba tjok!» l̈e.
Kuya Lotdë ga opshino jek kjoko, l̈an ba tjok wl̈o, ga u bäng bängzara tuk, ba kokso l̈ëkong.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «L̈ër bomi kong ga l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryëmi eni l̇l̇ëme.
Tja wapga wal̈ëga tjeng do pjök, domerga miydoydë l̇l̇ëm obi. Epga twotë bomi kong dey. L̇l̇ëye shäryëmi woydë ba tjok l̈i miydaga ber pjãydë. Gueniyo rokër bomi kong sira ga domerga l̈ëmi l̈i maga tjarë kjĩshko ga kong l̇l̇ëye owa shäryëmi l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Pja opkjos ëre dwayo! Pja na so l̇l̇ëme. Tjawa ichëp woydë kuzong ga pja kong l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryërwa, l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryërwa ba kong l̈ok l̈i kjinmo» l̈e l̈ok ba kong eni, ga jek ri ri ba kjing go, u bäng l̈i dl̈oya wl̈o.
Gueniyo ga Lot wl̈ikara domerga l̈öng ba u roshko l̈irë, shira jek u roy, ga u bäng bängzara tuke.
Eshko ga domerga l̈öng kjoko l̈i iara l̈ok uunkong beno l̈öng kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëme. Eni ga u bäng wl̈ẽya l̈ok ga drete.
Eshko ga domerga do pjök l̈i tjl̈ẽ Lot kong ga «Sodoma sopga ëre l̇l̇ëbo shäryë l̈öng owa anmoyõ, ga roy öötong Jehová sök kjok dogo l̈i kong. E kjĩshko ga tjawa ichara kjok ëre pjik. Pja opshis na dwayo, pja nom pjolae. Pja pjeyo obl̈ë na tjok ga jek sös bop tjok uunkong, bop wapga, bop kwosga, bop pjeyo obl̈ë tjeng kjok ëreshko bako, kjok ëre pjirwa kjĩshko» l̈e.
<range>
Eni ga Lot opshino jek ba kwosga ĩni rokë, tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjok ëre pjiya Jehovárë. E kjĩshko ga pjãy wl̈ẽp l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy tökzong pjolae» l̈e. Gueniyo tjl̈õkwo kjrara l̈ok l̇l̇ëme. Wotjl̈ĩk l̈ok ga «Shäng tjötoro» l̈e.
Wẽshko kjok shröngto ga Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo so l̈i tjl̈ẽ Lot kong ga «Pja kojõs mal̈ing, bop boy, bop wapga wal̈ëga do pjök, e jek sös bop tjok. L̇l̇ëm ga kjok ëre shdunwashko ga pjãy wol̈on jek kjok ëre sopga tjok» l̈e.
Gueniyo ga Lot wor kuzong ga shara l̈ok ba orkwo go, songe l̈e Jehovárë kjĩshko. Shäryara eni ba boy, ba wapga tjok bakoe. Eshko ga shira l̈ok kjok eshko dwayo, wol̈on l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Shira l̈ok pjir ga kjl̈ara tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy zronzong. Iröng ĩmi l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy sl̈an kjok ëreshko l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Pjãy tökzong dl̈up l̈ëkong, pjãy wol̈on woydë l̇l̇ëmda eni» l̈e.
Kuya Lotdë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇ëme. Tjl̈apgaga,
tja kjimtoromi ara. Pjãy pjl̈ú bor tjok. Tja shiromi kjĩshko ga tja sök së obi. Gueniyo ga tja tök dl̈up go ga äe. Kjok pjimishko ga tja doshaya irbo, ga tja wol̈on.
Ëreshko kjok buk chira kjrina soye. Tja jek äär eshko ga pjl̈úe. Tja ichozĩ jek eshko, tja ber sök së obi wl̈o. ¿Ĩmi ga chirawa jl̈õ l̇l̇ëmdo?» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga kjl̈ara tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja kuror. L̇l̇ëye rokorop bor kong l̈i shäryër eni. Kjok buk l̈ëp l̈i pjir l̇l̇ëme.
Pja jëkzong mal̈ing kjweshko. Pja äätë kjweshko l̇l̇ëm obishko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryër ga äe» l̈e. Kjok buk eshko chira l̈i, e kowaraba beno Zoar e kjĩshko.
Lot äär shäng eshko ga kjok shröng tjän.
Eshko ga akkwo ko azufre l̈ono ter iök, shrono shunyo wl̈eni, ichara Jehovárë ter kjok dogo dwayo l̈on Sodoma kjokyo, Gomorra kjokyo, e kjing go wl̈o.
Eni ga kjok eshko pjitong dret, nopga l̈öng eshko kjl̈obi l̈i wol̈ono dret, l̇l̇ëbo tjeng së eshko kës l̈i pjitong beno dret bakoe.
Lot boyda tek shäng ba irgo, ga iröng ĩya yal̈erbo ga posgono beno shäng dl̈ungna akyo.
Wẽshko kjok shröngto ga Abraham jek öötong shäng l̈ano Jehová tjok bäm go l̈ishko,
ga ĩya ga sdam kjwang jĩkong pjë jong träk l̇l̇ëm obi äär jong Sodoma kjokyo, Gomorra kjokyo bebi. Beno yõbor erä.
Lot sökshko sdamyo pjira Sbörë eni. Gueniyo Abraham woyoshrara kuzong ga Lot shira kjok pjira l̈ishko dwayo.
E irgo ga Zoar sopga bangkjrara Lotdë ara kjĩshko ga opshino jek shäng dl̈up shwo l̈ëkong, ba wapga wal̈ëga do pjök l̈i tjok, ga beno l̈öng guëng jong ööng kjwara eshko l̈i roshko.
Pjl̈ara ga ba wa këguëyo tjl̈ẽ ba l̈ëng kong ga «Bi data kjwe tjl̈abl̈ae. Kjok kjwang jĩkong ga oba orkwosmok ĩyado. Gueniyo jũshko ga domerga shji orkwosmok ba tjok wl̈o drete.
Kjweri nel̈õtkëy, shji pë ba tjok wl̈o, shji wapga shdär jek këgong wl̈o» l̈e.
E shkëyo ga kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara twara ba data kong. Nel̈õtkono ga Lot wa bäm ĩyo pono ba tjok. Gueniyo nel̈õ kjĩshko ga to miydara l̇l̇ëme.
Wẽshko ga Lot wa këguëyo tjl̈ẽ ba l̈ëng kong ga «Tja kuzong. L̈una shkëyo ga tja pono bi data tjok. Eeri shkëyo ga nel̈õtkëy jek obi, pja pë ba tjok shara wl̈o, shji wapga shdär jek këgong wl̈o» l̈e.
E shkëyo ga nel̈õtkara l̈ok jek obi, ga Lot wa mite pono ba tjok shara. Gueniyo to miydara l̇l̇ëm obi.
Eni ga Lot wapga l̈i beno l̈öng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëm, ba data l̈i ĩ.
E irgo ga ba wa këguëyo wa buk kjl̈ara domer, ga koiara Moab. E beno Moab tjëyo data.
Ga ba l̈ëng wa buk kjl̈ara domer bebi, ga koiara Ben Amí. E beno Amón tjëyo data.
E irgo ga Abraham wl̈o opshino Mamré kjokyo dwayo, to jongya jong Néguev kjokyo. Eshko ga beno l̈öng Guerar kjokyo, e buk Cades kjokyo, Sur kjokyo, e tjrëko.
Äär l̈öng eshkoshko ga ba boy Sara, e ba dor l̈e uunkong kong. E kjĩshko ga Guerar so pjl̈uyo Abimélec no ichono Sara wl̈okjrë, pë ba tjok wl̈o l̈e.
Eshko ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ Abimélec kong yoshko ga «Wal̈ë sörop kjwe orkwosmok shäng pjire. E kjĩshko ga pja wol̈on» l̈e.
Eshko ga poydë ba tjok l̇l̇ëm obi kjĩshko ga tjl̈ẽ Sbö kong ga «Tjl̈apga, ¿ëye l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryoydë l̇l̇ëm ga pja wotjl̈ĩk ba zrökde?
Abraham tjl̈ẽno bor kong ga “Wal̈ë kjwe bor dor” l̈ara. “Kjwe bor sing jl̈õe” l̈ara wal̈ë l̈irë bakoe. Eni ga tja opshäryë shäng pjl̈ú bop bokso l̈ër eni bor pjl̈úshko, l̇l̇ëye owa shäryotë l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Miydër pjl̈ú ga pja opshäryë shäng pjl̈ú bor bokso l̈ëp eni bop pjl̈úshko jl̈õe. E kjĩshko ga pja ichoror ba porwë l̇l̇ëm, l̇l̇ëbo owa l̈ër l̈i shäryëp l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Wal̈ë kjwe to twëp ba l̈anma kong iröng obi. Domer, e bor tjl̈õkwo l̈aga. E kjĩshko ga syõshtë bor kong bop kjĩshko, pja wol̈on l̇l̇ëm wl̈o. Gueniyo twëp ba kong iröng l̇l̇ëm ga l̈ër bop kong jl̈õkoyo ga pja wol̈on, bop pjeyoga uunkong wol̈on bakoe» l̈e.
Wẽshko kjok shröngto ga ba dboryagaga rokara ba shwoy, ga yoĩno sorë ga l̈ara ba kong pjire. Kuya l̈ok ga bangkjrara ara.
E irgo ga Abraham rokara Abimélecdë ba shwoy, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye shäryorop borwa kongdo? Tja jëktong bëy bop tjok. Gueniyo tja ichorop l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë, bor nopga ichorop l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë bakoe. E shäryako l̇l̇ëme.
¿“Kjwe bor dor” l̈ëp bor kongshko ga pja wotjl̈ĩk shäng l̇l̇ëro?»
«Tja wotjl̈ĩno ga kjok ëre sopga Sbö bangkjrë l̇l̇ëmdo l̈oror, ga tja zröya l̈ok bor boy kjwe kjĩshko.
Jl̈õkoyo ga kjwe bor dor, bor data wa, gueniyo bor mekë wa l̇l̇ëme. Tja orkwosmono ba tjok ga pjl̈ú e kjĩshko.
“Pja opshis bop data ushko dwayo” l̈ara Sbörë bor kongshko ga tja tjl̈ẽ bor boy kong ga “Tja kjimtëp sira. Shji äär kjone pogo ga tja bop sing l̈ëp eni” l̈ër ba kong» l̈e Abrahamdë eni.
Eshko ga ba boy Sara twara Abimélecdë ba kong iröng obi. Öng ushko so, sögl̈a, domerga parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo, wal̈ëga parkagaga tjwl̈ẽk l̈öng pjir wl̈eniyo, e twara ba kong bakoe.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjok ëre ĩzong. Woydëp ara kjone dey ga kjros, pja ber sök eshko wl̈o» l̈e.
Ga tjl̈ẽ Sara kong ga «L̇l̇ëbo tworor bop sing kong kjwe tjwl̈õ dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún kjwo sak dbäw dbäw (1,000). Tworor ba kong, pja l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryono l̇l̇ëm miydëba e go wl̈o, pja ber pjl̈ú nopga uunkong ëre bokso wl̈o, pja owa l̈aga ërë l̇l̇ëm wl̈o» l̈e.
Sara kjĩshko ga wal̈ëga l̈öng Abimélec ushko kjl̈obi l̈i shduna Jehovárë, beno l̈öng wapga ame. Gueniyo ga Abraham syõshtono Jehová kong. E kjĩshko ga Abimélec poptara Sbörë. Ba boy, ba parkaga wal̈ëga poptara bako, wapga tjok obi wl̈o.
<range>
E irgo ga l̇l̇ëbo shäryara Jehovárë pjl̈ú Sara kong, l̈ara sorë l̈i eni.
Abraham tjl̈abl̈ashko ga Sara beno shäng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëme. L̈ara Sbörë dbaryo l̈ishko ga wa buk kjl̈ara domer,
ga koiara ba datarë Isaac. Eshko ga Abraham l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw (100). Öötong dbar kjwongshko (8) ga chida doyo jyã tara, l̈ara Sbörë ba kong sorë l̈i eni.
<range>
<range>
Eshko ga Sara wotjl̈ĩk ga «Tja iara Sbörë jar. Ga tja wa tjok miydaraba ga oba jar wopjl̈ú bor tjok bebi.
¿Tja wa tjeng Abraham tjok kjl̈ara l̈aga ëro? ¡Tjl̈abl̈a ëmdë ga ĩzong! Ba tjok ga tja wa buk kjl̈ara domer» l̈e.
E irgo ga Isaac kunoe. Nä döra dbaryoshko ga dl̈i shäryara ba datarë kësbang, ba poshrëkkl̈o.
Ismael, e Egipto so Agar l̈i wa Abraham tjok. Pjl̈ara ga shäng tjör Isaac tjok. Ĩya Sararë ga
tjl̈ẽ ba l̈anma kong ga «Bi parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo l̈i ichos jek na dwayo, ba wa kjwe tjok. Pja wol̈onoshko ga bop l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës ber Isaac kong eröe. L̇l̇ëye ber bi parkaga wa kjwe kong l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Kuya ga bangyo ba kong ara, e ba wa bebi kjĩshko.
Gueniyo ga Sbö tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja woydë kjwozir l̈i kjĩshko l̇l̇ëm, bop parkaga kjĩshko l̇l̇ëm bakoe. L̇l̇ëye roke Sararë bop kong l̈i shäryos eni. Isaac tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i ber bop tjëyo jl̈õkoyo eröe.
Bop parkaga wa l̈i, e bop wa kjĩshko ga e iër ber tjëyo obl̈ë, kësbang bakoe» l̈e.
Wẽshko kjok shröngto ga dl̈i, di, e iara Abrahamdë ba bapkwo roshko, twara Agar kong, ga iara pjang ba kokso. Eshko ga «Pja nome» l̈e ba kong, ga ichara to ey dwayo, ba wa l̈i tjok. Kuya ga to jek kjok dogro no l̇l̇ëmshko kjokyo ko Berseba. Eshko ga jëktong l̇l̇aw pogo, to jongya shäng kjone miyde l̇l̇ëme.
Ba diwa söra l̈i pjitongshko ga ba wa l̈i iara beno sök tjoksa, kjor chirawa jong eshko l̈i dorko.
Ga wotjl̈ĩk ga «Bor wa kjwe wol̈on ĩn woydë l̇l̇ëme» l̈e. E kjĩshko ga opkwono, sirkeno sök pjola, ga beno sök tjoksa, ga sl̈ar träk l̇l̇ëme.
Eshko ga ba wa sl̈ar jong bebi. Kuya Sbörë ga Agar rokara Sbö parkaga kjok dogo sorë tjl̈ẽ ter kjok dogo dwayo ga «Agar, ¿pja oto? L̇l̇ëye bangkjrëp l̇l̇ëme. Bop wa kjl̈oshtono l̈i kura Sbörë.
To kjrëba jeke. Rayëp ber tjoksa ame. Ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i iër ber tjëyo kësbange» l̈e.
Di bäng shäryak jong kjwara eshko. E pina Sbörë ba kong. Eni ga jek öötong shäng eshko, ga ba di bapkwo l̈i dl̈ina, ga twara ba wa kong, ie wl̈o.
Ismael kunoshko ga beno shäng kjok dogro no l̇l̇ëmshko kjokyo ko Parán. Eshkoshko ga kjimtara Sbörë. Öötong këguë ga swl̈ë dbuk owa l̇l̇ëme. Ga orkwosmona ba mekërë wal̈ë Egipto so tjok.
<range>
Eshkoshko ga Guerar so pjl̈uyo Abimélec öör l̈an Abraham tjok. Ba ëngkjwaga kägäyo ko Ficol, e söra öör ba yorkë. Öötong l̈öng eshko ga Abimélec tjl̈ẽ Abraham kong ga «Ĩn ga l̇l̇ë pogo shäryëp ga pja kjimte Sbörë ara.
Woydër ga eeri dbaryo ga l̈os bor kong jl̈õkoyo Sbö bokso ga l̇l̇ëye owa shäryëp bor kong l̇l̇ëm, bor tjëyo tek ber bor irgo l̈i kong l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Pja na so l̇l̇ëm, gueniyo pja sök jũshkoshko ga tja wotjl̈ĩno bëy bop kong. E kjĩshko ga woydër ga shäryëp bor kong eni bako, bor pjeyoga kong eni bakoe. ¿Kuropde?»
«Jöl̈ö. L̈ër bop kong jl̈õkoyo ga shäryër bop kong eni» l̈e ba kong.
Gueniyo ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Di bäng shäryak jong kjwara botoya. Gueniyo kjrara bop parkagagarë kjĩshko ga diyo shirwa ga äe» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «E miydër eeri jã l̈iro. Shäryaga ërë miydër l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëye l̈opdë bor kong l̇l̇ëme. ¿Eni ga miydër sorë?» l̈e ba kong.
Eni ga öng ushko so, sögl̈a, e twara kjl̈öbö Abimélec kong. E dbaryo ga tjl̈ẽno ëng kong jl̈õkoyo beno eni.
E irgo ga öng wl̈ẽp ushko so popga kjara tjeng dboshko dogl̈o kjäk (7).
Ĩya Abimélecdë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Öng kjorop tjeng kjwe l̇l̇ëno wl̈o?»
«Woydër ga öng ëre kjrëp, ber bop kong wl̈o. Miydëp e go ga di bäng shäryak jong ëre botoya» l̈e ba kong.
Tjl̈ẽno ëng kong jl̈õkoyo kjĩshko ga kjok eshko kowara beno Berseba.
Tjl̈ẽno eni pjirshko ga Abimélec sano to jek iröng obi filisteo kjokyo, Ficol tjok.
Abrahamda syõshtono Jehová kong eshko Berseba kjokyo. Jehová, e ko Sbö Sök Ĩyado bakoe. Eshko ga Abraham kjor dgono kjl̈ara ko tamarisco, syõshtono eshko kjĩshko.
Ga beno sök filisteo kjokyo l̈u kop ara.
Öötong l̈u kop ara ga Abraham tjl̈ĩya woydë Sbörë, kol̈e jl̈õkoyore miyde wl̈o. Eni ga rokara, tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Abraham!» «¿L̇l̇ë?, Tjl̈apga» l̈e ba kong.
Tjl̈ẽ ga «Isaac, e bop wa kjl̈araso. E woydëp ara. Sös Moria kjokyo. Pja äär eshko ga zröp, ga sho sup, pjë dret bor poshrëkkl̈o, dl̈up jong kjone pin bop kong l̈i goshko» l̈e.
Wẽshko kjok shröngto ga kojono, öng so kwomgl̈a kjoyo dre töshko poshäryara, wl̈argl̈o iara ba kjing go. E irgo ga l̈öng zara, ber Sbö poshrëkkl̈o l̈i sho suya wl̈o. Pjir ga söra to ba wa tjok, ba parkagaga do pjök tjok bakoe. Eni ga jek kjok kjone l̈ara Sbörë ba kong l̈ishko.
Jëktong l̈ok dbargwo mya ga ĩya pjola dwayo ga kjok l̈ara l̈i ber buk wẽl̈ëe.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba parkagaga kong ga «Pjãy ber l̈öng na borwa koshë, bor öng tjok. Tja jek këgong kjwozir ëre tjok. Sbö poshrërorwa pjir ga tjawa tjwe iröng obi» l̈e.
Eshko ga ba l̈öng l̈i iara ba wa dbopdo. Sögl̈o, iök, e shara, söra jek ba tjok bakoe. Jek l̈öng irbo bäng goshko ga
Isaac tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Data!» «¿L̇l̇ë?» l̈e ba kong. Tjl̈ẽ ga «¿Shji l̈öng tjok, iök tjok, gueniyo öng ushko so l̇l̇gwokl̈ë wl̈eniyo suy wl̈o l̈i sök kjone?»
«Twe Sbörë bi kong dani» l̈e ba kong. Eshko ga jëktong l̈ok jek këgong.
Öötong l̈ok kjokyo kjone l̈ara Sbörë l̈ishko ga Abraham akkwo töno dl̈uw ëng kjing go kjókshko, ga l̈öng iara ba kjing go. Pjir ga ba wa orkwo pjrira, dre pjrira, ga poyona buk l̈öng l̈i kjing go.
Eshko ga sögl̈o kjrara ba wa zröya wl̈o l̈eshko ga
Jehová parkaga kjok dogo so l̈i tjl̈ẽ ter kjok dogo dwayo ga «¡Abraham! ¡Abraham!» «¿L̇l̇ë?, Tjl̈apga» l̈e.
Tjl̈ẽ ga «Bop wa kjwe wẽyẽ. L̇l̇ëye owa shäryëp ba kong l̇l̇ëme. Miydër ga Sbö bangkjrëp jl̈õkoyo, bop wa kjl̈araso kjwe kiyokorop bor kong l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko» l̈e ba kong.
Ĩya iröng ga öng wl̈ẽp ushko so wl̈ënggl̈a l̇l̇gwĩna sök kjl̈ara ba sjö go, kjor kowo tjrëko. Eni ga shara, zröra, sho sura, pjono dret Jehová poshrëkkl̈o, ba wa l̈i ãska.
E irgo ga kjok eshko kowara beno «L̇l̇ëbo uunkong, e twaga Jehovárë.» E kjĩshko ga eerishko ga oba tjl̈ẽ ga «Jehová dl̈upyo go ga shji l̇l̇ëye l̇l̇ëm ga twe Jehovárë bi kong» l̈ëba eni.
Eshko ga Jehová parkaga l̈i tjl̈ẽno ba kong ter kjok dogo dwayo jek obi.
Tjl̈ẽ ga «Jehová tjl̈ẽ ga “Bop wa kjl̈araso kiyokorop bor kong l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko ga l̈ër bop kong om go jl̈õkoyo ga
pja kjimtër ara. Bop tjëyo tek ber bop irgo l̈i iër ber shdär träk l̇l̇ëm, dbala l̈ok kjopkwo go wl̈eni, l̈a sho tjeng dl̈ung kjako wl̈eni bakoe. Epga ber l̈öng kjok kjone pogo ga ba moskwoga zãya song ĩyado.
Tja kol̈orop kjĩshko ga tjëyo l̈öng kjrina kjrina kjok kjwang jĩkong l̈i kjimtër bop tjëyo l̈i kjĩshko” l̈e Jehovárë bop kong» l̈e Jehová parkagarë ba kong eni.
Kura pjir ga to tek iröng obi ba wa tjok, ba parkagaga beno l̈öng l̈ishko. E irgo ga opshino to iröng Berseba kjokyo ba tjok. Ga beno sök eshko.
Öötong dbar kop ara ga roy shrono Abraham kong ga ba kjl̈ara Najor wapga tjeng ara. Wapga tjeng domerga dogl̈o kjwong (8) ba boy Milca tjok. Ba wa domer bäm ĩyo ko Uz, e irgo Buz, e irgo Quemuel. (Quemuel, e Aram data.) E irgo ga wapga tjeng domerga ko Quésed, Jazó, Pildás, Yidlaf, Betuel. (Betuel, e Rebeca data.)
<range>
<range>
<range>
Najor boy obl̈ë ba parkaga wl̈eniyo tjok kjl̈ara ko Reumá. Wapga tjeng domerga obi ba tjok ko Tébaj, Gaján, Tajás, Macá.
Kjok buk kjrina ko Quiriat Arbá. Eeri ga e ko Hebrón, e Canaán kjokyo obi. Eshko ga Sara l̈u ĩno öötong sak dbäw kjingsho sak pjök kjingsho kjäkshko (127) ga wol̈onoe. E kjĩshko ga Abraham sl̈atong, ba boy l̈i soyopora.
<range>
Pjir ga opshino eshko dwayo, ga öör jek shäng l̈an Het tjëyoga tjok. Epga kjok eshko sopga.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Tja na so l̇l̇ëme. Gueniyo rokër bomi kong sira ga tja kong kjok soynezĩ kjrina, bor boy jner ber buk eshko wl̈o» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Tjl̈apga, tjawa kuzong. Pja borwa kong ga tjwl̈õ ara, pjl̈u wa dik. Bop boy jnes borwa sak pjl̈ú, owa l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyoshko. Kjakrokëp ë pogo kong wl̈eni ga “¡Jöl̈ö!” l̈e bop kong» l̈e.
Kuya ga kojono shäng, ga kä kjujono Het tjëyoga kong.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «L̈ëmi jl̈õkoyo ga bor boy jner ber buk sak jũshko ga pjl̈ú wl̈eni ga tja kjimtëmi eni. Zojar wa Efrón kjok worbo go ga guëng jong ööng kjwara, Macpela kjokyo buk l̈ishko. Woydër ga kjakrokëmi ba kong ga soyneya bor kong. Tjwl̈õ ie kjöm ga tjwl̈ẽn ba kong eni. Eni ga kjok tjwl̈ẽnor l̈i ber buk bor kong kjok ëre kjing go» l̈e.
<range>
Efrón sök ba pjeyoga tjrëko kuzong ga Abraham dboryara, kuya nopga l̈öng eshko kës l̈irë pjl̈ú wl̈o.
Tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡L̇l̇ëme, Tjl̈apga! Guëng jong ööng l̈ëp l̈i twër ber bop kong bop sënggl̈o, kjok buk eshko l̈i tjok bakoe. Bor pjeyoga kjok ëre so ber l̈öng ba miydaga. Eni ga tworor bop kong bop sënggl̈o kjĩshko ga bop boy to jnep eshko» l̈e.
Kuya ga kä kjujono jek obi kjok eshko sopga l̈öng l̈i kong,
ga Efrón dboryara ba bokshto, tjl̈ẽ ga «Tja kuzong. Rokër bop kong sira ga dbur kjros, kjok l̈i ãska. E irgo ga bor boy jner ber buk eshko» l̈e.
Kuya Efróndë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Tja kuzong, Tjl̈apga. Kjok tjwl̈õ dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún kjwo sak dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng (400), dbur bayo eni. Gueniyo bi kong ga ëre l̇l̇ëye drete. E kjĩshko ga bop boy to jnep eshko» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Jöl̈ö» l̈e. Eni ga Het tjëyoga bokshto ga kjok l̈i tjwl̈ẽna Abrahamdë, dburyo shte l̈öng pjl̈uk jonge. Efrón kjok, e Macpela kjokyo obi, e ber buk Mamré kjokyo, dl̈o wen tëm shwo l̈ëkong. Eerishko ga Mamré kjokyo ko Hebrón, e Canaán kjokyo obi. Efrón kjok l̈i tjwl̈ẽna Abrahamdë, guëng jong ööng l̈i tjok, kjor l̈ok eshko tjok bakoe. E irgo ga ba boy Sara jnena beno buk eshko.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Eni ga guëng jong ööng soynena Het tjëyogarë Abraham kong l̈i beno ba shinmoga jnezl̈ong shtoyo.
Abraham öötong tjl̈abl̈a, ga kjimtara Jehovárë l̇l̇ë pogo go ĩyado. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryara kës l̈i beno pjl̈úe.
Pjl̈ara ga ba parkaga shäng këguë wl̈eniyo rokara. E parkë shäng ba l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i daga. Tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Woydër ga tjl̈õkwo l̈os bor kong jl̈õkoyo. Pja kä dos, orkwo ios bor kworbo kjing go, e ber ba jyãgl̈o wl̈o. Jehová, e Sbö sök kjok dogo, kjok uunkong shäryaga l̈i e. L̈os bor kong jl̈õkoyo ba ko go ga bor wa Isaac, e ichëp orkwosmok wal̈ë Canaán so tjok l̇l̇ëme.
<range>
Pja jongya bor kjokshko, bor pjeyoga l̈öng l̈ishko. Eshko ga kong boy wl̈ẽp kjl̈ara, bor pjeyoga wapga tjrëko» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Gueniyo kjogl̈o wl̈ẽnor l̈i tek woydë bor tjok l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëye shäryër? ¿Enira bop wa l̈i sör jongya bop kjok, pja to tek dënashko dwayo l̈ishkore?»
«¡L̇l̇ëme! Bor wa, e söp eshko l̇l̇ëme.
Jehová, e Sbö sök kjok dogo. Tja shira bor data uy dwayo, bor pjeyoga kjokshko dwayo bakoe. Ga tjl̈ẽno bor kong jl̈õkoyo ga kjok ëre twe ber bor kong, bor tjëyo tek ber bor irgo l̈i kong bakoe. Ba parkaga kjok dogo so iche jek bop bäm go kjl̈ara, pja kjimte kjogl̈o wl̈ẽk kjl̈ara, tek söp bor wa kong wl̈o.
Gueniyo kjogl̈o l̈i tek woydë bop tjok l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni ga pja döktong tjl̈õkwo l̈ëp shäng l̈i go. ¡Gueniyo ga bor wa jek söp eshko l̇l̇ëme!» l̈e.
Eni ga ba parkaga orkwo iono Abraham kworbo kjing go, ga l̇l̇ëye rokara l̈i l̈ara ba kong jl̈õkoyo.
E irgo ga l̇l̇ëbo wol̈ësowa anmoyõ wl̈eniyo kjrara ba kägäyo l̈i ushko dwayo, ga iara beno tjeng öng jëkkl̈o sok këskës dogl̈o sak kjwara (10) kjing go, ga söra to jek Najor kjokyo, e Aram Najarayin kjokyo obi.
Öötong shäng kjok l̈i worbo go ga ba öng l̈i iara l̈öng woshtë, di bäng shäryak jong kjwara l̈ishko. Eshko ga kjok sëng, wal̈ëga tjwe di shik eshko l̈i dl̈oyo.
Eshko ga syõshtono Jehová kong. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Jehová, pja bor kägäyo Abraham Sbö. Pja wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú bor kägäyo l̈i kong kuzong ga tja kjimtos sira, l̇l̇ëbo shäryër shäng ëre ber pjl̈ú wl̈o.
¡Ĩzong! Tja sök di bäng shäryak jong ëre zl̈ong, kjogl̈oga jũshko so tjwe di shik l̈ishko.
Rokër bop kong sira ga tja kjimtos eni. “Tja kong di shis sira, iër wl̈o” l̈ër kjogl̈o kong eni ga woydër ga kjogl̈o kjrorop bop parkaga Isaac kong l̈i tjl̈ẽ bor kong ga “Di iozong. Bop öng ëmdë ga kong di twër bakoe” l̈e. Miydër e go ga pja wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú bor kägäyo kong» l̈e.
Syõshtë sök obi wopro ga ĩya ga Rebeca tek shäng di bapkwo söya jong ba dbopdo. Rebeca, e Betuel wa. Betuel, e Najor wa, ba boy Milca tjok. Najor, e Abraham kjl̈arayo.
Rebeca, e wol̈ësowa. Shäng kjl̈araso, orkwosmoydë l̇l̇ëm obi, domer miydoydë l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Opl̈ongö jer shäng di puk. Ga di bapkwo l̈i dl̈ina ga toe l̈e.
Eshko ga parkaga l̈i jek zron jong ba irgo, doshaya wl̈o, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tja së̃s di sira, iër wl̈o» l̈e.
Kuya ga di bapkwo l̈i l̈ona töshko, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Iozong, Tjl̈apga» l̈e. Ga sëna, ga iarae.
Iara pjir ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Bop öng kjwe ëmdë ga kong di shir, twër, ie l̈ok wl̈o bakoe. Ie äär bayo kjöm ga eni» l̈e.
Jekdo eshko ga ba di l̈i tyara öng di iokl̈o buk eshko l̈i roshko, ga kjre öör pjl̈öböso, ĩna ga äär kjwõr ba öng uunkong kong guing.
E wopro ga Abraham parkaga wojeno sök ba ĩk, kjing erä. Wotjl̈ĩk sök jl̈õkoyo ga «¿Tja pak shäryë to shäng l̈i kjimtara Jehovárë beno pjl̈ú l̈ëpde?» l̈e.
Ga ba öng di iono pjir ga ne iokl̈o kjwo shõyl̈ṍr tjwl̈õ ara shira domer l̈irë kjwara, ga twara kjogl̈o l̈i kong, kong orkwo iokl̈o kjwo shõyl̈ṍr këskës tjwl̈õ ara twara ba kong kjwo pjök bako,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pja data ë? ¿Bop data ushko, shto tjokde? ¿Tjawa pë eshko ga buere?»
«Tja data Betuel. E data Najor, mekë Milca.
Borwa ushko ga shto tjok. Pjãy pë eshko ga pjl̈úe. Bop öng kjwe ië wl̈o ga tjawa kjl̈o sho tjok bakoe» l̈e ba kong eni.
Eshko ga parkaga l̈i wl̈oktong sök kjöpgwo go, ga Jehová poshrëra.
Tjl̈ẽ ga «Jehová, pja bor kägäyo Abraham Sbö. Pja tjwl̈õ kësbange. Pja wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú ba kong, ga kjimtëp ara. Tja sörop tek bek irbo bäng äär jong ba pjeyoga l̈öng l̈ishko» l̈e.
Eshko ga Rebeca jek zron jong ba mekë ushko, ga l̇l̇ëye shäryono dö l̈i rotara uunkong kong eshko.
Ba sing shäng kjl̈ara ko Labán. Ba dor l̈i ne iokl̈o, orkwo iokl̈o l̈ok l̈i ĩna, ga domer l̈i tjl̈ẽno sorë l̈i roy kura. Jekdo eshko ga jek öötong shäng di bäng shäryak jong l̈ishko, Abraham parkaga l̈i wl̈okjre wl̈o. Öötong shäng eshko ga ĩya ga domer l̈i shäng di bäng l̈i zl̈ong, ba öng tjok ga
<range>
tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy tegö. Pjãy kjimtara Jehovárë. Pjãy ber l̈öng kjoko l̇l̇ëme. U wl̈ẽnor bomi kong tjän. Bop öng kjwe shto wl̈ẽnor bakoe» l̈e.
Kuya ga jek ba tjok ushko. Öötong l̈öng eshko ga Labán tjl̈ẽ ba parkagaga kong ga «L̇l̇ëbo l̈ok öng kjing go kjwe dözĩa. Së̃zĩ bakoe. Domerga kjwe kong di tek sözĩ, dre shkwë e go wl̈o» l̈e. L̈ara sorë ga shäryara eni.
