Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pjãy pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir tjeng kjwobi?» «Tjeng kjwo kjäk (7), mã chilawa tjeng kjwöbö bakoe» l̈e l̈ok ba kong.
Eni ga nopga l̈i ichara Jesúsdë wl̈ar uunkong töshko.
Pjir ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir kjwo kjäk (7) l̈i, mã l̈i, e kjrara, ga tjl̈ẽ Sbö kong ga «Tjawa kong dl̈i tworop ëre. Tjawa ber wopjl̈ú bop tjok e kjĩshko» l̈e. E irgo ga dl̈i l̈i tora, twara ba oppinggaga kong. Ga pjl̈orgara l̈ok nopga tjeng kës l̈i kong.
Nopga uunkong iono beno l̈öng bö tjung, wopjl̈úe. E irgo ga dl̈i worbo töna ba oppinggagarë l̈ok shing roshko, beno tjeng shing kjwo kjäk (7), tjung tjunge.
Domerga iono uunkong dogl̈o sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng (4,000). Wal̈ëga, kjwozirga, e shtak l̇l̇ëme.
E irgo ga nopga briktong pjir ga Jesús opyono kjyong roshko, ga to ey dwayo, jek öötong shäng Magdala kjokyo.
Eshko ga fariseoga, saduceoga, e tek shrono l̈öng Jesús shwoy, ba tjl̈ĩk wl̈o. Tjl̈ẽ ga «L̇l̇ëbo ĩydëba l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo shäryos borwa kong kjrina, pja ichaga Sbörë jl̈õre miydërwa e go wl̈o» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Ĩmi kjok sëng ga kjok dogo srëzrë́n ga bong ga kjok pjl̈úe l̈ëmi.
Ĩmi kjok shröngto ga kjok dogo srëzrë́n, pjäng sho ara ga eeri ga kjok owa l̈ëmi. Eni ga l̇l̇ëbo wen kjok dogo, e l̇l̇ë l̈okl̈o miydëmi pjl̈úe. ¿Eni ga l̇l̇ëbo shärye Sbörë eerishko dbaryo l̈i, e l̇l̇ë l̈okl̈o miydëmi l̇l̇ëm sorëro?
Eerishko dbaryo sopga, pjãy owa. Pjãy so domer orkwosmok shäng pjir, gueniyo jëk shäng wal̈ë obl̈ë tjok kjoyoe. Woydëmi ga l̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o shäryër bomi kong, gueniyo shäryër l̇l̇ëm, Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga Jonás, e jyãgl̈o shäryotë bomi kong eröe» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jesús oppinggaga dipzono tek shrono l̈öng di bäng buk kësbang l̈i kjwo na l̈ëkong ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir söra l̈ok l̇l̇ëme.
Eshko ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy sjëk, fariseoga, saduceoga, ba pjl̈ung shosho uukkl̈o wl̈e tjok» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ëng kong ga «Shji pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir söno l̇l̇ëme. L̈e shäng bi kong eni e kjĩshko» l̈e.
Tjl̈ẽ l̈öng ëng tjok l̇l̇ë l̈i miydara Jesúsdë kuzong ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿“Shji pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir söno l̇l̇ëme” l̈ëmi ega? ¿Pjãy mär bor go jl̈õkoyo l̇l̇ëm ega?
¿Bor tjl̈õkwo l̈i l̇l̇ë l̈okl̈o miydomirë l̇l̇ëm obire? ¿Domerga sënor dogl̈o sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (5,000), pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir kjwo shkëng (5) goshko ga dl̈i beno obi tönomi shingyo kjwobi woyo bomi kong l̇l̇ëmdo?
¿Domerga sënor dogl̈o sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pkëng (4,000), pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir kjwo kjäk (7) goshko ga dl̈i beno obi tönomi shingyo kjwobi woyo bomi kong l̇l̇ëm bakoro?
¿Tja tjl̈ẽ shäng pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir kjĩshko l̇l̇ëm l̈i miydëmi l̇l̇ëm sorë? Pjãy sjëk fariseoga, saduceoga, ba pjl̈ung shosho uukkl̈o wl̈e tjok» l̈e.
Eshko ga miydara l̈ok ga Jesús shäng tjl̈ẽ l̈i, e pjl̈ung shosho uukkl̈o l̈ayde l̇l̇ëme. No pĩya fariseoga, saduceogarë l̈öng sorë, e l̈ayde shäng.
Jesús jek öötong Filipo Cesarea kjokyo ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «¿No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre, e ë l̈ëba?» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «No kjone kjone tjl̈ẽ ga pja Juan No Waga l̈i woshrokdo l̈e. Kjone kjone tjl̈ẽ ga pja Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga tek dënashko so Elías l̈i tjwayde shäng l̈e. Kjone kjone tjl̈ẽ ga pja Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga tek dënashko so Jeremías l̈i woshrokdo l̈e. Kjone kjone obi tjl̈ẽ ga pja Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga tek dënashko so kjl̈ara l̈i woshrokdo l̈e» l̈e l̈ok ba kong eni.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «E ga pjãy e, ¿tja ë l̈ëmi?» l̈e.
Kuya Simón Pedrorë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i, e pja. Pja Sbö Sök Ĩyado l̈i Wa jl̈õe» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Simón, Jonás wa, pja tjl̈ẽno l̈i l̈aga norë bop kong l̇l̇ëm, l̈aga bor Data sök kjok dogo l̈irë bop kong. E kjĩshko ga pja ber wopjl̈úe.
L̈ër bop kong ga pja kowër Pedro. Oba u ywë wl̈o ga ak kjang iëba bäm go, ber ba shakkl̈o wl̈o. Eni ga nopga tjëyo shäryër kjrina bor tjl̈õkwo kjragaga kjl̈obi l̈i go, so u kjoyo, ga ak l̈ër l̈i, e ber u l̈i shakkl̈o wl̈eni. Tjëyo l̈i zãya Ärë ga äe.
Ga pja kong dbo twër, pja ber Sbö nopga bapshiga wl̈o. Ba nopga ichëp sorë kjok ëre kjing go ga epga iche Sbörë kjok dogo eni bakoe» l̈e.
E irgo ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong obi ga «No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i, e tja l̈ëmi ë kong l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Eshko jek l̈ëkong ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «Tja jongya Jerusalén kjokyo. Eshko ga judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo, syõshtaga kägäyoga, no pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, tja shdũya l̈ok ara, ga tja zrökoba, gueniyo äär dbargwo mya ga tja woshre Sbörë iröng obi» l̈e.
Eni ga rokara Pedrorë tjoksa, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Tjl̈apga, woydër ga e wen bop kong eni l̇l̇ëme!» l̈e.
Gueniyo ga Jesús bojono Pedro shwo l̈ëkong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Ä, pja opkjos bor zl̈ong dwayo! Tja ichëp woydë dir eröe. L̇l̇ëye woyde Sbörë l̈i woyotjl̈ĩp shäng l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëye woyde norë l̈i woyotjl̈ĩpdë shäng eröe» l̈e.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «Ëye jëk woydë bor tjok jl̈õkoyo ga ber shäng bor woyotjl̈ĩk ĩyado, wotjl̈ĩk l̇l̇ëbo shäryë kjok ëre kjing goshko ame bakoe. Bor kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëba ba kong l̇l̇ë pogoshko l̈i, e zrökoba ëmdë ga e ba kong ga l̇l̇ëye l̇l̇ëme.
Ëye wotjl̈ĩk opdë om go, zrökoba bor kjĩshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o l̈e ga äär kjok dogo l̇l̇ëme. Gueniyo ëye jëk bor tjok jl̈õkoyo, e zröraba bor kjĩshko ëmdë ga era ber sök së ĩyado kjok dogo.
Ëye l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kjok ëre kjing go kës l̈i kjrara tjeng ba wl̈oy ëmdë ga e l̇l̇ëno l̇l̇ëme. Wol̈ono ga öötong kjok dogo l̇l̇ëm ga to jeno ba l̇l̇ëbo l̈i tjok.
»No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe bor Data dbo kãl̈ã goshko, bor parkagaga kjok dogo so tjok. Eshko ga no kjl̈ara kjl̈ara potjwl̈ẽn, l̇l̇ëbo shäryara dö l̈i kjĩshko.
L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjãy kjone kjone l̈öng ëreshko wol̈ontë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga tja ber no pjl̈uyo sorë l̈i ĩmi wẽl̈ëe» l̈e.
Dbargwo tjer (6) irgo ga Pedro, Santiago, Juan (e Santiago kjl̈arayo), e söra Jesúsdë jem ba tjok dboshko, dl̈up jong kjwara kjókshko l̈i go.
Eshko ga ĩna ba oppinggaga jem l̈öng ba tjok l̈irë ga Jesús kjl̈opswono, bokkwo beno kãl̈ã l̇l̇etl̇l̇et dl̈o wl̈eni, ga shwong beno pjl̈ubl̈ún shjiye.
Ĩya l̈öng wopro ga Moisés, Elías, e weno bë l̈öng l̈an Jesús tjok eshko.
Eni ga Pedro tjl̈ẽ Jesús kong ga «Tjl̈apga, tjawa l̈öng na ga pjl̈úe. Woydëp wl̈eni ga tja ukwang shäryë kjwo mya, bop kong kjwara, Moisés kong kjwara, Elías kong kjwara bakoe» l̈e.
Shäng tjl̈ẽ wopro ga pjäng sho shjiy l̈ono ter kjrina ba kjing go. Ga pjäng sho l̈i roshko dwayo ga ybö kura l̈ok, tjl̈ẽ ga «Bor wa l̈i ëre. Woydër ara. Tja wopjl̈ú ba tjok. Ba tjl̈õkwo kuzĩa» l̈e.
Kuya ba oppinggaga l̈öng l̈irë ga jek rish l̈öng töshko bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go, bangkjre l̈ok ara kjĩshko.
Gueniyo Jesús tek ba zl̈ong bäng, ga porwara, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy kojõzong. L̇l̇ëye bangkjrëmi l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Ĩya l̈ok obi ga nopga l̈öng Jesús tjok l̈i beno drete. Jesúsda beno shäng tjoksa erä.
Jer opl̈ong l̈öng dl̈up l̈i go dwayoshko ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «L̇l̇ëye ĩnomi yẽ l̈anyotkëmi ë kong l̇l̇ëm, no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre woshrara Sbörë iröng obi guing» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ga “Borwa pjl̈uyo iche l̈e Sbörë l̈i tjwe ber nopga uunkong pjl̈uyo wl̈o. Gueniyo ga Elías tjwe bäm go” l̈e. ¿L̈e l̈ok eni ega?»
«Elías tjwe bäm go jl̈õe. E tjwe l̇l̇ëbo uunkong poshäryaga.
Gueniyo l̈ër bomi kong ga e shrono öör tjän. Gueniyo ga to miydaraba l̇l̇ëme. Kong l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryaraba, woydaraba sorë l̈i eni. No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre kong l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryëba e kjoyo bakoe» l̈e ba kong.
Miydara ba oppinggaga l̈irë eni ga Juan No Waga l̈i l̈anyotkayde shäng.
Jesús, ba oppinggaga l̈i, e jer äär l̈öng iröng nopga tjeng arashko ga domer tjwe shäng Jesús zl̈ong bäng kjl̈ara, kjök tono,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apga, bor wa songe l̈ozong. L̇l̇ëbo owa tjwe ba kongshko ga jek kjl̈o dete, wopjir kjl̈ul̈u erä. Ol̈ö ga dguë iök roshko, l̇l̇ëm ga l̈on dishko.
E kjĩshko ga söror bop oppinggaga wl̈e kong, gueniyo to poptara l̈ok l̇l̇ëme» l̈ë.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga beno l̈öng l̈i kong ga «Pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa. Pjãy mär Sbö go l̇l̇ëme. ¿Tja ber shäng bomi tjok kjër äär jong l̇l̇ono, pjãy mär ba go wl̈o? Tja sjeno shäng bomi tjok tjän. Dwl̈as l̈i tek sös bor kong» l̈e.
Eshko ga Ä sëya l̈i wl̈ona, ichara to dwl̈as l̈i go dwayo, ga dwl̈as l̈i poptono jekdo beno shäng pjl̈úe.
Döni ga ba oppinggaga l̈öng tjoksa Jesús tjokshko ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong ga «¿Ä sëya l̈i to ichororwa l̇l̇ëm ega?»
«Pjãy mär Sbö go jl̈õkoyo l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko. L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjãy mär ba go sirawa kjwe ëmdë ga pjãy tjl̈ẽ dl̈up ëre kong ga “Pja opkjos jek pjola” l̈ëmi, ga opkjë jek pjolae. Eni wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëmi ga ä wl̈o l̈i drete» l̈e ba kong.
<range>
Jek tjeng uunkong Galilea kjokyoshko ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre twëba ber tjeng nopga wl̈oshko,
ga tja zröya l̈ok. Gueniyo äär dbargwo mya ga tja woshre Sbörë iröng obi» l̈e. Kuya l̈ok ga woydë l̈ok ara.
Jesús, ba oppinggaga, e öötong l̈öng Capernaúm kjokyoshko ga kä potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o dburyo l̈i töngga Sbö u kong l̈öng eshko l̈i tjl̈ẽ Pedro kong ga «¿Bop pingga kjwe kä potjwl̈ẽk l̇l̇ëmdo?»
«Ëng, potjwl̈ẽya» l̈e ba kong. Döni ga Pedro opzrëno jek u roshko. Ga l̇l̇ëye l̈ayde Pedrorë ba kong l̇l̇ëm obishko ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿“Pjãy kä potjwl̈ẽk bor kong” l̈e pjl̈upgarë ë kong? ¿Ba wapga kongde, de oba obl̈ë kong?»
«Oba obl̈ë kong eröe» l̈e ba kong. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Eni ga ba nopga baĩyara kä potjwl̈ẽk l̇l̇ëme.
Gueniyo ëye barwëy l̇l̇ëm wl̈o ga pja nom diga, sö dbup jer dishko. Eshko ga mã ship kjl̈ara bäm go l̈i kjak roshko dburwa buk kjwara. Ship, söp, twëp dbur töngga l̈i kong, bi kä potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o wl̈o» l̈e.
Eshko ga Jesús oppinggaga tek shrono l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko ga tjawa l̈öng ëre tjrëko, tjwl̈õ kësbangyo l̈i kjone dey?» l̈e.
Kuya ga kjwozirwa rokara kjl̈ara, iara shäng ba tjrëko,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjãy opkjl̈opswë ber kjwozirwa jũni l̇l̇ëm ga pjãy äär ber l̈öng Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko l̇l̇ëme.
Ëye opkjl̈opswë ber wotöy, kjwozirwa jũni ga tjwl̈õ kësbangyo Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko l̈i e.
Ga ëye, kjwozirwa jũni wl̈okjrara bor kjĩshko ga tja wl̈okjrara wl̈eni.
»Ëye, kjwozirwa mär bor go jũni ichara l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë ga e song jl̈õe. Shäryayde l̇l̇ëm obishko ga shakko, apkwo kësbang pjrikko ba bëngshko, ga dbukko jer dl̈ung dorong dey.
L̇l̇ëbo tjeng ara kjok kjwang jĩkong no ichë l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë wl̈eni. L̇l̇ëbo wen eni ĩyado. Gueniyo ëye no ichë l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë ga e song jl̈õe.
»E kjĩshko ga bomi orkwo, bomi dre, pjãy iche l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë wl̈eni ga zëmi tas, dbumi pjolae. Pjãy opzrëk jek äär Sbö sökshko dre kjwara l̇l̇ëm, orkwo kjwara l̇l̇ëm dey ga pjl̈ú, pjãy pjë bomi orkwo pjök l̈i tjok, bomi dre pjök l̈i tjok, iök pjë jong ri ri sjer l̇l̇ëm shtoyo l̈i roshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Bomi bokkwo, pjãy iche l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë wl̈eni ga shimi pjus, ga dbumi pjolae. Pjãy opzrëk jek äär Sbö sökshko bokkwo kjwara l̇l̇ëm dey ga pjl̈ú, pjãy pjë bomi bokkwo pjök l̈i tjok, iök pjë jong ri ri sjer l̇l̇ëm shtoyo l̈i roshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
»Kjwozirga kjwe tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëme l̈ëmi l̇l̇ëme. L̈ër bomi kong ga Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo so l̈öng bor Data bokkwo ĩk kjok dogo ĩyado l̈i, e kjwozirga kjwe daga.
<range>
»¿L̇l̇ë l̈ëmi? Domer shäng kjl̈ara, e öng wl̈ẽp ushko so tjeng dogl̈o sak dbäw (100). ¿Kjl̈ara jeno wl̈eni ga l̇l̇amo sak shkaw kjingsho shkaw (99) l̈i ie ber tjeng dl̈upshko, ga to jeno sök l̈i wl̈ẽk l̇l̇ëmdo?
Wl̈ẽnashko ga l̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga öng dogl̈o sak shkaw kjingsho shkaw (99) jeno l̇l̇ëm l̈i woyotjl̈ĩya ara l̇l̇ëme. E ber sök wopjl̈ú kjl̈ara jeno, wl̈ẽna l̈i kjĩshko.
Eni ga woyde bomi Data sök kjok dogo l̈irë ga kjwozirga kjwe jer kjl̈ara l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
»Bop kjl̈ara opshäryono owa bop kong ga pja l̈an ba tjok tjoksa, l̇l̇ëye owa shäryara l̈i jl̈õe l̈e wl̈o. Jl̈õ l̈ara ga pjãy beno l̈öng wopjl̈ú ëng tjok.
Jl̈õ l̈e l̇l̇ëm ga obl̈ë rokëp jek bop tjok kjl̈ara pjök, l̇l̇ëye l̈anyotkëp l̈i, e jl̈õe l̈e l̈ok wl̈o, Sbö tjl̈õkwo tjl̈ẽ ga “Shji obl̈ë rotëshko ga nopga söy pjök mya, e jl̈õe l̈e l̈ok wl̈o” kjĩshko.
Jl̈õ l̈e l̇l̇ëm obi ga pja nom syõ uyo, ga l̈ëp bor tjl̈õkwo kjragaga l̈öng l̈i kong. L̈ano l̈ok ba tjok pjir ga jl̈õ l̈e l̇l̇ëm obi ga iëp ber shäng nopga Sbö miydë l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo dik, dbur töngga Roma so kong dik bakoe.
»L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga no l̇l̇gwemi sorë kjok ëre kjing go ga l̇l̇gweya Sbörë kjok dogo eni bakoe.
L̈ër bomi kong obi ga bor tjl̈õkwo kjragaga tön l̈öng bor ko goshko ga tja shäng ba tjok eshko, epga pjökde myare dö gueniyo. E kjĩshko ga l̈ër bomi kong ga pjãy tön wotjl̈ĩk kjrinaso kjok ëre kjing go, pjãy l̈öng do pjökde dö ëmdë ga l̇l̇ëbo rokëmi syõ go ga twe bor Data sök kjok dogo l̈irë bomi kong» l̈e.
<range>
Eni ga Pedro shrono shäng Jesús zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apga, ¿bor kjl̈ara l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryono bor kong l̈i iër ber tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëm pjl̈obi ga pjl̈ú? ¿Shäryër eni pjl̈ogl̈o kjäk (7) ga pjl̈úre?»
«Pjl̈ogl̈o kjäk (7) l̈ër bop kong l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryara bop kjl̈ararë bop kong l̈i iëp ber tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëm pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjäk kjingsho kjäk (77).
»Eni ga Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë, e so l̇l̇ëbo l̈ër bomi kong ëre kjoyoe. Pjl̈u sök kjl̈ara. Pjl̈ara ga ba parkagaga rokara, pogo tjwl̈õ ba kong kjöme l̈e l̈ok ba kong wl̈o.
Shärye shäng kjwl̈ëshko ga ba parkaga söraba ba shwoy kjl̈ara, pogo tjwl̈õ ba kong ara, domerga dogl̈o sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwara (10,000) parkë l̈u pjl̈ogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho shkëng (15) ãska wl̈eni.
Tjwl̈ẽya ba parkaga l̈irë l̇l̇ë go l̇l̇ëm kuzong ga pjl̈u tjl̈ẽ ga “Kjwe soynezĩ jek ba boy, ba wapga, ba l̇l̇ëbo baĩya uunkong tjok, ber l̈öng parkë obl̈ë kong, pogo tjwl̈õ l̈i tjwl̈ẽya bor kong e go wl̈o” l̈e.
»Kuya ba parkaga l̈irë ga kjök tono, tjl̈ẽ ba kong dbo go ga “Tja songe l̈ozong. Tja koshos sira ga tjwl̈ẽn bop kong uunkong” l̈e.
Ĩya pjl̈urë ga songe l̈e, ga tjwl̈õ shira ba kong ame, döra beno shäng oojong shara.
»E irgo ga ba parkaga l̈i opshino ey dwayo, ga ba parkaga wl̈ẽna kjl̈ara obi bë shäng eshko, pogo tjwl̈õ ba kong sira döe, domer parkë dbargwo sak dbäw (100) ãska wl̈eni. Eni ga shakza pjä ba bëngso go, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “¡Pja pogo tjwl̈õ bor kong l̈i tjwl̈ẽs bor kong jekdo, eeri eröe!” l̈e.
»Kuya ba parkaga l̈irë ga kjök tono, tjl̈ẽ ba kong dbo go ga “Tja songe l̈ozong. Tja koshos sira ga tjwl̈ẽn bop kong uunkong” l̈e.
Gueniyo ga songe l̈e l̇l̇ëme. Shduna, iara beno shäng no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko pogo tjwl̈õ l̈i tjwl̈ẽna ba kong pjir guing.
»Ĩya pjl̈ú parkagaga obl̈ërë ga beno ba kong owa, woydë l̈ok ara. Ga l̇l̇ëye ĩna l̈ok l̈i roy l̈ara pjl̈u kong.
Eni ga ba parkaga l̈i rokara pjl̈urë, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pja parkaga owa. Pja pogo tjwl̈õ bor kong ara ëmdë ga tjwl̈õ shiror bop kong l̇l̇ëme. Pja kjl̈oshtono bor kong ga pja songe l̈oror.
¿Eni ga bop kjl̈ara, e songe l̈orop botoya dik l̇l̇ëm ega?” l̈e.
Eni ga pjl̈u iirkono ara ba kong, ga ba nopga iara beno tjeng no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko, pogo tjwl̈õ kjöme l̈i tjwl̈ẽna ba kong pjir guing.
»L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryara bomi kjl̈ararë bomi kong l̈i iëmi ber tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni l̇l̇ëm ga bor Data sök kjok dogo l̈i omshäryë bomi tjok eni bakoe» l̈e ba kong.
Jesús tjl̈ẽno pjir ga to Galilea kjokyo dwayo, jek öötong shäng Judea kjokyo, Jordán diyo kjwo kal̈ëkong.
Nopga to jek ara ba tjok, ga swl̈opga poptara uunkong.
Eshko ga fariseoga kjone kjone tek shrono l̈öng Jesús zl̈ong bäng, ba tjl̈ĩk wl̈o. Tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Domer ba boy rayë l̇l̇ë pogo kjĩshko ga pjl̈úre?»
«Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang eni: “Dämärshko ga nopga shäryara Sbörë domer, wal̈ë.” ¿E l̈omirë l̇l̇ëmdo?
E kjĩshko ga domer ba data, ba mekë rayë, ga orkwosmok wal̈ë tjok, ga ber l̈öng kjl̈araso wl̈eni.
Eni ga ber pjök ame, ber kjl̈araso shara. Töna Sbörë ga e döy l̇l̇ëme» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya fariseogarë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Domerga ba boy rayë wl̈o ga ichara Moisésdë kjibokwo ëng rayokl̈o twe ba boy kong kjwara, ga iche jek ba ushko dwayo. ¿L̈ara eni ega?»
«L̇l̇ëye kumi woydë l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko. Pjãy ichara Moisésdë ëng rayë eni e kjĩshko. Gueniyo ga tek dämärshko ga e eni l̇l̇ëme.
L̈ër bomi kong ga ba boy pono domer obl̈ë tjok l̇l̇ëm ga raye ga äe. L̇l̇ëm ga shäryara eni, ga orkwosmono obl̈ë tjok wl̈eni ga l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryayde, e pono oma boy obl̈ë tjok wl̈eni» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ba oppinggagarë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Eni kuzong ga ëye orkwosmok l̇l̇ëm dey» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈õkwo ëre kjraga uunkongdë l̇l̇ëme. Ëye kjimte Sbörë ga era omkjrë.
Domerga kjone kjone orkwosmok l̇l̇ëm, weno beno pë wal̈ë tjok ga ä kjĩshko. Kjone kjone orkwosmok l̇l̇ëm, shäryaga norë beno l̈öng eni kjĩshko. Kjone kjone orkwosmok l̇l̇ëm, parkë Sbö, ba pjl̈uyo l̈i kong ga pjl̈ú wl̈o. Ëre l̇l̇ë l̈okl̈o, ëye ommiydë woydë ga miyde ga pjl̈úe» l̈e.
Pjl̈ara ga kjwozirga sökoba Jesús kong, Jesús orkwo ië ba kjing go wl̈o, syõshtë Sbö kong ba kjĩshko wl̈o bakoe. Eni ga kjwozirga sögaga l̈i wl̈õya Jesús oppinggagarë l̈öng.
Eni ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «Kjwozirga somi l̇l̇ëm, tek wẽyẽ bor shwoy. Ëye ber kjwozirga jũni ga Sbö ber ba pjl̈uyo» l̈e.
E irgo ga orkwo iono kjwozirga l̈i kjing go. E irgo ga epga to ey dwayo.
Pjl̈ara ga domer mite tek shrono shäng Jesús zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apga no pingga, ¿l̇l̇ëye pjl̈ú shäryër, tja ber sök së ĩyado Sbö tjok wl̈o?»
«¿L̇l̇ëye pjl̈ú kjakrokëp bor kong l̈i l̇l̇ëro? Pjl̈ú l̈i, e Sbö eröe. Pja ber sök së ĩyado Sbö tjok wl̈o ga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i kol̈ozong» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Kjone dey?» «Shji no zrök l̇l̇ëme. Shji pë oma boy obl̈ë tjok l̇l̇ëme. Shji l̈ũrkë l̇l̇ëme. Shji obl̈ë jyõyotkë l̇l̇ëme.
Bop data, bop mekë, e bangkjros, ios ber tjwl̈õ ara, ga pja opwoydë sorë ga bop kjl̈ara, e woydos eni bakoe» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈õkwo l̈ëp shäng kës l̈i shäryër shäng eni tjän. ¿L̇l̇ëye shäryër obi?»
«Pja ber pjl̈o bek woydë ga pja nom bop l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i soynek pjir, ga dburyo twos oba song wl̈eniyo kong. Enira pja l̇l̇ëbo ara kjok dogo. Pjir ga pja tek bor tjok, pja pin wl̈o» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga beno shäng woydë ara, ga to ey dwayo, dbur ara kjĩshko.
E irgo ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga nopga dbur ara wl̈eniyo äär ber l̈öng Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko wl̈o ga kjange.
L̈ër bomi kong jek obi ga öng jëkkl̈o sok kësbang wl̈eniyo opzrëk jek shkö bokkwo bäng go ga kjange. Gueniyo nopga dbur ara wl̈eniyo äär ber l̈öng Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko wl̈o ga kjang anmoyõ» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga beno l̈öng yëy l̈e erä. Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Enira ëye därdo?» l̈e.
Kuya ga ĩya drëng, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Nopga kong ga shärye ga äe. Gueniyo l̇l̇ëye shärye Sbörë ga ä wl̈o drete» l̈e.
Eshko ga Pedro tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Borwa l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës l̈i rayororwa beno pjir, tjawa jek bop tjok wl̈o. ¿L̇l̇ëye wl̈ẽnwa e kjĩshko?» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga kjok tjagl̈ënshko ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre sirkek äär sök bor pjl̈u sökkl̈o kãl̈ã l̇l̇etl̇l̇et l̈i kjing goshko. Eshko ga pjãy sirkek äär ber l̈öng sökkl̈o tjeng sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) kjing go eni bako, Israel tjëyoga kjringgwo sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) l̈i l̇l̇gwek wl̈o.
Ga ëye, ba u, ba kjl̈ara, ba data, ba mekë, ba wapga, ba kjok, e rayara bor kjĩshko ga ãska wl̈ẽya l̇l̇ëye rayara l̈i pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw (100) obi. Ga ber l̈öng së ĩyado Sbö tjok bakoe.
Gueniyo eerishko ga nopga tjwl̈õ ara wl̈eniyo l̈öng ara l̈i, e ber l̈öng tjwl̈õ chira eshko. Ga eerishko nopga tjwl̈õ chira l̈öng ara l̈i, e ber l̈öng tjwl̈õ ara eshko» l̈e.
Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga «Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë, e so l̇l̇ëbo l̈ër bomi kong ëre kjoyoe. Domer shäng kjl̈ara kjil̇l̇gwo bo ara kjokyo sogo. Pjl̈ara ga opshino jek kjok shröngteng, nopga wl̈ẽk parkë ba kong wl̈o.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽno parkagaga l̈i kong ga potjwl̈ẽya dbar kjwara ãska l̈ara, ga ichara jek parkë ba kjok buk l̈ishko.
»Dl̈o wenzong ga opshino jek obi, ga nopga wl̈ẽna l̈öng kjl̈öbö pak dret, l̇l̇ëbo soynezl̈ong.
Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pjãy nom parkë bor kjokshko, ga pjãy potjwl̈ẽn bëye” l̈e.
Eni ga to jek l̈ok parkë ba kong. »Dl̈o dl̈uw ga shäryara eni jek obi. Dl̈o pjö l̈ë wl̈eni ga jek shäryara obi.
»Dl̈o töy wl̈eni ga opshino jek obi, ga nopga wl̈ẽna l̈öng kjl̈öbö pak drete. Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “¿Pjãy dbo ga l̈öng parkë l̇l̇ëm ega?”
»“Tjawa parkë ë tjok l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko” l̈e l̈ok ba kong. »Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pjãy nom parkë bor kjokshko” l̈e.
»Öötong kjok shkë ga kjok sogo l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba parkaga kägäyo kong ga “Parkagaga to rokëp, ga potjwl̈ẽma. Shrono parkë iröng l̈i potjwl̈ẽp bäm go, shrono parkë bäm go l̈i potjwl̈ẽp ber iröng” l̈e
Eshko ga parkagaga shrono dl̈o töy l̈i potjwl̈ẽna dbar kjwara ãska.
»Roy kuya parkagaga shrono bäm go l̈irë ga wotjl̈ĩk ga potjwl̈ẽya l̈ok iröng l̈i kjinmo l̈e. Gueniyo potjwl̈ẽna dbar kjwara ãska bakoe.
Potjwl̈ẽna l̈ok pjirshko ga kjok sogo l̈i l̈ãywe l̈ok owa ëng kong,
tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ga “¿Nopga tjwe l̈öng iröng kjwe parkono wop tjok erä, ga potjwl̈ẽna borwa tjok bëy ega? ¡Tjawa song parkono dl̈o roshko dboe!” l̈e l̈ok ëng kong eni.
»Eni ga kjok sogo l̈i tjl̈ẽ parkaga kjl̈ara kong ga “Tja shäng l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryë bop kong l̇l̇ëme. Pja potjwl̈ẽn eni l̈oror bop kong, ga jöl̈ö l̈orop bor kong.
Bop dburwa kjros, ga pja nom na dwayo. Parkagaga tjwe l̈öng iröng l̈i potjwl̈ẽn woydë bopoya dik bako ga
miydaga ber tjarë, dbur l̈i botoya kjĩshko. ¿Pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bor kong, tja no sëng ä kjĩshkore?” l̈e.
»Eni ga tjwl̈õ ara eerishko l̈i, e ber l̈öng tjwl̈õ chira eshko, e ga eerishko tjwl̈õ chira l̈i, e ber l̈öng tjwl̈õ ara eshko» l̈e.
Jesús jek shäng Jerusalén kjokyoshko ga ba oppinggaga dogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) l̈i rokara dboshko, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Shji to Jerusalén kjokyo. Eshko ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre twëba ber tjeng syõshtaga kägäyoga wl̈oshko, no pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go wl̈oshko bakoe. Eshko ga tja iche l̈ok, zrökoba wl̈o,
ga tja twe l̈ok nopga judío l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kong. Eshko ga tja joywe l̈ok, tja shpoya l̈ok no shpokkl̈o go, ga tja zröya l̈ok pjang kjl̈ös go. Gueniyo äär dbargwo mya ga tja woshre Sbörë iröng obi» l̈e.
Eshko ga Zebedeo wapga ko Santiago, Juan, e mekë tek shrono l̈öng Jesús zl̈ong bäng ga kjök tono, tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇ëbo shäryëp bor kong sira» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye woydëp?» «Pja ber sök no pjl̈uyoshko ga bor wapga do pjök ëre iëp ber l̈öng bop tjok, or mil̈ë kjl̈ara, or kël̈ë kjl̈ara» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «L̇l̇ëye rokëmi l̈öng bor kong l̈i, e l̇l̇ë miydëmi l̈öng l̇l̇ëme. ¿Pjãy shdungoba, bokrotkëba botoya dik ga pjl̈úre?» «Ëng» l̈e l̈ok ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̈ër bomi kong ga pjãy shdungoba, bokrotkëba, zrökoba botoya dik jl̈õe. Gueniyo ga pjãy kjrër ber tjeng bor or kël̈ë, or mil̈ë, e l̈aga tjarë l̇l̇ëm, e l̈aga bor Datarë. Shto bor or kël̈ë, or mil̈ë, e ber ëye kjrara bor Datarë tjeng l̈i kong» l̈e.
Kuya ba oppinggaga dogl̈o sak kjwara (10) l̈irë ga iirkono ba pjeyoga pjök l̈i kong.
Gueniyo rokara Jesúsdë uunkong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Miydëmi pjl̈ú ga kjok ëre kjing go ga nopga judío l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo ichagaga ba nopga ichë parkë ara ba kong. Nopga dbo ara wl̈eniyo ba nopga ichë parkë ara ba kong bakoe. Ëye songe l̈e l̇l̇ëm, iche parkë ara ba kong erä.
Gueniyo woydër ga pjãy omshäryë eni l̇l̇ëme. Ëye opyë woydë ber tjwl̈õ ara obl̈ë kjinmo ga opyë ber shäng obl̈ë kjimtaga dey.
Ëye opyë woydë ber bäm go ga opyë ber shäng parkaga tjwl̈ẽk shäng pjir wl̈eniyo obl̈ë kong dey.
No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre shrono shäng kjok ëreshko, ëye parkë bor kong wl̈o l̇l̇ëme. Tja shrono shäng parkë obl̈ë kong wl̈o. Ga tja optwë, wol̈on wl̈o, tja ber nopga ara potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o wl̈o, epga där wl̈o» l̈e.
Jesús opshino jek shäng Jericó kjokyo dwayo ba oppinggaga tjokshko ga nopga to jek ara ba tjok.
Eshko ga domerga l̈öng irbo sor go do pjök kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo. Kuya l̈ok ga Jesús jek shäng eshko ga tjl̈ẽno dbo go, tjl̈ẽ ga «¡Tjl̈apga, David tjëyo, tjawa songe l̈ozong!» l̈e.
Eni ga nopga jëk l̈öng Jesús tjok l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy kjinkozong» l̈e. Kuya l̈ok ga gueniyo kjinkë l̈ok l̇l̇ëme. Tjl̈ẽ l̈ok dbo go jek obi ga «¡Tjl̈apga, David tjëyo, tjawa songe l̈ozong!» l̈e.
Eni ga Jesús kojongö shäng, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye woydëmi ga shäryër bomi kong?»
«Tjl̈apga, tjawa kjok ĩk woydë» l̈e ba kong.
Eshko ga songe l̈e Jesúsdë, ga bokkwo porwara. Jekdo eshko ga beno l̈öng kjok ĩgö wẽl̈ë, ga to jek l̈ok Jesús tjok.
Jesús jek shäng jongya Jerusalén kjokyo ba oppinggaga tjokshko ga öötong l̈öng Betfagé kjokyo, e ber buk Olivos dl̈upyo pogl̈o go. Eshko ga ba oppinggaga jek l̈öng ba tjok l̈i rokara do pjök,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pjãy nom kjok buk bi bokshto kjweshko. Kjweshko ga öng so kwomgl̈a kjoyo dre töshko popga wl̈ẽmi sök kjl̈ara kjro go, ba wa wl̈ënggl̈a tjok. Komi, ga tek sömi bor kong.
Eshko ga ëbo l̇l̇ëbo l̈ë bomi kong wl̈enishko ga “Woyde Tjl̈apgarë” l̈ëmi ba kong eni, ga iche tek bomi tjok jekdo» l̈e.
Shäryono eni, tjl̈õkwo l̈ara Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga tek dënashko sorë l̈i ber jl̈õkoyo wl̈o. Tjl̈ẽno beno eni:
«L̈ëmi Sión sopga kong ga “Bomi pjl̈u tek sök dörö bomi shwoy wl̈ẽp, öng so kwomgl̈a kjoyo dre töshko kjing go. Tjwe öng l̇l̇ëbo shgokl̈o wa kjing go” l̈ëmi ba kong eni.»
Kuya l̈ok ga shäryara eni.
Öng l̈i söra tek shrono ba wa tjok. Ga ba shwong kop l̈ëkong l̈i iara öng do pjök l̈i kokso kjing go. Eshko ga Jesús opyono sök öng l̈i kjing go.
Eshko ga nopga jek l̈öng ba tjok ara. Kjone kjone, ba shwong kop l̈ëkong skwara l̈ok, ga kwoptara l̈ok irbo bäng go. Kjone kjone, kjor korga zara, ga kwoptara l̈ok irbo bäng go bakoe.
Nopga jek l̈öng ba bäm go, nopga jek l̈öng ba irgo, öö l̈e l̈ok ara. Tjl̈ẽ ga «David tjëyo kjwe pjl̈ú jl̈õe. Kjwe ichara Tjl̈apgarë shrono kjok ëreshko. Kjwe kjimte Sbörë. Sbö sök kjok dogo, e pjl̈ú jl̈õe» l̈e.
Jesús jek opzrëno Jerusalén kjokyo roshkoshko ga nopga tjeng eshko l̈i shdöktong uunkong l̇l̇aw pogo, ga tjl̈ẽ ga «¿Kjwe ëro?» l̈e.
Nopga jek l̈öng Jesús tjok l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjwe Jesús. E Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga. E Nazaret so. Nazaret kjokyo, e Galilea kjokyo obi» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jesús jek opzrëno öötong shäng Sbö u zl̈ong bäng, ga nopga l̈öng eshko l̇l̇ëbo soynek, l̇l̇ëbo tjwl̈ẽk l̈i ichara uunkong ey dwayo. Ba dbur bapkwo kjl̈opswozl̈ong oba kong l̈i poskara beno tjeng töshko. Dunggwo soynega sökkl̈o l̈i poskara beno tjeng töshko bakoe.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang eni: “Bor u, e kowëba ber syõ uyo wl̈o. Gueniyo ioromi beno jong l̈ũ uyo”» l̈e.
Eshko ga nopga kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo, nopga jëk l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo, e tek shrono l̈öng Jesús zl̈ong bäng, ga poptara.
Syõshtaga kägäyoga, no pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, e l̈öng eshko. Jesús shäng l̇l̇ëbo ĩydëba l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo shäryë l̈i ĩna l̈ok. Eshko ga öö l̈e kjwozirgarë l̈öng Sbö u zl̈ong bäng, tjl̈ẽ ga «David tjëyo kjwe pjl̈ú jl̈õe» l̈e l̈i kura l̈ok bakoe. Eni ga iirkë l̈ok ara,
ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok Jesús kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye l̈e l̈ok l̈i kup shängde?» «Ëng. Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang eni: “Kjwozirga, chidaga, e ichorop bop poshrëk, ba tëkwo go.” ¿E l̈omirë l̇l̇ëmdo?» l̈e ba kong.
E irgo ga nopga l̈i beno l̈öng eshko, ga Jesús to opshino Jerusalén kjokyo dwayo, jek öötong shäng Betania kjokyo, ga pono beno buk shkër kjwara eshko.
Wẽshko kjok shröng ga Jesús to jek shäng iröng obi Jerusalén kjokyoshko ga pjl̈i arae.
Eshko ga kjor jong kjl̈ara irbo l̈i sor go ko higuera. Ĩya ga jek äär ba zl̈ong ga jong bo dret, korga tjok erä. Eni ga tjl̈ẽ kjor jong l̈i kong ga «Pja ber botjyë ame» l̈e ba kong, ga kjor l̈i dano jekdo beno jong dogroe.
Ĩya ba oppinggagarë ga beno l̈öng yëy l̈e erä. Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Kjor kjwe dano jekdo sorë?»
«Pjãy mär bor go jl̈õkoyo, ga bor dbo ara äär l̇l̇ë go l̇l̇ëme l̈ëmi l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni ga l̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga l̇l̇ëye shäryoror ëre shäryëmi ga pjl̈ú, ga pjãy tjl̈ẽ dl̈up ëre kong ga “Dl̈up, pja opkjos jer dl̈ung roy” l̈ëmi ga shäryë eni bakoe.
Pjãy l̇l̇ëbo rokë syõ goshko ga woyotjl̈ĩmi ga twe Sbörë l̈ëmi jl̈õkoyo ga wl̈ẽmi» l̈e ba kong.
E irgo ga Jesús opzrëno jek öötong shäng Sbö u zl̈ong bäng. Eshko ga oba pĩya shäng wopro ga syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo, e tek shrono l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ëye shäryëp shäng l̈i shäryëp ega? ¿Pja ichaga ërë?»
«Pjãy kong l̇l̇ëbo kjakrokër bakoe. ¿Juan No Waga, e ichaga ërë no wë? ¿Ichaga Sbörëre, de norë? Tja dboryoromi ga tja ichaga ërë l̈ër bomi kong bakoe» l̈e ba kong. Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga «Ichaga Sbörë l̈oroy ba kong wl̈eni ga “¿Tjl̈õkwo kjroromi l̇l̇ëm ega?” l̈e bi kong.
<range>
Gueniyo Juan, e Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga l̈e nopga uunkongdë. E kjĩshko ga ichaga norë l̈ëy ga ä bakoe. Nopga l̈i bangkjrëy ara kjĩshko» l̈e.
Eni ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok Jesús kong ga «Miydërwa l̇l̇ëme» l̈e. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «E kjĩshko ga tja ichaga ërë l̈ër bomi kong l̇l̇ëm bakoe» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇ëye l̈ër bomi kong ëre woyotjl̈ĩzĩa. Domer shäng kjl̈ara, wapga tjeng domerga do pjök. Pjl̈ara ga tjl̈ẽ ba wa kjl̈ara kong ga “Pja nom parkë bor kjokshko, kjil̇l̇gwo bo ara l̈ishko” l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “¡Tja jek parkë woydë l̇l̇ëme!” l̈e. Gueniyo döni ga wotjl̈ĩno obl̈ë, ga to jek parkë.
E irgo ga domer l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba wa kjl̈ara obi kong ga “Pja nom parkë bor kjokshko” l̈e. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Jöl̈ö, Data. Tja to parkë” l̈e, gueniyo to jek l̇l̇ëme.
¿Kumi ga ba wa kjone dey ga ba data kol̈ara?» l̈e. Nopga l̈öng eshko l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Bäm go l̈ira ba data kol̈ono» l̈e. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga nopga dbur töngga Roma so kong, wal̈ëga to l̈öng opsoynek domerga obl̈ë obl̈ë kong wl̈eniyo, e äär ber l̈öng Sbö sök no pjl̈uyo ĩyado l̈ishko bomi bäm go. Juan No Waga shrono shäng irbo pjl̈o bek l̈i ping bomi kong, ga tjl̈õkwo kjroromi l̇l̇ëme. Gueniyo ga nopga owa l̈ër l̈i, epgara omtjl̈õkwo kjrono. Ĩnomi eni ëmdë ga l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryëmi l̈öng l̈i, e owa jl̈õe l̈oromi l̇l̇ëm, ga rayoromi l̇l̇ëm, ga tjl̈õkwo kjroromi l̇l̇ëm obi. E kjĩshko ga nopga owa l̈ër l̈i kongda, Sbö, e ber ba pjl̈uyo, bomi bäm go.
<range>
»Tja tjl̈ẽ bomi kong l̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o go. Kuzĩa. Domer shäng kjl̈ara kjok sogo. Pjl̈ara ga kjil̇l̇gwo dwl̈ayo dgara ba kjokshko, kjëryo tyara jong pjribri, kl̈ung kjara ber kjil̇l̇gwo bo l̇l̇ruzl̈ong shtoyo wl̈o, ga u shäryara jong kjwara ba dwl̈a l̈i dokl̈o. Pjir ga kjok l̈i poskwona parkagaga kjl̈öbö kong, potjwl̈ẽya ĩ, ga to kjok shto obl̈ë.
»Öötong kjil̇l̇gwo bo kjrozl̈ong dbaryo ga ba parkagaga ichara kjl̈öbö, kjil̇l̇gwo bo ber ba kong l̈i rokë parkagaga beno l̈öng ba kjok daga l̈i kong.
Gueniyo ga ba parkagaga ichara tjwe l̈öng l̈i shara kjok dagaga l̈öng l̈irë, kjl̈ara shpora, kjl̈ara zröra, kjl̈ara l̈öra ak go.
E irgo ga ba parkagaga ichara jek kjl̈öbö obi, ichara bäm go l̈i kjinmo. Öötong l̈öng kjok buk l̈ishko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryara kjok dagaga l̈öng l̈irë bäm go sorë ga shäryara jek eni obi parkagaga ichara obi l̈i tjok.
»E irgo ga ba wa ichayde shara. Wotjl̈ĩk ga “Miydër ga bor wa ërera bangkjre l̈ok” l̈e.
Gueniyo öötong shäng eshko ga ba wa l̈i ĩya kjok dagaga l̈öng l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga “L̇l̇ono ga kjwe ber kjok ëre sogo. Zröroy wl̈eni ga kjok ëre kjrëy, ber bi kong wl̈o” l̈e.
Eni ga shara l̈ok, shira kjok l̈i roy dwayo, ga zröra l̈ok.
»¿Eni ga kjok sogo l̈i tjwe iröng obishko ga l̇l̇ëye shärye ba tjok l̈ok l̈ëmi?» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Parkagaga owa l̈i songe l̈e l̇l̇ëme. Zröya jekdo. Pjir ga parkagaga wl̈ẽya obl̈ë, dwl̈a bo kjrozl̈ong dbaryo ga dwl̈a ba kong bayo kjöme l̈i twe ba kong wl̈o» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang eni: »“Akkwo woydara u shäryagagarë l̈ok l̇l̇ëm l̈i, e iak beno buk bäm go, beno tjwl̈õ ara, obl̈ë kjinmo. Shäryara Tjl̈apgarë eni, ga tjawa beno l̈öng yëy l̈ërwa erä.” ¿E l̈omirë l̇l̇ëmdo?
E kjĩshko ga l̈ër bomi kong ga pjãy kjrara Sbörë, e ber bomi pjl̈u wl̈o. Gueniyo pjãy omkol̈ë l̇l̇ëm kuzong ga obl̈ë omkol̈ë pjl̈ú l̈i kjrayde, e ber ba pjl̈u shara wl̈o.
Ëye l̈ono akkwo ëre kjing go ga tar pjäs erä. Ga akkwo ëre l̈ono ë kjing go ga e sho shguir ber tjeng l̈ul̈ue» l̈e.
Tjl̈ẽno l̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o go l̈i kuya syõshtaga kägäyoga, fariseogarë ga miydara l̈ok ga ba l̈ayde shäng.
Eni ga shaya l̈ok woydë, bängzaya l̈ok wl̈o. Gueniyo oba bangkjre l̈ok ara, Jesús, e Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga l̈ëba kjĩshko.
Jesús tjl̈ẽno ba kong l̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o go jek obi. Tjl̈ẽ ga
«Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë, e so l̇l̇ëbo l̈ër bomi kong ëre kjoyoe. Pjl̈u shäng kjl̈ara, ba wa domer orkwosmozl̈ong dbaryo shrëkkl̈o poshärye shäng.
Eni ga ba parkagaga ichara kjl̈öbö nopga mana l̈i rokë, gueniyo tek l̈ok woydë l̇l̇ëme.
E irgo ga ba parkagaga obl̈ë ichara jek tjl̈ẽ nopga mana l̈öng l̈i kong ga “Bor wa orkwosmozl̈ong dbaryo shrëkkl̈o, e poshäryak pjire. Nopga ichoror öng tjeng kjl̈o dik l̈i zrök, ga shäryak tjeng pjir tjän. Pjãy tek mal̈inge” l̈e.
»Kura l̈ok, gueniyo kol̈ara l̈ok l̇l̇ëme. Kjone kjone jek l̈ok ba kjokshko. Kjone kjone jek l̈ok ba pakshko.
Kjone kjone, pjl̈u parkagaga l̈i shara l̈ok, shpokza tjã tjã, ga zrörae.
»Roy kuya pjl̈urë ga iirkonoe. Eni ga ba ëngkjwagaga ichara ba parkaga zrögaga l̈i zrök, ba kjok l̈i suk pjir bakoe.
Döni ga tjl̈ẽ ba parkagaga kong ga “Dl̈i l̇l̇ë shäryak tjeng pjir tjän, gueniyo nopga manor bäm go l̈i tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëm, tek tjwe na wl̈o.
Eni ga pjãy nom irbo bäng, nopga tön arashko ga ë pogo wl̈ẽnomi l̈i mami, bor wa orkwosmozl̈ong dbaryo shrëya l̈ok bi tjok wl̈o” l̈e.
Eni ga ba parkagaga opshino jek, ga nopga pjl̈ú, nopga owa, e wl̈ẽna irbo bäng go kjl̈obi l̈i mana l̈ok drete. Eni ga ba u dl̈ino jong tjung no erä.
»Pjl̈u opzrëk jek äär nopga mana l̈öng l̈i ĩkshko ga ĩya ga domer jek shäng kjl̈ara, do go shwong orkwosmokkl̈o wl̈eniyo drete.
Eni ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “¿Pja tek shäng doyono shwong orkwosmokkl̈o wl̈eniyo go l̇l̇ëm ega?” l̈e. Kuya kjing erä.
Eni ga pjl̈u tjl̈ẽ ba parkagaga l̈öng l̈i kong ga “Kjwe shazĩ, pjrizĩ ba dre go, ba orkwo go, ga dbuzĩ jek kjoko, kjok ro sĩ roshko, ber shäng sl̈ar eshko, kowo uë, l̇l̇ëbo bang ara ba kong kjĩy” l̈e.
Nopga mak ara, gueniyo kjrak l̈i kjl̈öbö erä» l̈e.
E irgo ga fariseoga töno, l̈ano l̈ok ëng kong. Woydara ga l̇l̇ëbo kjakroke Jesús kong, dborye bëy l̇l̇ëm ga doshaya l̈ok e go, rote wl̈o.
Eni ga ba oppinggaga ichara kjl̈öbö, Herodes pjl̈oyoga tjok. Öötong l̈öng Jesús shwoy ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Tjl̈apga no pingga, miydërwa ga pja tjl̈ẽ beke. Woyde Sbörë ga shji jëk sorë l̈i l̈ëp jl̈õkoyo. No tjl̈ẽshko ga tjl̈õkwo kup l̇l̇ëm, tjwl̈õ kjöm pogo, e bop kong ga tjwl̈õ beke. Pja tjl̈ẽ bek ë pogo kong.
¿Eni ga shji kä potjwl̈ẽk pjl̈u kësbangyo sök Roma kjokyo l̈i kong ga pjl̈úre?» l̈e.
Kuya ga miyde ga l̈öng wotjl̈ĩk owa. E kjĩshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! ¿Tja tjl̈ĩmi ega?
Dburwa kä potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o l̈i tek sözĩ bor kong kjwara, ĩn wl̈o» l̈e, ga tek söra l̈ok ba kong kjwara.
Eni ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Domer jyãgl̈o sök dburwa ëre go jũ ë? ¿Ko tak pjang ëre go jũ ë?»
«Kjwe pjl̈u kësbangyo sök Roma kjokyo l̈i ĩ» l̈e l̈ok ba kong. Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Eni ga l̇l̇ëye pjl̈u ĩ l̈i, e twozĩ pjl̈u kong, gueniyo l̇l̇ëye Sbö ĩ l̈i, e twozĩ Sbö kong bakoe» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga beno l̈öng wotjl̈ĩk ara, ga to l̈ok ey dwayo.
Saduceoga wotjl̈ĩk ga no wol̈ono ga woshrë ame l̈e. Eni ga eshko dbaryo ga saduceoga tek shrono l̈öng Jesús shwoy kjl̈öbö ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Tjl̈apga no pingga, kjibokwo tara Moisésdë beno pjang l̈i tjl̈ẽ ga “Ëye wol̈ono, wapga beno ba boy tjok l̇l̇ëm ga shinmo kjl̈arayo l̈i orkwosmok ba boy beno sök l̈i tjok, wa tjok wl̈eni ga ber shinmo l̈i ĩ wl̈eni wl̈o.”
»Pjl̈ara ga borwa tjrëko ëreshko ga domerga l̈öng dogl̈o kjäk (7), epenga döe. Ba këguëyo orkwosmono, ga wol̈ono, ga wapga beno l̇l̇ëm kuzong ga ba l̈ëng orkwosmono ba syã tjok.
Eni ga ba l̈ëng wol̈ono jek bakoe. Ba l̈ëmga kjl̈obi l̈i orkwosmono ba syã tjok eni bako, ga wol̈ono uunkong, ga wapga beno ba boy tjok l̇l̇ëme.
E irgo ga wal̈ë l̈i to wol̈ono bakoe.
¿Eni ga domerga dogl̈o kjäk (7) l̈i orkwosmono uunkong wal̈ë l̈i tjok kuzong ga no woshrozl̈ong dbaryoshko ga wal̈ë l̈i ber domerga kjone dey l̈i boy?»
«¡Pjãy diktong l̈öng jl̈õe! Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang l̈i miydëmi l̇l̇ëm, ba dbo kësbang l̈i miydëmi l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
No woshrozl̈ong dbaryoshko ga ëye orkwosmok ame. Eshko ga nopga ber l̈öng Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo so wl̈eni shara.
Pjãy wotjl̈ĩk ga no wol̈ono, ga woshrë ame l̈ëmi. Gueniyo ga Sbö tjl̈ẽno bomi kong ga “Tja Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, e Sbö” l̈ara. ¿E l̈omirë l̇l̇ëmdo? E shinmoga Sbö l̇l̇ëme. E nopga l̈öng së l̈i Sbö» l̈e ba kong.
<range>
Kuya nopga l̈öng l̈irë ga beno l̈öng yëy l̈e erä.
Saduceoga kjinkara Jesúsdë l̈i kuya fariseogarë ga ëng töno l̈ok.
Eshko ga fariseo shäng kjl̈ara, kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i miydaga pjl̈ú wl̈eniyo. E tek shrono shäng Jesús zl̈ong bäng, ba tjl̈ĩk wl̈o. Tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga
«Tjl̈apga no pingga, ¿kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tjwl̈õ kësbangyo l̈i kjone dey?»
«“L̇l̇ëbo woydëpshko, l̇l̇ëbo woyotjl̈ĩpshko, l̇l̇ëbo shäryëpshko, pja sök së obishko ga Tjl̈apga, bop Sbö l̈i woydos jl̈õkoyo ĩyado.”
Kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tjwl̈õ kësbangyo l̈i e.
Kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o kjrina obi tjwl̈õ ara, e so bäm l̈i kjoyoe. Tjl̈ẽ ga “Pja opwoydë sorë ga bop kjl̈ara, e woydos eni bakoe.”
Kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o kjring pjök ëre tjwl̈õ ara anmoyõ. Kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o l̇l̇amo tak l̈ok l̈i, l̇l̇ëye tara Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agagarë l̈i, e beno shji Sbö woydë sorë, shji ëng woydë sorë, e pinggl̈o bi kong eröe» l̈e ba kong.
Fariseoga l̈öng eshko obi wopro ga
Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿No pjl̈uyo iche l̈e Sbörë l̈i, e ë tjëyo l̈ëmi?» «E David tjëyo» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Eni ga David go Sbö Sëyashko ga no pjl̈uyo l̈i kowara ba Tjl̈apgayo ega? Eshko ga David tjl̈ẽ ga
»“Tjl̈apga tjl̈ẽno bor Tjl̈apgayo kong ga ‘Pja tek wl̈ar ber sök bor orkwo kël̈ëkong, äär jong bop moskwoga zanor pjir guing, eshko ga twër ber bop kong ichëp wl̈o’ l̈e.”
»¿Eni ga no pjl̈uyo l̈i kowara Daviddë ba Tjl̈apgayo kuzong ga e ber ba tjëyo tek ber ba irgo l̈i sorë?» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga to dboryara ërë l̇l̇ëme. Eshko dbaryo jek l̈ëkong ga ëye wokjang l̇l̇ëbo kjakrokë ba kong wl̈o ame.
E irgo ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ nopga tjeng ara l̈i kong, ba oppinggaga kong ga
«No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, e wotjl̈ĩk l̈ok ga no pinggaga Sbö tjl̈õkwo go jl̈õkoyo l̈i epga, ëye obl̈ë drete l̈e l̈ok eni.
E kjĩshko ga pjãy pĩya sorë ga shäryozĩ eni, gueniyo epga omshäryë l̈öng sorë l̈i, pjãy omshäryë eni l̇l̇ëme. Nopga kjwe tjl̈ẽ ga “L̇l̇ëbo shäryëy jũni” l̈e, gueniyo omshäryë l̈öng obl̈ë.
»Oba pĩyashko ga tjl̈õkwo l̈e l̈ok ara l̈i shäryëba uunkong ga äe. E so l̇l̇ëbo kwing ä twe obl̈ë kong söya wl̈o kjoyoe. Shärye l̈ok eni, gueniyo epga om go omkjimtë ba sök l̇l̇ëm, ba sakkwo go ëmdë l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
L̇l̇ëbo shärye l̈ok kës l̈i, e ĩkoba wl̈o erä. Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang kjibokwo go l̈i pjriya l̈ok ba bokdo go, ba sjä̃kso go ĩyado. Ba shwong kjarbo shẽshẽ l̈i shärye l̈ok kur may, pjë äär kjl̈ay kl̈ung go wl̈o.
Oba tön, iëshko ga woyde ga l̈öng bäm goshko, sökkl̈o pjl̈ú goshko, shärye l̈ok eni judíoga syõ uyo roshko bakoe.
Woyde l̈ok ga miga l̇l̇ë l̈ëba ba kong yõtso l̇l̇ëbo soynezl̈ong, ga kowëba no pingga.
»Gueniyo ga pjãyda epenga dö wl̈eni. Pjãy pingga sök kjl̈araso. E kjĩshko ga pjãy kowëba no pingga l̇l̇ëm dey.
Pjãy Data kjl̈araso, Sbö sök kjok dogo l̈i e. E kjĩshko ga kjok ëre kjing goshko ga ëye kowëmi data l̇l̇ëm dey.
Pjãy bapshiga kjl̈araso. Tja, no pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng ëre l̈i e. E kjĩshko ga pjãy kowëba no bapshiga l̇l̇ëm dey bakoe.
Ëye opyë woydë tjwl̈õ kësbang, obl̈ë kjinmo ga opyë ber shäng obl̈ë kjimtaga dey.
Ëye opyono tjwl̈õ ara ga ie ber tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëme. Ëye opkjl̈opswono beno wotöy ga ie ber tjwl̈õ ara.
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! Nopga, Sbö ie ber ba pjl̈uyo wl̈o l̈i l̈e ga somi ara. E so u bäng bängzami, nopga opzrëk jek ba roshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o kjoyoe. Pjãy opzrëk eshko l̇l̇ëm, ga no obl̈ë opzrëk woydë eshko l̈i ichëmi opzrëk eshko l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
<range>
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! Pjãy to l̈öng dl̈ung kjing, kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë, no wl̈ẽk ber bomi oppingga wl̈o. Wl̈ẽnomishko ga pimi owa. Eni ga ber shäng owa, bomi kjinmo. Pjãy shdungko, pjãy ber l̈öng iök pjë jong ri ri sjer l̇l̇ëm shtoyo l̈i roshko wl̈o. Gueniyo bomi oppinggaga l̈i, e shdungko, bomi kjinmo anmoyõ.
»¡Pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! Pjãy so no kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kjoyo, gueniyo no wl̈osömi l̈ëmi. Pjãy tjl̈ẽ oba kong ga “Shji tjl̈ẽno jl̈õkoyo Sbö u kjĩshko ga e l̇l̇ëno l̇l̇ëme. Gueniyo shji tjl̈ẽno jl̈õkoyo dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr smok l̈ok Sbö u goshko l̈i kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye l̈oroy jl̈õkoyo l̈i shäryëy kjl̈uwe” l̈ëmi oba kong eni.
Pjãy kjok miydë sira l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy so no kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kjoyoe. Dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr smok l̈ok Sbö u goshko l̈i iak beno tjeng dboy Sbö kong, Sbö u l̈i kjĩshko. ¿Eni ga l̇l̇ëye tjwl̈õ ara anmoyõ l̈i l̇l̇ë, dbur sho shõyl̈ṍr l̈ire, de Sbö u l̈i?
»Pjãy tjl̈ẽ oba kong ga “Shji tjl̈ẽno jl̈õkoyo öng sho sukkl̈o l̈i kjĩshko ga e l̇l̇ëno l̇l̇ëme. Gueniyo shji tjl̈ẽno jl̈õkoyo öng twara, zröra, suya buk öng sho sukkl̈o kjing go l̈i kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye l̈oroy jl̈õkoyo l̈i shäryëy kjl̈uwe” l̈ëmi oba kong eni.
Pjãy so no kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kjoyoe. Öng twara, zröra, suya buk öng sho sukkl̈o kjing go l̈i iak beno buk dboy, öng sho sukkl̈o l̈i kjĩshko. ¿Eni ga l̇l̇ëye tjwl̈õ ara anmoyõ l̈i l̇l̇ë, öng l̈ire, de öng sho sukkl̈o l̈i?
»E kjĩshko ga ëye tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo öng sho sukkl̈o l̈i kjĩshko ga tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo ba kjĩshko dö l̇l̇ëme. Tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo l̇l̇ëbo buk ba kjing go l̈i kjĩshko bakoe.
Ëye tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo Sbö u kjĩshko ga tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo Sbö sök eshko l̈i kjĩshko bakoe.
Ëye tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo kjok dogo kjĩshko ga tjl̈ẽ shäng jl̈õkoyo Sbö pjl̈u sökkl̈o kjĩshko bako, Sbö sök ba sökkl̈o kjing go kjĩshko bakoe.
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! L̇l̇ëbo wl̈ẽnomi l̈i shtëmi äär ba sakyo (10) go, ba sakyo (10) go, shimi kjrina kjrina, ga twëmi Sbö kong. Bomi dl̈i mokyo obl̈ë obl̈ë tjok ga shäryëmi l̈öng jl̈õkoyo eni bakoe. Gueniyo kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tak pjang tjwl̈õ ara, ba kjinmo l̈ira kol̈ëmi l̈öng l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy kjok l̇l̇gwek bek l̇l̇ëme. Obl̈ë songe l̈ëmi l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëbo l̈ëmi obl̈ë kongshko ga shäryëmi l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Pjl̈ú wl̈o ga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tjwl̈õ ara ëre shäryomirë dey, kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o obl̈ë l̈i shäryozĩ ĩyado bakoe.
Pjãy so no kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kjoyo, gueniyo no wl̈osömi l̈ëmi. Kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o, e l̇l̇ë l̈okl̈o miydëmi l̇l̇ëme. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëye tjwl̈õ ara l̇l̇ëm l̈i, e shäryomirë l̈öng. Gueniyo l̇l̇ëye tjwl̈õ ara l̈i, e shäryëmi l̈öng l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy so no sök di ië kjoyoe. L̇l̇gwirwa buk ba di iokl̈o roshko l̈i shira, gueniyo öng kësbang buk ba roshko l̈ira dwara jer, miydara l̇l̇ëme.
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! Pjãy l̇l̇ëbo shäryë ara, pjãy pjl̈úe l̈ëba wl̈o, gueniyo ga pjãy kirkë ara, pjãy wotjl̈ĩk dbur töng bomi kong erö. Pjãy so di iokl̈o, dl̈i uokl̈o kjoyoe. E kwoshkwak ba pogl̈o go, gueniyo roshko wl̈iwl̈ie.
¡Fariseoga, pjãy so no kjok ĩgö l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo kjoyoe! Pjl̈ú wl̈o ga di iokl̈o, dl̈i uokl̈o, e ro kwoshkwëmi bäm goshko. Pjir ga ber drëpdrë jl̈õe.
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! Pjãy so shinmo bapkwo poshtik pjl̈ubl̈ún, wol̈ësowa kjoyoe. Ĩkoba ga pogl̈o go pjl̈ú, gueniyo roshko shinmo dbogl̈o, l̇l̇ëbo wl̈iwl̈i tjeng ara eshko.
Pjãy so e kjoyo bakoe. Ĩkoba ga pjãy pjl̈o beke l̈ëba, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa erä, l̇l̇ëye l̈ëmi ga shäryëmi l̇l̇ëme.
»¡No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, fariseoga, pjãy song jl̈õ, pjãy shdungko! ¡Pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈ëmi, gueniyo pjãy wotjl̈ĩk owa bomi pjl̈úshko! Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga shinmotkono tjeng dënashko l̈i, ak sho shäryëmi ba sak kjing go, ber l̈öng kjone miydëba wl̈o. Nopga pjl̈o bek shinmotkono l̈i sakyo poshäryëmi, ber wol̈ësowa wl̈o.
E irgo ga pjãy tjl̈ẽ ga “Tjawa kjwe l̈öng borwa tjl̈apgaga tek dënashko so dbaryoshko ga Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga zrörorwa l̇l̇ëme” l̈ëmi eni.
Eni ga miydëmi ga pjãy Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga zröga l̈i tjëyoga.
Shäryara bomi tjl̈apgaga tek dënashko so l̈irë sorë ga pjãy omshäryë jek eni bakoe.
¡Pjãy so dgur kjoyoe! Pjãy shdungko, pjãy ber l̈öng iök pjë jong ri ri sjer l̇l̇ëm shtoyo l̈i roshko wl̈o. ¿Pjãy där, äär eshko l̇l̇ëm wl̈o ga sorëro?
»E kjĩshko ga Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga, nopga kjok miydë ara, no pinggaga, e ichër jek bomi kong. Gueniyo kjone kjone zrömi, kjone kjone zrömi l̈ok kjl̈ös go, kjone kjone shpomi no shpokkl̈o go judíoga syõ uyo roshko, ga töktong l̈ok. Eni ga irpjami to l̈öng kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë go.
Tek dämär ga nopga pjl̈o bek l̈i srëng kwono ara. Tek jong Abel go äär jong Zacarías, Berequías wa l̈i go eni. Zacarías pjl̈o bek, gueniyo zröromi Sbö u jong l̈i, öng sho sukkl̈o jong l̈i, e tjrëko. L̇l̇ono ga owa ëre ber pjang bomi go. Pjãy shdungko e kjĩshko.
L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga eerishko dbaryo sopga, pjãy shdungko l̇l̇ëbo owa ëre uunkong kjĩshko.
»¡Jerusalén sopga, tja kuzĩa! Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga zrömi. Sbö tjl̈õkwo roy l̈agaga ichara bomi kong l̈i l̈ömi ak go, zrömi wl̈o. Woydoror enido ga pjãy tön, kjörkö meyo ba wapga töno tjeng ba sjä̃gä dirko wl̈eni, gueniyo woydoromi l̇l̇ëme.
Tja kuzĩa. Bomi u, e raye Sbörë ber jong tjoksa.
L̈ër bomi kong ga tja ëre ĩmi ame, äär jong pjãy tjl̈ẽ l̈öng ga »“Kjwe ichara Tjl̈apgarë tjwe kjok ëreshko. Kjwe kjimte Sbörë” l̈ëmi l̈öng guing» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jesús opshino jek Sbö u jong l̈ishko dwayo. Jëk shängshko ga ba oppinggaga tek l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong ga «U l̈ok ëre ĩzong» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿U l̈ok ëre ĩmi l̈öngde? L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga ëreshko akkwo ëmdë ber tjeng ëng kjing go kjwara l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës ëre pjir ber drete» l̈e.
E irgo ga jem öötong l̈öng Olivos dl̈upyo ga Jesús sirkeno sök eshko. Ba oppinggaga tek l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng, tjl̈ẽ ba kong tjoksa wl̈o. Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ga «¿L̇l̇ëye l̈ëp shäng l̈i, e shäryë l̇l̇ono? ¿Pja tjwe iröng dörö l̈i jyãgl̈o wen l̇l̇ë? ¿Kjok pjir dörö l̈i jyãgl̈o wen l̇l̇ë?»
«Pjãy sjëk, pjãy jyãpgwëba l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
Eshko ga nopga wen tjwe ara tjl̈ẽ ga “No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i tja” l̈e. E go ga oba jyãpgwe ara.
»Roy kumi ga oba ëngkjwë kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë arashko ga l̇l̇ëye bangkjrëmi l̇l̇ëme. E shäryë eni kjl̈uwe. Gueniyo eshko ga kjok pjir dbaryo l̈i äätë l̇l̇ëm obi.
Tjëyoga obl̈ë obl̈ë ëngkjwë l̈ok ëng tjok. Nopga kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë so ëngkjwë l̈ok ëng tjok bakoe. Pjl̈i tjwe ara kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë. E ga yo tjwe ara kjok shto obl̈ë obl̈ë bakoe.
Gueniyo l̇l̇ëbo wen tjwe owa anmoyõ l̈i soye l̇l̇ëbo kës ëre go kjwl̈ë jã.
»Eshko ga pjãy twëba kjok l̇l̇gwegaga kong, pjãy shdũya l̈ok wl̈o, ga pjãy zröya l̈ok bakoe. Bor kjĩshko ga pjãy ĩywaba shjiktëng kjok kjwang jĩkong.
Eshkoshko ga nopga ara mär bor go ame. Epga ëng ĩywõ shjiktëng, ëng rotë kar kar, ëng twë kjok l̇l̇gwegaga kong bakoe.
Eshko ga nopga ara to l̈öng tjl̈ẽ ga “Tja Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga” l̈e, gueniyo e ichaga Sbörë l̇l̇ëme. E go ga oba jyãpgwe ara.
Eshko ga nopga wotjl̈ĩk owa ëng kong ara. E kjĩshko ga nopga l̈öng ara ëng woydë ame.
Gueniyo ga ëye mär bor go äär jong ba dbo go ga era där ber shäng pjl̈ú ĩyado.
Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë l̈i roy pjl̈ú, e shdär kjok kjwang jĩkong, miyde tjëyoga uunkongdë wl̈o. Eshko ga öötong kjok pjir dbaryoshko.
»Dënashko ga Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga Daniel, e tjl̈õkwo tono l̇l̇ëbo shäryë owa anmoyõ Sbö shto zrek roshko kjĩshko. Ëre woydër ga kumi yõtso.
Eshko ga pjãy l̈öng Judea kjokyo ga pjãy tökzong dl̈up l̈ëkong;
pjãy l̈öng bop u dbo kjing sdok l̈i kjing go ga pjãy tökzong mal̈ing, pjãy opzrëk jek bomi u roshko l̇l̇ëbo kjrë l̇l̇ëme;
pjãy l̈öng bomi kjokshko ga pjãy jek bomi ushko iröng bomi shwong kop l̈ëkong l̈i kjrë l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
E dbaryo ga wal̈ëga l̈öng kjl̈araso l̇l̇ëm, e song jl̈õe. Wal̈ëga kjwozirwa tjeng nä ië, e song jl̈õ bakoe.
Rokozĩ Sbö kong ga pjãy tök kjok owa dbaryo l̇l̇ëm, woshtozl̈ong dbaryo l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
»E dbaryo ga l̇l̇ëbo wen nopga kong owa anmoyõ. L̇l̇ëbo eni, e ĩkdaba tek dämärshko dwayo l̇l̇ëm, ga wen e kjoyo ame.
L̇l̇ëbo owa ëre ie Sbörë ber dbar ara l̇l̇ëm, ba nopga kjrara l̈i woyde ara kjĩshko. Eni l̇l̇ëm kjwe ga ëye där ber sök së kjl̈ara l̇l̇ëme.
»Eshko dbaryo ga no tjwe shäng tjl̈ẽ ga “¡No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë l̈i shäng na ĩzĩa!” l̈e. Obl̈ë tjl̈ẽ ga “¡Shäng kjwe!” l̈e bomi kong, gueniyo jl̈õ l̈ëmi l̇l̇ëme.
Eshko ga nopga ara to l̈öng tjl̈ẽ ga “No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i, e tja” l̈e. “Tja Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga kjok ëre so” l̈e. Gueniyo e ichaga Sbörë l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëbo ĩydëba l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo shärye l̈ok kësbang obl̈ë obl̈ë ara. L̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o shärye l̈ok obl̈ë obl̈ë bakoe. Shärye l̈ok eni, oba ara jyãpgwe wl̈o, Sbö nopga kjrara l̈i ëmdë jyãpgwe wl̈o l̈e, gueniyo epga jyãpgwe ga äe.
Gueniyo miydëmi pjir wl̈o ga l̇l̇ëye wen eshko l̈i l̈oror bomi kong tjän.
E kjĩshko ga ëye tjl̈ẽ ga “¡No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë l̈i shäng kjok dogro no l̇l̇ëmshko!” l̈e bomi kongshko ga pjãy jek eshko l̇l̇ëme. Ëye tjl̈ẽ ga “¡Opjneno sök na!” l̈e bomi kongshko ga jl̈õ l̈ëmi l̇l̇ëm bakoe.
No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe iröng obishko ga e ber so l̇l̇gwl̈ëng l̇l̇er kãl̈ã l̇l̇etl̇l̇et kjok dogo l̇l̇aw pogo kjoyoe. Eni ga tja ĩga nopga uunkongdë wẽl̈ëe.
Shinmo doyo buk kjone ga l̈ä̃ tjwe tön ara eshko.
»L̇l̇ëbo owa ëre dbaryo irgo ga »“Dl̈o ber pjang yẽt, ga mok kãl̈ã të ame. Dbala l̈on ter kjok dogo dwayo, ga kjopkwo ber dete erä.”
»Eshko ga ĩkoba ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre jyãgl̈o l̈i wen kjok dogo ga bangkjrëba kjok kjwang jĩkong, ga sl̈ar l̈ok ara. Eshko ga ĩkoba ga tja ter tjwe pjäng sho roy ga bor dbo kãl̈ã ĩkoba wẽl̈ëe.
Bor parkagaga kjok dogo so ichër wl̈i kësbang të, ga bor nopga kjrara l̈i kjre l̈ok kjok kjwang jĩkong, tö̃ya wl̈o.
»Tja kuzĩa. Pjãy pin, kjor ko higuera l̈i go. Kjor kowo wen mite, korga wen tjagl̈ënshko ga miydëmi e go ga l̈ushko dbaryo äätoe.
Eni ga l̇l̇ëbo tjeng kës ëre shäryë l̈i ĩmishko ga miydëmi e go ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe iröng obi dbaryo l̈i ääto eni bakoe.
L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga nopga l̈öng eerishko dbaryo kjone kjone wol̈ontë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga l̇l̇ëye l̈ër shäng bomi kong ëre shäryë uunkong.
Kjopkwo, kjok ëre, e pjir ber drete. Gueniyo bor tjl̈õkwora ber pjang ĩyado.
»E dbaryo l̇l̇ono, kjok orë, ëye ommiydë l̇l̇ëme. Miydaga Sbö parkagaga kjok dogo sorë l̇l̇ëm, miydaga Sbö Wa ërerë l̇l̇ëm bakoe. Miydaga Data Sbörë eröe.
No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe iröng obi döröshko ga l̇l̇ëbo shäryë kjok ëre kjing go l̈i, e ber so l̇l̇ëbo shäryono Noé dbaryoshko l̈i dik.
Eshko ga kjok ëre pitë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga nopga to l̈öng wl̈ẽp dl̈i uë, di ië, orkwosmok ëng tjok öötong Noé opzrëno jem kjyong kësbang roshko dbaryoshko.
L̇l̇ëye tjwe shäryë eshko l̈i miydaraba l̇l̇ëme. Eshko ga shunyo shrono kësbang, ga nopga l̈i söra dirë, shtena drete. No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjweshko ga e shäryë eni bakoe.
Eshko dbaryo ga domerga l̈öng do pjök parkë ba kjokshko. Kjl̈ara söya, kjl̈ara ie ber shäng eshko.
Ga wal̈ëga l̈öng do pjök l̇l̇ëbo kl̈äk. Kjl̈ara söya, kjl̈ara ie ber shäng eshko.
»E kjĩshko ga pjãy l̈öng sjëk ĩyado, bomi Tjl̈apga ëre tjwe dbar l̇l̇ono miydëmi l̇l̇ëm kjĩshko.
Tja kuzĩa. Ëye tjwe l̈ũrkë l̇l̇ono miyde u sogo l̈irë kjwe ga koshe, ba u de, l̇l̇ëbo l̈ũyotkëba l̇l̇ëm wl̈o.
No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe l̇l̇ono miydëmi l̇l̇ëm kuzong ga pjãy ber l̈öng bor koshë, poshäryak pjir ĩyado.
»Parkaga ie ba pjl̈urë ber ba parkagaga obl̈ë daga, së̃ya äär ba dl̈oyo go kjok orë ga woyde ga parkaga l̇l̇ëye l̈e ba kong l̈i shärye eni wl̈eniyo, kjok miydë ara wl̈eniyo bakoe. ¿Gueniyo ga kjre sorë?
Tjwe iröng obishko ga parkaga wl̈ẽya ba pjl̈urë shäng ba pak shäryë pjl̈ú l̈i, e kongda ber pjl̈úe.
L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga era ie ba pjl̈urë ber shäng ba l̇l̇ëbo uunkong kägäyo.
Gueniyo ga parkaga l̈i wotjl̈ĩk owa wl̈eni ga wotjl̈ĩk ga ba pjl̈u tjwe mal̈ing l̇l̇ëme l̈e,
ga opyorgö to shäng parkagaga obl̈ë shdung, ga gl̈ö ara nel̈õga tjok.
Eni wl̈eni ga koshe shäng l̇l̇ëm dbaryoshko ga ba pjl̈u tjwe.
Eshko ga parkaga owa l̈i shdũya, iche nopga Sbö tjl̈õkwo söga jl̈õkoyo l̈e, gueniyo wotjl̈ĩk owa ba pjl̈úshko tjeng l̈ishko, ber shäng sl̈ar eshko, kowo uë, l̇l̇ëbo bang ara ba kong kjĩy.
»Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë, e so l̇l̇ëbo l̈ër bomi kong ëre kjoyoe. Pjl̈ara ga orkwosmozl̈ong dbaryo ga kjogl̈oga töno tjeng dogl̈o sak kjwara (10), kjogl̈o orkwosmok wl̈o l̈i yorkaga. Ba iök shjiy bapkwo söra ba tjok kjl̈ara ĩ ĩ, ga beno l̈öng domer orkwosmok wl̈o l̈i koshë.
Kjogl̈oga dogl̈o shkëng (5) wotjl̈ĩk l̇l̇ëm wl̈eniyo, kjogl̈oga dogl̈o shkëng (5) obi, era wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú wl̈eniyo.
Kjogl̈oga wotjl̈ĩk l̇l̇ëm l̈ira iök dyo söno ba tjok l̇l̇ëme.
Kjogl̈oga wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú l̈ira iök dyo söno ba bapkwo roy, ga iök dyo söra l̈ok bapkwo obl̈ë roy bakoe.
Eshko ga domer orkwosmok wl̈o l̈i shrono mal̈ing l̇l̇ëm kuzong ga poywõ l̈ok uunkong, ga ponoe.
»Kjok rong ga oba tjl̈ẽ dbo go ga “¡Domer l̈i tek shäng döröe! ¡Pjãy opshis ba wl̈okjrë!” l̈e.
»Kuya kjogl̈oga l̈irë ga kojono l̈ok uunkong, ba iök shjiy l̈i poshärye wl̈o.
Kjogl̈oga wotjl̈ĩk l̇l̇ëm l̈i tjl̈ẽ l̈ok l̇l̇amo l̈öng l̈i kong ga “Borwa iök sjer woydë. E kjĩshko ga tjawa së̃zĩ iök dyo sira” l̈e.
»Gueniyo kuya wotjl̈ĩk pjl̈ú l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong ga “L̇l̇ëme. Borwatoy kjwõr shji uunkong kong wl̈o l̇l̇ëme. Twërwa bomi kong kjwe ga borwatoy pjir bakoe. E kjĩshko ga pjãy to ba tjwl̈ẽk bomi kong om go dey” l̈e.
»Gueniyo jek l̈ok ba tjwl̈ẽk wopro ga domer l̈i shronoe. Kjogl̈oga l̈öng ĩyado ba koshë l̈i opzrëno jek orkwosmozl̈ong uyo l̈i roshko. Ga u bäng l̈i bängzaraba tuke.
E irgo ga kjogl̈oga kjrina l̈i shrono l̈ok iröng obi ga tjl̈ẽ ga “¡Tjl̈apga, Tjl̈apga, u bäng dös borwa kong!” l̈e.
»Gueniyo kuya domer orkwosmok wl̈o l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjãy ë miydër l̇l̇ëme” l̈e.
»No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe iröng dbar l̇l̇ono, kjok orë, e miydëmi l̇l̇ëme. E kjĩshko ga pjãy ber l̈öng sjëk ĩyado.
»Sbö ber no pjl̈uyo sorë, e so l̇l̇ëbo l̈ër bomi kong ëre kjoyoe. Pjl̈ara ga domer shäng kjl̈ara. To kjok shto obl̈ë go kjwl̈ë wl̈eni ga ba parkagaga rokara, ie ber l̈öng ba dbur dë wl̈o.
Ba parkaga dbur dë pjl̈ú anmoyõ l̈i kong dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (5,000). Ba parkaga dbur dë pjl̈ú l̈i kong twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjok (2,000). Ba parkaga dbur dë pjl̈ú anmoyõ l̇l̇ëm l̈i kong twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw (1,000). E irgo ga toe.
»Parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (5,000) l̈i, l̇l̇ëbo tjwl̈ẽna dbur l̈i go, ga soynena jek obi, ga dbur shano öötong bayo eni obi.
Parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök (2,000) l̈i omshäryono e kjoyo bako, ga dbur shano bayo eni obi bakoe.
Gueniyo parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw (1,000) l̈ira pjl̈ëbgwo kjono kjwara kl̈ung roshko, ga dbur l̈i jnena beno tjeng e roshko.
»Dbar kop ara irgo ga domer l̈i shrono shäng iröng obi ga ba parkagaga rokara, dbur l̈i l̇l̇gweya ba tjok wl̈o.
Ba parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (5,000) l̈i shrono shäng ba shwoy ga tjl̈ẽ ba pjl̈uyo kong ga “Tjl̈apga, tja kong dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún tworop kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o shkëng (5,000). Tja dbur shano bayo eni obi” l̈e, ga dbur l̈i twara ba kong uunkong.
»Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pjl̈úe. Pja parkaga pjl̈ú wl̈eniyo, l̇l̇ëye l̈e bop kägäyorë bop kong l̈i shäryëp eni ĩyado. Pja kong l̇l̇ëbo tworor chira, ga dorop pjl̈o beke. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëbo twër bop kong ara, dëp wl̈o. Pja opzrëk tek bor tjok na, pja ber sök wopjl̈ú wl̈o” l̈e.
»E irgo ga ba parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök (2,000) l̈i shrono shäng ba shwoy ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Tjl̈apga, tja kong dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún tworop kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o pjök (2,000). Tja dbur shano bayo eni obi” l̈e, ga dbur l̈i twara ba kong uunkong.
»Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pjl̈úe. Pja parkaga pjl̈ú wl̈eniyo, l̇l̇ëye l̈e bop kägäyorë bop kong l̈i shäryëp eni ĩyado. Pja kong l̇l̇ëbo tworor chira, ga dorop pjl̈o beke. E kjĩshko ga l̇l̇ëbo twër bop kong ara, dëp wl̈o. Pja opzrëk tek bor tjok na, pja ber sök wopjl̈ú wl̈o” l̈e.
»E irgo ga ba parkaga kong dbur twara kjwo sak dbäw dbäw (1,000) l̈i shrono shäng ba shwoy ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Tjl̈apga, miydër pjl̈ú ga pja kjange. Pja dwl̈a bo kjrë, dwl̈a dgorop l̇l̇ëmshko. Dwl̈a sguinop l̇l̇ëmshko ga dwl̈a bo jöp eshko bakoe.
E kjĩshko ga pja bangkjroror ara, ga bop dbur l̈i jnenor beno tjeng kl̈ung roshko. Tjeng ëre” l̈e ba kong.
»Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Pja parkaga owa, shmi ara. Miydëp pjl̈ú ga tja dwl̈a bo kjrë, dwl̈a dgoror l̇l̇ëmshko. Dwl̈a sguinor l̇l̇ëmshko ga dwl̈a bo jör eshko bakoe.
E kjĩshko ga bor dbur ëre sörop, jnenop dbur jnezl̈ong uyo roshko dey. Eni kjwe ga tja tjwe iröng obi ga tja dbur töno e kjinmo kjwe” l̈e ba kong.
»Eshko ga ba pjl̈uyo tjl̈ẽ oba kong ga “Dbur tjeng ba wl̈oshko kjwe dözĩ, twozĩ kjl̈ara shäng dbur shano kjwo sak dbäw dbäw pjl̈ogl̈o sak dbäw (10,000) l̈i kong.
Ëye l̇l̇ëbo tjok ga së̃ya jek obi, ber l̇l̇ëbo ara wl̈o. Ëye l̇l̇ëye l̇l̇ëm ga l̇l̇ëye tjeng sirawa l̈i döya ba shjiryo drete.
Parkaga l̇l̇ëno l̇l̇ëm kjwe dbuzĩ jek kjoko, kjok ro sĩ roshko, ber shäng sl̈ar eshko, kowo uë, l̇l̇ëbo bang ara ba kong kjĩy” l̈e.
»No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre tjwe bor dbo kãl̈ã go, bor parkagaga kjok dogo so tjokshko ga tja sirkek wl̈ar sök bor pjl̈u sökkl̈o kãl̈ã l̇l̇etl̇l̇et l̈i kjing go.
Eshko ga tjëyoga kjrina kjrina kjok kjwang jĩkong tjwe tön uunkong bor bokshto. Öng daga, ba öng wl̈ẽp ushko so, ba shwl̈ing ushko so, e kje dboy dboy sorë ga nopga kjër dboy dboy eni bakoe.
»Nopga so öng wl̈ẽp ushko so kjoyo l̈i iër ber tjeng or kël̈ëkong. Nopga so shwl̈ing ushko so kjoyo l̈i iër ber tjeng or mil̈ëkong.
E irgo ga no pjl̈uyo ëre tjl̈ẽ nopga tjeng or kël̈ëkong l̈i kong ga “Pjãy kjimtara bor Datarë. Pjãy tek l̈öng kjok ëreshko. Kjok ëre poshäryak buk pjir, kjok ëre shäryara Sbörë tek l̈ëkong.
Tja pjl̈i arashko ga tja sënomi. Tja wodogroshko ga tja kong di tworomi. Tja song, tjwe shto obl̈ë so dwayoshko ga tja wl̈okjroromi bomi ushko.
Tja shwong l̇l̇ëmshko ga tja kong shwong tworomi. Tja swl̈o arashko ga tja kjimtoromi. Tja sök no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko ga tja ĩnomi öör jong ey” l̈ër.
»Kuya nopga pjl̈o bek l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok bor kong ga “Tjl̈apga, ¿pja ĩnorwa pjl̈i arashko ga pja sënorwa l̈ëp l̈i, e l̇l̇onoshko? ¿Pja wodogroshko ga pja kong di twororwa l̈ëp l̈i, e l̇l̇onoshko?
¿Pja song, tjwe shto obl̈ë so dwayoshko ga pja wl̈okjrororwa borwa ushko l̈ëp l̈i, e l̇l̇onoshko? ¿Pja shwong l̇l̇ëmshko ga pja kong shwong twororwa l̈ëp l̈i, e l̇l̇onoshko?
¿Pja swl̈o arashko, pja sök no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko ga pja ĩnorwa öör jong l̈ëp l̈i, e l̇l̇onoshko?” l̈e.
»Eshko ga tja tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga shäryoromi eni bor pjeyo song wl̈eniyo kjl̈ara kong wl̈eni ga shäryoromi bor kong wl̈eni” l̈ër.
»E irgo ga tja tjl̈ẽ nopga tjeng or mil̈ëkong l̈i kong ga “Pjãy shdungko. Pjãy opkjos bor zl̈ong dwayo. Iök jong kjwara pjë jong ri ri ĩyado. Shäryak jong Ä kong, ba pjeyoga kjok dogo so kong bakoe. Pjãy nom ber l̈öng eshko ĩyado.
Tja pjl̈i arashko ga tja sënomi l̇l̇ëme. Tja wodogroshko ga tja kong di tworomi l̇l̇ëme.
Tja song, tjwe shto obl̈ë so dwayoshko ga tja wl̈okjroromi bomi ushko l̇l̇ëme. Tja shwong l̇l̇ëmshko ga tja kong shwong tworomi l̇l̇ëme. Tja swl̈o arashko, tja sök no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko ga tja ĩnomi öör l̇l̇ëm bakoe” l̈ër.
»Kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok bor kong ga “Tjl̈apga, ¿pja ĩnorwa sorë l̈ëp l̈i ga pja kjimtororwa l̇l̇ëm l̇l̇onoshko?” l̈e.
»Eshko ga tja tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga l̇l̇ëye shäryoromi eni bor pjeyo song wl̈eniyo kjl̈ara kong l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni ga shäryoromi bor kong l̇l̇ëm wl̈eni” l̈ër.
»E irgo ga epga jongya ber tjeng shdũya ĩyado wl̈o. Ga nopga pjl̈o bek l̈i jongya ber tjeng së ĩyado Sbö tjok wl̈o» l̈e ba kong.
Jesús tjl̈ẽno pjir ga tjl̈ẽ ba oppinggaga kong ga
«Miydëmi pjl̈ú ga Israel tjëyoga döktong tek Egipto kjokyo dwayo dbaryo shrëkkl̈o l̈i kjönma. Eshko dbaryo ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre twëba bor wl̈oyoga kong, tja zröya l̈ok pjang kjl̈ös go wl̈o» l̈e.
Eshkoshko ga syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo, e töno l̈ok syõshtaga kësbangyo ko Caifás ushko,
ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga «¿Jesús, e shay, zröy wl̈o sorë ga pjl̈ú? Shay wl̈o ga jyõyotkëy.
Gueniyo dbar shrëzl̈ong dbaryo l̇l̇ëme. L̇l̇ëm ga nopga ara ga wl̈ike l̈ok äe» l̈e.
E irgo ga Jesús jek öötong shäng Betania kjokyo, Simón ushko. Dënashko ga Simón l̈i pogl̈o go swl̈o ara, sho an do jĩkong, gueniyo poptonoe.
Jesús sök Simón ushkoshko ga wal̈ë shrono shäng ba zl̈ong bäng kjl̈ara, wl̈oshko poshtikkl̈o bapkwo tjwl̈õ ara shäryak akkwo ko alabastro go, roshko poshtikkl̈o l̈õ pjl̈ëbl̈ë tjwl̈õ ara wl̈eniyo. Eshko ga söra jek Jesús sök ië l̈ishko, ga tyara ba dl̈u kjing go.
Ĩya ba oppinggagarë ga iirkë jong, ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga «¿Kjwe zãya kjweni ega?
Zok ga kjwe soynena dburyo ara, oba song wl̈eniyo kjimtokl̈o wl̈o dey» l̈e.
Tjl̈ẽ l̈öng l̇l̇ë l̈i miydara Jesúsdë pjir kuzong ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Wal̈ë kjwe l̈ãywëmi eni ega? L̇l̇ëye shäryara bor kong ëre beno pjl̈úe.
Oba song wl̈eniyo l̈öng bomi tjok ĩyado, gueniyo tjara shäng bomi tjok ĩyado l̇l̇ëme.
Poshtikkl̈o tyara bor doyo go ëre, e bor doyo poshäryokl̈o, tja iëba sakshko wl̈o.
L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga kjok kjwang jĩkong kjone pogo ga Sbö tjl̈õkwo roy pjl̈ú l̈ëbashko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryara wal̈ë kjwerë bor kong ëre woyoshrëba, ga roy l̈ëba bakoe» l̈e.
Jesús oppinggaga dogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) kjl̈ara ko Judas Iscariote. E öör shäng syõshtaga kägäyoga ĩk,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Jesús, e twër bomi kong ga tja potjwl̈ẽmi kjöm?» l̈e. Eni ga potjwl̈ẽna l̈ok dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún kjwo sak mya (30).
Eshko jek l̈ëkong ga Judas beno shäng wotjl̈ĩk ga «¿Jesús twër ba kong sorë ga pjl̈ú?» l̈e.
E irgo ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir shäryak ba uukkl̈o tjok l̇l̇ëm dbaryo l̈i öötonge. E dbaryo ga Jesús oppinggaga tek shrono l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Israel tjëyoga döktong tek Egipto kjokyo dwayo dbaryo shrëkkl̈o l̈i dl̈iyo shäryërwa kjone ga pjl̈ú?»
«Pjãy to Jerusalén kjokyo roshko. Domer shäng kjl̈ara eshko. Pjãy tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga “Tjl̈apga no pingga tjl̈ẽ ga ‘Tja dbaryo äätoe. Tja jek bop ushko bor oppinggaga tjok, Israel tjëyoga döktong tek Egipto kjokyo dwayo dbaryo l̈i shrërwa wl̈o’ l̈e” l̈ëmi ba kong eni» l̈e ba kong.
Kuya l̈ok ga shäryara l̈ok eni, ga dbar shrëkkl̈o l̈i dl̈iyo poshäryara l̈ok pjire.
Öötong kjok shkë ga Jesús sök ië, ba oppinggaga dogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) l̈i tjok.
L̈öng ië wopro ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjãy kjl̈ara, tja soyneya, twe oba kong» l̈e.
Kuya l̈ok ga beno l̈öng woydë arae. Ga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara tjl̈ẽ Jesús kong ga «Tjl̈apga, ¿tja l̇l̇ëm l̇l̇ëmdo?» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Ëye sök bor tjok, ba pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir l̈i pöya sök bor tjok iokl̈o kjwaraso roy ga bor soynega l̈i e.
No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre wol̈on, tak pjang Sbö tjl̈õkwo go sorë l̈i eni. Gueniyo bor soynega, era song jl̈õe. Weno l̇l̇ëm kjwe ga pjl̈ú ba kong dey» l̈e.
Eni ga Judas, ba soynega l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «No pingga, ¿tja l̇l̇ëm l̇l̇ëmdo?» «L̈ëp sök om go l̈iro» l̈e ba kong.
L̈öng ië wopro ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir kjrara Jesúsdë kjwara, ga tjl̈ẽ Sbö kong ga «Tjawa kong dl̈i tworop ëre. Tjawa ber wopjl̈ú bop tjok e kjĩshko» l̈e. E irgo ga pjl̈ung shosho suk pjir l̈i tora, twara sira sira ba oppinggaga kong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Kjrozĩ, uozĩ, ëre bor sho wl̈eni» l̈e.
E irgo ga di iokl̈o kjrara kjwara, roy kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara, ga tjl̈ẽ Sbö kong ga «Tjawa kong kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo tworop ëre. Tjawa ber wopjl̈ú bop tjok e kjĩshko» l̈e. E irgo ga twara ba oppinggaga kjl̈ara kjl̈ara kong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Iozĩ pjãy uunkongdë sira sira.
Ëre bor srëng wl̈eni. E go ga tjl̈õkwo twara Sbörë, beno ĩyado wl̈o l̈i, e shärye. Bor srëng l̈i kwon, nopga ara kong. E go ga owa pjang ba go l̈i l̈ö̃ya Sbörë ber drete.
Gueniyo l̈ër bomi kong ga kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo iër ame, äär jong bor Data ber sök no pjl̈uyo dbaryoshko jã. Eshko ga iër bomi tjok jek obi» l̈e.
E irgo ga tono l̈ok pjl̈ara Sbö kong, ga to jem l̈ok Olivos dl̈upyo.
Öötong l̈öng eshko ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Sbö tjl̈õkwo tak pjang eni: »“Öng daga l̈i zrör, ga öng wl̈ẽp ushko so tjeng l̈i shdär ber kjl̈oro erä.” Eni ga eeri shkëyo ga pjãy tjeng uunkong ëre, tja rayëmi pjire.
Gueniyo ga tja wol̈ono, ga tja woshrara Sbörë iröng obishko ga tja äär Galilea kjokyo bomi bäm go. Pjãy koshër shäng eshko» l̈e.
Kuya Pedrorë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̇l̇amora, pja rayara uunkong pjir ëmdë ga tjara, pja rayër l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «L̈ër bop kong jl̈õkoyo ga pjesit kjok shränto ga kjörkö kjl̈untë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga “Jesús, e ë miydër l̇l̇ëme” l̈orop oba kong pjl̈ogl̈o mya tjän» l̈e.
Gueniyo kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong obi ga «Eni l̇l̇ëme. Tja zrökoba jek bop tjok ëmdë ga “Jesús, e ë miydër l̇l̇ëme” l̈ër ë kong l̇l̇ëme» l̈e. Ba oppinggaga l̇l̇amo l̈i oml̈ono e kjoyo bakoe.
E irgo ga Jesús jek öötong shäng Getsemaní kjokyo ba oppinggaga tjok. Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Tja to syõshtë Sbö kong këm ëre wl̈e wopro ga pjãy wl̈ar ber tjeng na» l̈e.
Eni ga jek syõshtë l̈ishko ga ba oppinggaga tjeng l̈i söra jek ba tjok dogl̈o mya, Pedro, Santiago, Juan. Jek l̈öngshko ga Jesús wosong, woydë ara.
Ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «Tja woydë ara bor pjl̈úshko. Kur ga tja wol̈on kjoyoe. Pjãy ber tjeng na, ga pjãy sjëke» l̈e.
Eni ga opkwono jek këgo sit, ga kjök tono, kjujono bokdo kjl̈ay kl̈ung go, ga syõshtono Sbö kong, tjl̈ẽ ga «Data, rokër bop kong sira ga l̇l̇ëbo wen bor kong owa dörö l̈i, e wen tjwe bor kong l̇l̇ëm kjwe dey. Shäryë eni ga pjl̈ú kjwe ga woydër eni. Gueniyo ga e l̈aga tjarë l̇l̇ëme. E l̈aga ber pjarë. Woydër ga l̇l̇ëbo shäryë, woydëp sorë l̈i eni» l̈e.
E irgo ga tek shrono shäng ba oppinggaga dogl̈o mya beno tjeng l̈ishko ga wl̈ẽna bë tjeng pëe. Eni ga tjl̈ẽ Pedro kong ga «¿Pjãy l̈öng së wop sira ga äre?
Pjãy pë l̇l̇ëme. Pjãy sjëke. Pjãy syõshtozong. Eni ga pjãy tjl̈ĩya Ärëshko ga pjãy kjimte Sbörë, l̇l̇ëbo owa shäryëmi l̇l̇ëm wl̈o. Pjãy l̇l̇ëbo pjl̈ú shäryë woydë jl̈õ, gueniyo pjãy womae» l̈e.
E irgo ga jek syõshtë obi. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Data, l̇l̇ëbo wen tjwe bor kong owa l̈i kjëp ga ä wl̈eni ga l̈aga ber pjarë» l̈e.
E irgo ga tek shrono shäng iröng obi ba oppinggaga beno tjeng l̈ishko ga wl̈ẽna bë tjeng pë obi, bokkwo l̇l̇ir woydë ëng go poywõrë kjĩshko.
Eni ga jek syõshtë pjl̈ara obi, öötong pjl̈ogl̈o mya. Eshko ga tjl̈ẽno jek obi, l̈ara bäm go sorë ga eni.
Syõshtono pjir ga tek shrono shäng iröng obi ba oppinggaga beno tjeng l̈ishko ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pjãy l̈öng pë, woshtë obire? No to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre twëba ber tjeng nopga owa wl̈oshko l̈i dbaryo öötonge. Ĩzĩa. Bor soynega tek shäng dörö tjän. Pjãy kojõzong. Shji to ëng dowl̈ẽk ba tjok» l̈e.
<range>
Jesús tjl̈ẽydë pjitë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga ba oppinggaga dogl̈o sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) kjl̈ara ko Judas, e shrono shäng eshko. Nopga shrono l̈öng träk l̇l̇ëm ba tjok, kjone kjone wl̈oshko dröng, kjone kjone wl̈oshko wl̈ëng no shpokkl̈o. Epga ichaga syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyorë.
L̈unashko ga l̇l̇gwera Judasdë nopga l̈i kong pjir tjän, Jesús, e ë miyde l̈ok wl̈o. Tjl̈ẽno ba kong ga «Ĩmi ga ëye l̈õ shir ga domer l̈i e. E shamirë» l̈ara eni.
Eni ga Judas jek öötong shäng Jesús zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Miga, Tjl̈apga no pingga!» l̈e ba kong, ga l̈õ shira.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Kjobe. Pja bor kjl̈ara. L̇l̇ëye shäryëp wl̈o l̈i shäryozong» l̈e. Eni ga nopga l̈i tek shrono l̈öng Jesús zl̈ong bäng ga shakza l̈ok pjä erä.
Eshko ga nopga l̈öng Jesús tjok eshko l̈i kjl̈ara dröng shino kjwangna, ga syõshtaga kësbangyo parkaga kwomgwo zakza tas jer l̈on pjik buk töshko erä.
Eni ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Bop dröng kjwe jnes ba shtoy iröng obi. Ëye ëngkjwë dröng go ga zrökoba dröng go bakoe.
Eni tjok ga rokër bor Data kong kjwe ga tja kong ba parkagaga kjok dogo so iche träk l̇l̇ëm ga pjl̈ú, kjringgwo sak kjwara kjingsho pjök (12) wl̈eni. ¿E miydëp l̇l̇ëmdo?
Gueniyo l̇l̇ëye wen bor kong l̈i, e tak pjang Sbö tjl̈õkwo go tjän. Rokër bor Data kong eni kjwe ga l̇l̇ëye tak pjang l̈i shäryë eni l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
Ga Jesús tjl̈ẽ nopga l̈i kong ga «¿Pjãy tjwe bor shak dröng tjok, wl̈ëng no shpokkl̈o tjok kjweni ega? ¿Tja shamishko ga tja ëngkjwë bomi tjok l̈ëmiro? Tja öör shäng oba ping ara, Sbö u zl̈ong bäng. ¿Tja sharomi eshko l̇l̇ëm egaro?
Gueniyo ëre shäryë jũni, tjl̈õkwo tara Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈agaga tek dënashko sorë l̈i ber jl̈õkoyo wl̈o» l̈e. Eshko ga ba oppinggaga Jesús rayono uunkong, ga töktong to l̈ok ey dwayo.
E irgo ga Jesús söra l̈ok to jongya syõshtaga kësbangyo ko Caifás ushko. Pedro jek shäng kä kjwaraso kä kjwaraso ba irgo. Öötong l̈öng eshko ga opzrëno jek u l̈i roshko, ga Pedro beno sök u bongkjako, Sbö u dagaga l̈öng l̈i tjok, l̇l̇ëye shäryëba pjir ber sorë ĩya wl̈o. No pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo, e töno l̈öng u l̈i roshko tjän.
<range>
Syõshtaga kägäyoga, Judío Kjok L̇l̇gwegaga Këskësyo uunkong, Jesús zröya l̈ok woydë. E kjĩshko ga nopga rokara ara töno tjeng l̈ishko, Jesús jyõyotkë wl̈o, rote l̈ok e go wl̈o.
Jyõyotkara l̈ok ara, gueniyo l̇l̇ëye to wl̈ẽna l̇l̇ëme. E irgo ga nopga kojono obl̈ë do pjök, Jesús rotë wl̈o.
Tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ga «Domer ëre tjl̈ẽno ga “Sbö u ëre shdör dret, ga äär dbargwo mya ga shäryër ber ba shtoshko iröng obi” l̈ara eni» l̈e.
Eni ga syõshtaga kësbangyo l̈i kojono, ga tjl̈ẽ Jesús kong ga «Pja rote l̈öng ara. ¿Dboryëp l̇l̇ëmde?» l̈e.
Kuya ga beno shäng kjinge. Eni ga syõshtaga kësbangyo l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿No pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i, Sbö Wa l̈ëba l̈i, e pjare? L̈os borwa kong jl̈õkoyo, Sbö Sök Ĩyado l̈i ko go» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ga «L̈ëp shäng pjarë om go eni. Gueniyo l̈ër bomi kong ga Sbö, l̇l̇ëye shärye woydë l̈i shärye ga pjl̈úe. Ga l̇l̇ono ga no to ter kjok dogo dwayo ëre ĩmi sök ba orkwo kël̈ëkong, tja ĩmi ter tjwe kjok dogo pjäng sho tjrëko bakoe» l̈e.
Kuya syõshtaga kësbangyo l̈irë ga ba shwong dwl̈ëkza tjã tjã iirdë. Tjl̈ẽ ga «¡Domer kjwe shäng Sbö l̈ãywë owa, ber tjwl̈õ l̇l̇ëm wl̈o l̈e! ¿Ëye wl̈ẽy ba rotë obi l̇l̇ëno? L̇l̇ëye l̈ara l̈i kuromi pjir tjän.
¿Kumi ga sorë?» l̈e. Kuya nopga töno tjeng uunkong l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ ga «¡Kjwe zrökko!» l̈e.
Eshko ga Jesús yora l̈ok. Bokso go tröng twara l̈ok bakoe. Kjone kjone omkwomso shpono,
ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Pja no pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i jl̈õkoyo wl̈eni ga pja shpoga ërë l̈os borwa kong» l̈e.
E wopro ga Pedro sök kjoko, u bongkjako. Eshko ga kjogl̈o shäng kjl̈ara, syõshtaga kësbangyo parkaga wl̈eniyo. Tek shrono shäng Pedro zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Nopga jëk l̈öng Jesús, Galilea so l̈i tjok, e kjl̈arayo pja» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ga «¡Jyõ! L̇l̇ëye l̈ëp shäng l̈i miydër l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
E irgo ga jek öötong shäng kjër pjl̈or kal̈ëkong, u bäng jong l̈ishko. Eshko ga kjogl̈o obl̈ë omĩno, ga tjl̈ẽ nopga l̈öng l̈i kong ga «Kjwe jëk shäng Jesús, Nazaret so l̈i tjok» l̈e.
Kuya Pedrorë ga tjl̈ẽ nopga l̈i kong ga «¡Jyõ! L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga domer, e ë miydër l̇l̇ëme» l̈e.
E irgo ga nopga l̈öng eshko l̈i tek shrono l̈öng ba zl̈ong bäng ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Miydërwa pjl̈ú ga pja ba kjl̈arayo. Pja ba pjeyo jl̈õe, bop tjl̈ẽ wl̈e go ga wẽl̈ëe» l̈e.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¡Jyõ! L̈ër bomi kong jl̈õkoyo ga domer, e ë miydër l̇l̇ëme. Eni l̇l̇ëm ga rokër Sbö kong ga tja shdũya» l̈e. Jekdo eshko ga kjörkö kjl̈unoe.
Eshko ga woyoshre kjl̈ay ga Jesús tjl̈ẽno ba kong ga «Kjörkö kjl̈untë l̇l̇ëm obishko ga “Jesús, e ë miydër l̇l̇ëme” l̈orop oba kong pjl̈ogl̈o mya tjän» l̈ara. Eni ga opshino ey dwayo, ga sl̈atong jl̈õkoyo.
Wẽshko kjok shröng ga syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo, Jesús zröya l̈ok sorë l̈i, e l̇l̇gwera l̈ok pjire.
E irgo ga Jesús orkwo pjrira, ga söra l̈ok jek, ga twara Pilato kong. Pilato, e kjok eshko so ichaga.
Jesús roy kura Judas, ba soynega l̈irë, ga miydara ga Jesús, e zrökko. Eshko ga bangyo ba kong ara, ga dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún kjwo sak mya (30) ba potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o l̈i twara iröng syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyo kong, ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga
«L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryoror. Domer pjl̈o bek tworor bomi kong, zrömi wl̈o» l̈e. Gueniyo kuya l̈ok ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «E borwa kong ga l̇l̇ëye drete. E miydaga ber pjarë om go» l̈e.
Eni ga dbur sho l̈i dbukza Judasdë shl̈äw, beno tjeng Sbö u dburyo jnezl̈ong uyo l̈i roshko, ga to jek ey dwayo, ga opskunoe.
Dbur sho l̈i töna syõshtaga kägäyogarë, ga tjl̈ẽ ëng kong ga «Dbur sho ëre, e domer potjwl̈ẽkkl̈o, zrökoba wl̈o. E kjĩshko ga iëy ber jong Sbö u l̈i dburyo jnezl̈ong ga äe» l̈e.
Eni ga l̈anyotkara l̈ok pjir ga kjok tjwl̈ẽna kjrina ko Kl̈ung Sbiyo Shäryaga kjokyo, ber buk sakshko, oba shto obl̈ë so kong wl̈o.
E kjĩshko ga kjok eshko kowaraba beno srëng kjokyo, ga eerishko ga kowëba jong eni obi.
Eni ga tjl̈õkwo l̈ara Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga tek dënashko so Jeremíasdë l̈i beno jl̈õkoyo. Tjl̈ẽno beno eni: «Dbur sho pjl̈ubl̈ún kjwo sak mya (30) l̈i kjrara l̈ok, e tjwl̈õ iara Israel tjëyogarë beno eni.
Ga Kl̈ung Sbiyo Shäryaga kjokyo l̈i tjwl̈ẽna l̈ok dbur l̈i go, tja ichara Tjl̈apgarë sorë l̈i eni.»
Jesús söra l̈ok öötong shäng kjok eshko so ichaga Pilato bokshtoshko ga Pilato tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Judío pjl̈uyo l̈i pjare?» «L̈ëp sök om go l̈iro» l̈e ba kong.
Eshko ga Jesús rote syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyorë l̈öng ara. Gueniyo dboryara Jesúsdë l̇l̇ëme.
Eni ga Pilato tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Pja rote l̈öng ara l̈i kugöp l̇l̇ëmdo?» l̈e.
Gueniyo dboryara kjak kjwara l̇l̇ëme. E kjĩshko ga woyotjl̈ĩya Pilatorë arae.
Äär l̈u pjl̈obi go ga Israel tjëyoga döktong tek Egipto kjokyo dwayo dbaryo shrëkkl̈oshko ga nopga bängzak tjeng no shdũzl̈ong uyo roshko l̈i, enido ga raye Pilatorë kjl̈ara. Woyde nopgarë kjone dey ga e rayayde.
Eshko ga no bängzak shäng kjl̈ara ko Barrabás, roy kësbange.
Eni ga nopga shrono l̈öng arashko ga Pilato tjl̈ẽ ba kong l̈ok ga «¿Woydëmi ga ëye dör, Barrabásde, de Jesús, e kowëba no pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈i?» l̈e.
Miydara pjl̈ú ga Jesús woydëba ara kjĩshko ga ymoyotke ba wl̈oyogarë ara, ga söra l̈ok ba kong e kjĩshko.
Pilato sök no l̇l̇gwezl̈ong shtoyo wopro ga ba boy tjl̈õkwo ichono ba kong. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Domer l̇l̇gwep sök l̈i, e pjl̈o beke. Kjupke shkëyo ga e yoyoĩnor owa anmoyõ. ¡E kjĩshko ga wẽyẽ, barwëy l̇l̇ëme!» l̈e.
Gueniyo ga nopga tjeng ara eshko l̈i poshduna syõshtaga kägäyoga, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyorë arae. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Rokozĩ ba kong ga Barrabás, e döyde bi kong dey l̈ozĩ eni. Rokozĩ obi ga Jesúsda zrökko l̈ozĩ eni» l̈e.
Eshko ga Pilato tjl̈ẽ nopga l̈öng l̈i kong ga «¿Nopga do pjök ëre dör bomi kong kjone dey?» «¡Barrabás, e döpdë!» l̈e l̈ok ba kong.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿Eni ga l̇l̇ëye woydëmi ga shäryër Jesús, no pjl̈uyo ichara Sbörë shrono shäng l̈ëba l̈i kong?» «¡Zrös pjang kjl̈ös go!» l̈e l̈ok eni.
Kuya ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «¿L̇l̇ë kjĩy? L̇l̇ëbo owa shäryara l̈i l̈ozĩ bor kong» l̈e. Gueniyo nopga tjl̈ẽ jek obi ga «¡Zrös pjang kjl̈ös go!» l̈e eni.
Eni ga ĩya Pilatorë ga nopga l̈i tjl̈õkwo jong kjwaraso, nopga shdöktong ëngkjwë woydë wl̈eni, l̇l̇ëye l̈e ba kong, kjl̈opswë ber wotjl̈ĩk obl̈ë wl̈o ga äe. E kjĩshko ga di rokara sira, ga orkwo shkwono nopga l̈i bokshto. Tjl̈ẽ ga «Kjwe ichër zrökoba wl̈o, gueniyo miydaga ber tjarë l̇l̇ëme. Miydaga ber pjãydë om go» l̈e.
Kuya nopga l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Wol̈ono ga miydaga ber tjawarë, borwa wapgarë bakoe» l̈e.
Eni ga Barrabás, e shira, ga rayarae. E irgo ga Jesúsda twara ba ëngkjwagaga kong, shpoya l̈ok no shpokkl̈o go wl̈o, zröya l̈ok pjang kjl̈ös go wl̈o bakoe.
Eni ga söra l̈ok, öötong shäng Pilato u bongkjako. Shto eshko, e kowëba pretorio. Ga ëngkjwagaga töno tjeng uunkong eshko, ba zl̈ong bäng pjribrie.
Eshko ga Jesús shwong skwara l̈ok, ãska wl̈ẽna l̈ok kara pjl̈upga shwong wl̈eniyo ko dingding shwëshwë, ga pjuna l̈ok ba do go.
Ga shkö sho ywara l̈ok kjwara, beno pjl̈u dl̈u iokl̈o wl̈eni, ga iara l̈ok pjang ba dl̈u go, ga kong kjë twara kjwangna, ba orkwo kël̈ëkong. Eshko ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ba kong dbo go ga «¡Judío pjl̈uyo, pja pjl̈ú, pja tjwl̈õ arae!» l̈e l̈ok eni, ba joywokl̈o.
Eshko ga go tröng twara, shpokza l̈ok tjã tjã kjë l̈i go ara ba käshko bakoe.
Joywara l̈ok pjir ga ba shwong pjang ba do go l̈i skwara l̈ok, ga ba shwong baĩya l̈i pjuna l̈ok jek iröng obi. E irgo ga söra l̈ok to, zröya l̈ok pjang kjl̈ös go wl̈o.
Jek l̈öng kjwl̈ë irbo bäng go ga domer wl̈ẽna l̈ok kjl̈ara ko Simón, e Cirene so, ga ichara l̈ok dbo go Jesús kjl̈ös l̈i sök.
E irgo ga jem öötong l̈öng kjokyo ko Gólgota. (E «No Kä Dbogl̈o dl̈upyo» l̈okl̈o.)
Eshko ga kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo dbo ara ropsrära l̈ok l̇l̇ëbo këä wl̈eniyo tjok, ga twara l̈ok Jesús kong, ie wl̈o. Tjl̈ĩna sira, gueniyo iara l̇l̇ëme.
Eshko ga l̈öra l̈ok pjang kjl̈ös go irgo ga ëngkjwagaga tjeng l̈i tjöto l̈ok l̇l̇ëbo jyãgl̈o go, Jesús shwong l̈i ber ë kong ĩya l̈ok wl̈o.
E irgo ga sirkeno l̈öng eshko ba dë.
Jesús l̈ök pjangshko l̈i kopshko, kjibokwo iak pjang kjwara, e zröya l̈ok l̇l̇ë kjĩy miydëba wl̈o. Kjibokwo tak pjang l̈i tjl̈ẽ ga «Domer ëre ko Jesús. E judío pjl̈uyo.»
Jesús l̈öra pjangshko ga nopga l̈ũ ä wl̈eniyo l̈öra l̈ok do pjök kjl̈ös go bakoe. Kjl̈ara pjang or kël̈ë, kjl̈ara pjang or mil̈ë, kjl̈ösyo dboy dboye.
Eshko ga nopga jek l̈öng Jesús l̈ök pjangshko l̈i kä wikza tjã tjã, joywe l̈ok wl̈o. Ga l̈ãywe l̈öng owa bakoe.
Tjl̈ẽ ga «Pja Sbö u shdök ber dret, ga äär dbargwo mya ga shäryëp ber ba shtoshko iröng obi l̈orop eni. Pja Sbö Wa jl̈õkoyo ga pja opdös om go, pja ter opl̈õs töshko kjl̈ös kjwe go dwayo» l̈e.
Jesús joywe syõshtaga kägäyoga, no pinggaga kjok l̇l̇gwekkl̈o tara Moisésdë l̈i go, judío tjl̈apgaga kjok l̇l̇gwega wl̈eniyorë eni bakoe. Tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga
«Oba obl̈ëra döra, gueniyo opdök om go ga äe. Kjwe Israel tjëyo pjl̈uyo l̈e. Woyde ga opl̈ong töshko kjl̈ös kjwe go dwayo. Enira tjawa mär ba go kjwe.
“Tja mär Sbö go” l̈ara. Enira woyde Sbörë ga döya. “Tja Sbö Wa” l̈ara bi kong om go» l̈e.
Nopga do pjök l̈ũ ä wl̈eniyo l̈ök l̈ok kjl̈ös go Jesús pjl̈or kar kar ëmdë ga oml̈ãywë l̈öng eni bakoe.
Öötong dl̈o dl̈uw bek ga kjok ro zoktong kjok kjwang jĩkong beno yẽt erä. Beno eni äär jong dl̈o pjö l̈ë wl̈eni.
Dl̈o öötong eni ga Jesús tjl̈ẽno dbo go, tjl̈ẽ ga «Elí, Elí, ¿lama sabactani?» l̈e. (E «Bor Sbö, bor Sbö, ¿tja rayorop jũni ega?» l̈okl̈o.)
Kuya nopga tjeng eshko l̈irë ga tjl̈ẽ ëng kong ga «Sbö tjl̈õkwo l̈aga tek dënashko so Elías, e rokayde pjang» l̈e.
Eshko ga domer shäng kjl̈ara jek tji tji, ga l̇l̇ëbo l̇l̇ukl̇l̇uk di shak ara wl̈eniyo kjrara kjwara, pöra kjil̇l̇gwo bo dyo shpoä go, kjrochara kjor dbo go, ga poyona jem, shuya Jesúsdë wl̈o l̈ara.
Eshko ga l̇l̇amo l̈öng l̈i tjl̈ẽ ba kong ga «Wẽyẽ. Elías tjwe ba dökde ĩy» l̈e.
E irgo ga ay l̈e Jesúsdë dbo go obi, ga wol̈onoe.
Eshko ga Sbö u roshko ga shwong kësbang iak pjang eshko l̈i dwl̈ëtong aas ter kjomo dwayo äär jong töshko, beno kjring pjök. Kl̈ung iano jek shkik shkik, guëng woktong aas,
ga sak roshwino ara. Eshko ga Sbö nopga kjone kjone wol̈ono tjeng l̈i, e woshrara Sbörë iröng obi, beno l̈öng së,
ga opshino ba sak roy dwayo. Ga Jesús woshrara Sbörë iröng obi irgo ga epga jek öötong opzrëno l̈öng kjok zrek ko Jerusalén l̈i roshko. Eshko ga ĩkoba l̈öng arae.
Jesús l̈ök pjang kjl̈ös go l̈i bokshto ga ëngkjwagaga l̈öng kjl̈öbö ba dë, ba kägäyo shäng ba tjok. Yo l̈i kura l̈ok, ga l̇l̇ëbo shäryono l̈i ĩna l̈ok uunkong. Eni ga bangkjrara l̈ok tira l̇l̇ëm, ga tjl̈ẽ l̈ok ëng kong ga «Shinmo l̈ök pjang kjl̈ös go kjwe, e Sbö Wa jl̈õe» l̈e.
Eshko ga wal̈ëga tjeng kjl̈öbö, tek tjeng Galilea kjokyo dwayo Jesús tjok, ba kjimtë wl̈o. Eshko ga l̇l̇ëye shäryëba Jesús kong l̈i ĩya tjeng pjola sit.
E tjrëko tjeng dogl̈o mya, kjl̈ara ko María Magdala so, kjl̈ara, e Zebedeo boy, kjl̈ara ko María. María, e Santiago, José mekë.
Domer dbur ara wl̈eniyo shäng kjl̈ara ko José, e Arimatea so. E oppino ara Jesús tjok. Kjok sëng ga
jek öötong shäng Pilato shwoy ga Jesús doyo rokara ba kong, jneya wl̈o. Eni ga ba nopga ichara Pilatorë, Jesús doyo twë ba kong wl̈o.
